column2: >Finest Quality Luxury Silk. Exclusive One of a Kind Pieces. Ancient Manufacturing Techniques Kept Alive.

column1: Loqoqoon Fine Artisan Accessories offer luxury handcrafted silk goods. Our scarves are 100% handmade and hand painted one piece at a time in Uzbekistan by an Uzbek Master Artisan using finest quality silk. All the designs come from her spirit, each unique, one of a kind
column2: guaranteed to never be repeated. The colours are hand mixed by Master Artisan for each individual item. The painting/colouring process for each piece happens as inspiration and soul flows onto each item. Due to manufacturing process of handmade goods, there may be a slight variation from one item to the next making your purchase special and unique.

column1: By supporting Loqoqoon Fine Artisan Accessories, you are also supporting skilled economically disadvanteged artisans from remote areas , and providing them with opportunities to continue create traditional works of art and showcase their craftsmanship to international markets. Your contribution will also go towards engaging more artisans and expanding workshops.
In return, you will receive finest quality one of a kind luxury silk scarfs handmade using traditional techniques.

""Pomegranate"" is used in our designs for this campaign which is traditionally used in Uzbek handcrafts and carries symbolic meaning of prosperity and fertility in many cultures and religions. It symbolizes the soul’s immortality and the perfection of nature in Zoroastrian religion.
We can encounter pomegranate as the symbol of eternal life and the Doom’s Day in Virgin Mary’s and Jesus’ statues throughout the Christian world.
Kabbala reveres the pomegranate in many of its rituals
column2: their followers “burst” a pomegranate at home and in work places on religious days to call for fertility and lucrative businesses.

column1: Also, newly weds in Anatolia and the Middle East are still served pomegranates to bless them with a lot of offspring.

For Muslims, the pomegranate is also a symbol of beauty, it is said to give beauty to those who eat it. Prophet Mohammed has advised pregnant women to eat pomegranates if they wanted beautiful children.

Production of silk has been part of Uzbek culture for thousands of years. Ferghana Valley, in eastern Uzbekistan, is the epicentre of silk. Ancient cities of Samarkand and Bukhara also known as Shining Pearl of the Silk Road were historically one of the most important citices of the Silk Road. Uzbekistan is currently the world’s third largest silk producer. Uzbek silk has been used by fashion houses of the world, including Balenciaga, Etro and Oscar De la Renta.
LIMITED AVAILABILITY as follows: 18 stoles, 18 scarfs and 18 neckerchiefs

Every project has its risks and challenges but we tried our absolute best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior coming to crowdfunding. We are working hand in hand with the designers and artisans to produce only the best quality product.

Our first product, 100% silk scarves, that you see in the above video/photos are 100% handmade exclusively for Loqoqoon. The final product might slightly vary due to the manufacturing process of handmade goods.

With your support, we will be able to ship Loqoqoon scarves worldwide. We have sourced the best quality silk and the best artisan, as the process is handmade, production is limited and we will produce in accordance with the perks, on first come first served basis.

We have the capacity to produce more scarfs, but the lead time is about three months with the expected delivery in the new year. Your strong support will give us the needed affirmation to place a larger raw materials order and start production earlier.

We understand that not everyone is able to contribute financially but that doesn't mean you can't support us by spreading the word about Loqoqoon and our campaign. Please use Indiegogo share tools to get the word out!

0,"

An ethically-made, deconstructable crossbody designed to illuminate any outfit on your favourite days of the week. 

                             

The WEEK/END is a lightweight, compact, statement accessory. Taking you effortlessly from Friday night cocktails to Sunday brunch and everything in between.

Combining London looks with Northern Soul
column2:
this rebelliously British bag has a bold sophisticated exterior and a sensual playfulness inside.

                             

We spent 2 years researching to find the best vegan fabrics for the WEEK/END. For the exterior, we chose soft-to-the-touch cactus leather, which mimics high quality real leather. It’s durable, vegan, odourless and is highly sustainable.

Abundantly grown in its natural climate in North Mexico, the cactus plant requires little water to thrive and harvesting does not harm the plant.

The lining is a sumptuous European eco-suede made from partially recyclable materials and non-toxic, water based dyes. A luxurious, thick suede replica, made with a conscience.

Our manufacturers and suppliers have signed a statement of assurance as part of their commitment to helping us deliver a fully vegan product.

Your new accessory packs flat into a custom-made dust bag, making storage minimal and convenient. Lightweight &
column3: compact, it fits effortlessly into your hand luggage
column4:
Ready for that weekend city break.

                            

Designed for both form and function
column6:
finished with over 30 gold, robust press studs specially made to hold tight when the bag is constructed.

                            

Worn 3 ways for your own personal comfort and style
column7:
The WEEK/END is hand made right on our doorstep.

It was important to us to manufacture at home, to support people like Carol, our artisan bag maker, who has over 30 years experience. The skills and craftsmanship of Carol and her team ensure that every WEEK/END is finished to the highest standard.

We know our bag makers personally. We witness their working conditions first-hand and we are privileged to be able to spend time in their workshop tweaking our designs but mostly marvelling at their talents. 

Discreetly hidden inside the WEEK/END crossbody is Frida Rome’s signature detail
column8:
a limited-edition, erotic story chapter.

The full-length, tastefully seductive tale is also available on our website via personal login, gifted to you with your reward. 

This bag is not one of a kind, it's the first of its kind. 

You can also personalise your WEEK/END by choosing not to include this playful detail.

                            

Attention has also been placed on creating the perfect fit for you
column9:
matching extenders connect to your shoulder strap to wear your WEEK/END at your desirable height.

Add 2x attachable extenders for £16 when selecting your reward.

                            

This small bag with big personality is the perfect size for your essential weekend needs. We’ve even made room for a foldable canvas Eco-Tote. Handy for a stop at the shops, or to keep your jacket safe when you reach the party.

Add your FRIDA ROME tote bag for £15 when selecting your reward.

The WEEK/END truly is a versatile, luxury handbag, made consciously and built to last. 

It’s what connects you to celebrations, the adventures, the memories of your favourite days of the week. It’s a bold statement that illuminates any outfit, taking you from day to night. 

We’re Natalie &
column10:
Rebecca, the founders of FRIDA ROME. Two friends on a mission to create a luxury handbag with good looks and good morals for good times.

Passion + determination = our mission to create handmade accessories that never compromise on style or quality, simply because they’re cruelty-free.

FRIDA ROME embraces the woman and all of her contradictions
column11:
she is feminine and masculine, complex and effortless. We desire to make a difference, not only to the lives of animals, but to women’s lives as well. Inside every creation, we capture the rebellious spirit of women with a thirst for life. 

Designing accessories that evoke a feeling is at the core of what we do. The WEEK/END is not just a bag. It’s better. It’s what connects you to those celebrations, the adventures, the memories.

Join us
column12:
FRIDA ROME. Inviting passion, compassion, style and playfulness into the accessory collections of women who dare to be different.

 #befridarome

 

We want to continue to make a difference to the lives of animals and the planet. With every pledge, we’ll donate 2% of profits to providing freedom and protection for those who do not have a voice. Help us give back.

 

Risks &
column13:
Challenges

 

ABOUT FRIDA ROME:

This is our first campaign on Kickstarter. However, our team has previous experience of other successful campaigns in multiple countries across other popular crowdfunding platforms. We understand the risks and challenges of the production process and perform rigorous testing of all products before launching them to the market. Unexpected issues may arise and if they do we will always deal with them with our customers’ satisfaction at the top of our priorities list and we will handle all enquiries with care. We are working with a very experienced team, suppliers, and manufacturers and we are confident that we can deliver what we say we will.

DESIGN AMENDMENTS:

The WEEK/END product you see on Kickstarter is considered a final prototype. This is very close to the finished product you will receive. However, the design may vary, subject to final tweaks, modifications, and alterations based on FRIDA ROME’s continued testing and refining process.

DELIVERY TIMES:

Our delivery for the first release will begin in February 2021. We are staggering delivery to ensure that the manufacturing of your WEEK/END is not rushed. However, delays in the fashion industry are sometimes inevitable, so our anticipated delivery dates are conservative estimates. However, rest assured we will do our utmost to deliver according to our estimated timeline. 

MADE IN ENGLAND:

We have made a conscious choice to manufacture on home soil for us to be as close to production as possible. We believe in quality production and it’s important to us to make sure those who do the work are doing so in safe conditions and are paid well for their skills. We will handle the fulfillment of all rewards to ensure that we get them to you in excellent condition.

SUSTAINABLE DISTRIBUTION &
column14:
PACKAGING:

We aim for all of our packaging to be recyclable and plastic-free. We provide you with an even better unboxing experience, as your WEEK/END comes carefully packaged in 100% recyclable packaging (unless you want to keep the beautiful box for yourself).

column11:
>

Our world timer shows the time for the main 24 time zones simultaneously whereas a traditional GMT can only monitor one other selected time zone. True world time watches traditionally cost upwards of $5,000 to $20,000, however we devised a new kind of solution. Using a clever dual-layer rotating disc system, we are able to reverse engineer the first quartz hybrid world timer using a Swiss GMT movement.
column12:
>

This isn’t our first rodeo. The World Traveller will be our fourth watch collection to be created by Kickstarter. Our quality, transparency, &
column13: pricing is second to none - we offer full warranties &amp
column14: communicate our production process from beginning to end.

column2: >
column6:
>

We’re using the best materials and components we can find to build an excessively quality watch- Italian Natural Calf Leather, Swiss Movement, and 316L Stainless Steel Case with Oyster Bezel.
column9:
>

FLUTED BEZEL

The case is to be sandblasted first, to have all the edges softened, but also brushed on the fluted oyster bezel, to offer a distinct surface. A fluted bezel, such as on a Rolex, practically doubles the available flat polished surface area on the bezel. Allowing not only a greater surface for light refraction, but also the ability to reflect light from different angles at the same time.

column2: >

column3:
>

For the past 5 years we have chose to work with an established watch manufacturing group known for rigorous quality control. We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partners. We've thoroughly toured their facility multiple times and they are completely aligned with our goals. In 2017, they revamped all their facilities with the latest manufacturing equipment and processes.
column4:
>

With multiple stages in the manufacture and quality check process, we are confident in their ability to deliver a quality product. We were impressed with their sophisticated manufacture process including different rooms for assembly, air pressure checkpoints, water pressure stations, 48-hour timekeeping accuracy test, and (of course) a drop test. All of their facilities meet all necessary regulation and code for operation.
column5:
>

Though they host the manufacturing of many large retail brands, the general managers made sure all of our requirements were met and accommodated. Their experienced staff and attention to detail was what made our decision to choose them so easy. We, at Elliot Havok, are extremely confident they will meet our needs.
column7:
>

We will offer the Havok watch at wholesale pricing with radical transparency. Not only should the watch be priced so that nobody breaks their bank, but what goes into the watch should be disclosed.
column8:
>

By delivering directly to YOU, we can cut out all the middlemen markups.

column5: >SHABES is shapewear created for the modern woman.
column10: European produced sustainable, effective and comfortable shapewear fits all bodytypes while caring for the enviroment.
column14: >UPDATE: We have now started the production and will be delivering in may!
column30:
>We spent two years on developing our shapewear.
Now we are ready ready to go into production but first we need your help.
column80: >The possibility of jumping on a bike, cycling down to the local supermarket and buying a pair of shorts with 14% elastane, mediocre shaping effect and a lot of polyester has always been there. But these are patchwork solutions!
column82: ><strong><strong>The alternative is to go into the exclusive lingerie stores and buy a style for over 200 USD. The trouble is that they don’t focus on shapewear either. Most of these brands still use polyester and contain too low a percentage of spandex, because they have not yet managed to make it comfortable while providing a strong shaping effect. In addition, you often have to spend a lot of money to be allowed to wear their logo. No matter which solution you go with, the same questions come up again and again. Where is the sustainability? Where is the functionality combined with comfort? The answer is quite simple
column85: >The more we visited supermarkets and lingerie stores, and the more we trawled the market, the clearer it became that there was a need for a sustainable, comfortable, effective and affordable shapewear brand!
column102: >SHABES is danish design and quality at its best. Created in collaboration with top of their field danish designers and produced in a sustainable way with sustainable material. SHABES accentuates your body's feminine curves in the most flattering way allowing you to feel hot, confident and relaxed, no matter what body type you have, what you wear or where you are. SHABES is created for the modern woman. You, who do not want to compromise on materials or quality. You, who want shapewear with lots of comfort and optimal functionality.
column114: >We wanted to be the best at shaping.
column117: >We listened to the people around us and learned from the best in their respective fields. Of the two years it took us to reach this point, we spent one of them choosing our materials.
column128: >Together with our European manufacturer, we searched for the right elastane to form the foundation of our first collection, SHABES YOUR CONFIDENCE. We found LYCRA® BEAUTY and it instantly became our choice.
column130: >LYCRA® BEAUTY is made to achieve a higher standard within shaping and we have implemented it in our shapewear for just that reason. Providing support and sculpting simultaneously – without discomfort – is what we want to do. It’s time to challenge traditional beauty standards, and LYCRA® BEAUTY is an important part of our attempt to do this.
column140: >From the very beginning, we knew that we wanted to make shapewear sustainable without compromising functionality or comfort. Two years later, we have done just that.
column142: >Our certified Eco-Care® yarn truly is a breakthrough in yarn engineering and production. The sustainable nylon minimises waste and reduces energy consumption, caring for the environment, while retaining the properties of virgin fibres, allowing full functionality for our shapewear.
column145: >We paid attention to the details and knew what we wanted our shapewear to stand for.
column147:
>Our nylon 6.6 is among the finest and most delicate yarns in the world. For our vision to come true, we needed a super-fine yarn containing the properties of softness, durability, stretchability and a long lifespan to comply with the attributes of our top-quality Eco-Care® nylon and our LYCRA® BEAUTY.
The nylon 6.6 in our shapewear is a mid-denier yarn and is often used in sports and outwear.
column149: >It has proven extremely effective and contains good physical properties such as high strength, excellent stability and a good abrasion resistance. All things we need to make our shapewear bring out the confidence and smiles in woman around the world.
column152:
>“SHABES is not fast fashion. And we will never be fast fashion. We are a company with core values. We will produce our products under environmentally-friendly and orderly conditions. We will never stop innovating on our styles, and we are constantly working on new and sustainable initiatives”.
– The team behind SHABES
column154: >Throughout our value chain we are sending a message. Not only do we have a vision to make great shapewear, but we want to make it in a sustainable and eco-friendly way.
column166: >To do that, we needed not only to make a big part of our product sustainable, but also to produce them in a sustainable way with a green source of energy and under European standards. Finding a manufacturer that possessed the required know-how to produce the shapewear we visualised in this manner wasn’t easy, but we are very happy to have found the best fit. Our factory is based in Europe and is a certified green manufacturer with up to 80% of all energy used coming from solar panels. Like us, they work constantly to be better for the environment, for example by implementing more recyclable textiles to replace the 100% synthetic ones.
column184:
>As you know, the vision with SHABES is to make the world's best shapewear.
It is not a day-to-day task. Making shapewear is a declaration of love. Because it is complicated, and you have to want it. We will produce our products under environmentally-friendly and European conditions. We will never stop innovating on our styles, and we are constantly working on new and sustainable initiatives.
SHABES is a company with core values. But to realize our vision, we need your pledge!
Back our campaign today, and help us support woman around the world.
column202:
>For a long time, we were looking for a team that could help realise our vision, and we found a team of four designers who, like us, believed in and shared the vision of the perfect shapewear for all body types.
Our development of the first collection, SHABES YOUR CONFIDENCE, took us just under two years to complete. The best part of the journey was, without a doubt, when we produced our first prototypes. It was a milestone and lifted the spirits of the whole team. Now it was real. We had testers and collaborators in our clothes for several weeks to go in-depth with the construction, and they were corrected and sewn and corrected again – and today, two years wiser, we have our finished product. This is the team behind.

column25:
/>

 

 

","SHABES is shapewear created for the modern woman.Our danish designed & European produced sustainable, effective and comfortable shapewear fits all bodytypes while caring for the enviroment.UPDATE: We have now started the production and will be delivering in may!  We spent two years on developing our shapewear.Now we are ready ready to go into production but first we need your help. The possibility of jumping on a bike, cycling down to the local supermarket and buying a pair of shorts with 14% elastane, mediocre shaping effect and a lot of polyester has always been there. But these are patchwork solutions!The alternative is to go into the exclusive lingerie stores and buy a style for over 200 USD. The trouble is that they don’t focus on shapewear either. Most of these brands still use polyester and contain too low a percentage of spandex, because they have not yet managed to make it comfortable while providing a strong shaping effect. In addition, you often have to spend a lot of money to be allowed to wear their logo. No matter which solution you go with, the same questions come up again and again. Where is the sustainability? Where is the functionality combined with comfort? The answer is quite simple
column26: it does not exist.The more we visited supermarkets and lingerie stores, and the more we trawled the market, the clearer it became that there was a need for a sustainable, comfortable, effective and affordable shapewear brand! SHABES is danish design and quality at its best. Created in collaboration with top of their field danish designers and produced in a sustainable way with sustainable material. SHABES accentuates your body's feminine curves in the most flattering way allowing you to feel hot, confident and relaxed, no matter what body type you have, what you wear or where you are. SHABES is created for the modern woman. You, who do not want to compromise on materials or quality. You, who want shapewear with lots of comfort and optimal functionality.    We wanted to be the best at shaping.We listened to the people around us and learned from the best in their respective fields. Of the two years it took us to reach this point, we spent one of them choosing our materials.      Together with our European manufacturer, we searched for the right elastane to form the foundation of our first collection, SHABES YOUR CONFIDENCE. We found LYCRA® BEAUTY and it instantly became our choice.LYCRA® BEAUTY is made to achieve a higher standard within shaping and we have implemented it in our shapewear for just that reason. Providing support and sculpting simultaneously – without discomfort – is what we want to do. It’s time to challenge traditional beauty standards, and LYCRA® BEAUTY is an important part of our attempt to do this.   From the very beginning, we knew that we wanted to make shapewear sustainable without compromising functionality or comfort. Two years later, we have done just that.Our certified Eco-Care® yarn truly is a breakthrough in yarn engineering and production. The sustainable nylon minimises waste and reduces energy consumption, caring for the environment, while retaining the properties of virgin fibres, allowing full functionality for our shapewear.   We paid attention to the details and knew what we wanted our shapewear to stand for.Our nylon 6.6 is among the finest and most delicate yarns in the world. For our vision to come true, we needed a super-fine yarn containing the properties of softness, durability, stretchability and a long lifespan to comply with the attributes of our top-quality Eco-Care® nylon and our LYCRA® BEAUTY.The nylon 6.6 in our shapewear is a mid-denier yarn and is often used in sports and outwear.It has proven extremely effective and contains good physical properties such as high strength, excellent stability and a good abrasion resistance. All things we need to make our shapewear bring out the confidence and smiles in woman around the world.“SHABES is not fast fashion. And we will never be fast fashion. We are a company with core values. We will produce our products under environmentally-friendly and orderly conditions. We will never stop innovating on our styles, and we are constantly working on new and sustainable initiatives”.– The team behind SHABESThroughout our value chain we are sending a message. Not only do we have a vision to make great shapewear, but we want to make it in a sustainable and eco-friendly way.  To do that, we needed not only to make a big part of our product sustainable, but also to produce them in a sustainable way with a green source of energy and under European standards. Finding a manufacturer that possessed the required know-how to produce the shapewear we visualised in this manner wasn’t easy, but we are very happy to have found the best fit. Our factory is based in Europe and is a certified green manufacturer with up to 80% of all energy used coming from solar panels. Like us, they work constantly to be better for the environment, for example by implementing more recyclable textiles to replace the 100% synthetic ones. As you know, the vision with SHABES is to make the world's best shapewear.It is not a day-to-day task. Making shapewear is a declaration of love. Because it is complicated, and you have to want it. We will produce our products under environmentally-friendly and European conditions. We will never stop innovating on our styles, and we are constantly working on new and sustainable initiatives.SHABES is a company with core values. But to realize our vision, we need your pledge!Back our campaign today, and help us support woman around the world.  For a long time, we were looking for a team that could help realise our vision, and we found a team of four designers who, like us, believed in and shared the vision of the perfect shapewear for all body types.Our development of the first collection, SHABES YOUR CONFIDENCE, took us just under two years to complete. The best part of the journey was, without a doubt, when we produced our first prototypes. It was a milestone and lifted the spirits of the whole team. Now it was real. We had testers and collaborators in our clothes for several weeks to go in-depth with the construction, and they were corrected and sewn and corrected again – and today, two years wiser, we have our finished product. This is the team behind.",27.0,1,"1 Campaign

The options are endless.

Your favorite music, audiobooks, podcasts, voice-commands... whatever you're into listening to, OssiiSound has you covered. One device, so many options.
column43:
s=09b117b66e3e3fd227d63971b1875c38"" src=""""/>

 

Change Lens On the Go

Ossii's feature a tool-free front rim, and a 3-point locking system that lets you swap lenses in an instant. Go from active shades to your at-work prescription without skipping a beat. Beyond that, you can remove the audio device in 1 sec because of our patented design.

Why bone conduction?

What makes us different?

Reduces 90% of sound leakage

When the sound conductor is placed properly, you get sound without distortion, leakage, and, with the bonus of prolonged battery life.

column1: Who likes wearing glasses while having their headphones/ Bluetooth headsets in and feels like you are wearing a thousand devices on your head? Ossii's were designed as the all-in-one glasses so you save the hassle of bringing multiple pairs of glasses, wearing annoying headphones / Bluetooth headsets and having to change glasses when you don't have it.

The best materials.

Titanium is one of the best materials you can use for eyewear, it's durable, chemical resistant, and highly flexible. It's also a memory metal. This means that the pure titanium top tube on Ossii's automatically adjusts to your head, perfectly. 

Patented Design

Our exclusive patent makes Ossii's the only glasses to give so much simple customization. Don't want the audio portion of the glasses for a while? No problem. It takes one second to remove them.

Protection from Bluelight.

With Ossii's you can choose between Carl Zeiss lenses for outdoors, and blue-block coated lenses for indoors. Blueblock protects your eyes from blue light, because blue light causes more damage to your eyes than other wavelengths. This means that when you are exposed to blue light from fluorescents or LED-backlit screens, your protected.

Pick your lens &

Sunglasses Lens: 

Each OSSII SOUND sunglasses with the trustworthiness of a high-quality lens which sees no rivals and differs from competitors, offering the greatest premium sun lenses and coatings resistance to scratches, impacts, stress etc.

We are sure that QOT Bifold will change your everyday carry.

column1: “Simplicity in design isn’t just about removing the visually superfluous elements. It’s about creating a product to last. One that doesn’t need to ebb and flow with ever-changing trends or fashions. Simplicity in design, can make a product timeless.”

ventura has dedicated itself to this philosophy over the last three decades and so there is no better way to celebrate the truthfulness of this notion than by working directly with our supporters to reintroduce the iconic v-matic EGO, designed by Hannes Wettstein in 1994.
25 years ago Hannes Wettstein (a young Zurich designer at the time) put forward a unique proposal to ventura...

The aesthetic appearance of the proposed watch would be defined by the functional, technical and material characteristics. The properties of the pure titanium would determine the form. The dial layout should be functional, reduced to its essential elements. The only item to be left undetermined was the watch’s price
column2: the aim was to produce a watch from the best materials, free from any cost pressures.

column1: This unconventional approach allowed Hannes to create a truly honest watch
Housed within the matte titanium body is a beautifully decorated ETA 2892-A2 with a custom ventura rotor. This Swiss automatic movement features 21 jewels and beats at 28,800 vibrations per hour.

The supply of ETA 2892-A2 movements is very restricted, and only a select pool of trusted manufacturing partners are given access to this movement. It is not uncommon to find this movement powering luxury watches that retail from £3,000 /  €3,350 / $3,750 and above.

3 years ago, Stephan Hürlemann, a close friend and colleague of Hannes Wettstein, set out to reconstruct the revered v-matic EGO. For Stephan it was a labour of love, which saw him spend numerous hours at the Museum für Gestaltung Zürich where the ventura archives are located. His meticulous approach saw the reconstruction of every component of the watch, abiding to the same high quality standards that Wettstein and ventura followed all those years ago.

Rather than working with distribution partners, we are focusing on a modern, direct-to-consumer approach. Not only has this new strategy enabled a revised price calculation that will benefit you, the final consumer, but it also allows for the most direct and approachable system between us as the brand and you as our customers.

By working with you directly, we’ll be able to gain invaluable feedback and optimise future product development. Launching via crowdfunding allows us to connect directly with those who can help to shape the future of the brand.
Please feel free to download our Press kit below, or alternatively you can email us at:

We may be new to crowdfunding, but we have been designing, developing and manufacturing watches for over 3 decades. Our vast experience has enabled us to build strong, trusting relationships with our supplier base.

Over the last 3 years we have developed countless samples to ensure our strict quality standards can be met during a full-scale production run. To make sure lead-times are kept to a minimum, we have already placed limited order quantities on key components. This means our earliest backers can expect delivery just weeks after our campaign ends.

As an established brand, with a reputation for upholding only the highest of quality standards, we hope to offer some peace of mind when it comes to fulfilment that some other Indegogo / Kickstarter -born brands may not be able to adhere to.

By launching the ventura v-matic EGO via crowdfunding, we are able to completely re-write the rules when it comes to pricing. Not only does this direct-to-consumer model allow us to sell our watches at an incredibly competitive price-point, it also allows us to connect directly with those who can help to shape the future of the brand.

Disclaimer: UVMask is not yet FDA approved, thus not intended for medical or healthcare use. It is intended for non-medical consumer use for general protection against air pollution only. It is not intended to be used for medical purposes such as uses related to COVID-19. We do not make any anti-viral or anti-bacterial claims.

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform, not an online store. By backing this project, you are not purchasing a market-ready product, but investing in an innovative idea that will use the funds raised to develop product prototypes and acquire necessary regulatory approvals.

 

Thank you for supporting the development of UVMask: a New Kind of Wearable Personal Face Protection

UVMask is the next-generation reusable air purification face protection that's currently being developed to meet future demands. It is designed to provide up to 8-hours of daily protection.

UVMask has been designed from the ground up to help provide better daily protection, provide a comfortable wearing experience, not get in the way of conversation and effectively circulate the air you breathe away from your face.

 

UVMask In The Media
Change the filters weekly if you wear it consistently over the course of a week and daily if you are using it for multiple hours every day.

UVMask’s UV-C LEDs produce a very narrow spectrum of UV-C light, unlike the sunlight that reaches the Earth. We also use a nano-coating optical filter to filter out any potential ozone generating wavelengths.
All the UV-C light is sealed within the Sterile-Vortex, which means there is no UV-C leakage during the filtration process, and it will never reach your skin.
Although some types of UV light are capable of generating ozone (O3), a gas that naturally exists in the upper atmosphere, only UV wavelengths of 185 nm or shorter can generate ozone (source).
UVMask uses 275nm wavelength UV-C LEDs, which reliably generate a very pure and narrow range of UV-C that does not go shorter than 255nm.
UV-C at this narrow pure range has been empirically tested to be incapable of generating ozone. Each UVMask is factory-tested for its UV-C wavelength purity to ensure its high safety standard.
UVMask uses a first-of-its-kind consumer-grade UV-C light. This form of LED tech has never seen practical implementation in face mask purification.
The light intensities and time required have been too impractical to purify effectively at the speed we breathe.

Better Daily Protection 

UVMask is intended for non-medical consumer use for general protection against air pollution only. It is not intended to be used for medical purposes include any uses related to COVID-19.
All air is passed through 2 high-efficiency layers of protection:
• The first is a passive Air Filter. The advanced filtration system blocks small particles, such as dust, smoke, pollen, smoke, pollutants, and particles up to 100x smaller than a grain of flour!
• The second layer is the patent-pending Sterile Vortex, an air-purifying component powered by UV LEDs.
UVMask’s 2x UV-C LEDs provide some of the highest UV energy output on the market. Built into the Sterile Vortex, the UV-C light shines from a distance 10x closer than in other typical uses.
UVMask is equipped with a high-speed turbine fan, bringing clean fresh air into the mask with every breath.

Two high-safety standard Li-Polymer Li-Po batteries allow for up to 4-8 hours of continuous use on a single charge. UVMask’s hard shell is designed so that a possible drop or the mask being left in the car during a hot day, or using a wrong charger will not swell the battery or compromise the UV-C housing.
Extend the battery life on the go with any power bank and the included cable for continous usage.
With its fast-charging enabled USB-C port, you’ll be ready to go again.
Who thought wearing a mask was ever going to be such a big headache?

Instead of tugging on your ears, or digging into your scalp, UVMask’s O-Shape straps spread the weight thanks to their wide skin-soft silicone surface. And with an upper and lower strap, the mask is kept balanced regardless of your activity.
UVMask’s hardcover front shell is resistant to drops and scratches, protecting the filter, Sterile-Vortex, and UV-C LEDs within.
With its hardcover and tightly sealed design, you can safely use your UVMask in the rain.
UVMask’s proprietary design developed specifically for UM Systems doesn’t allow any exhaled air to go back into the environment, exposing others to risk.
Made for You. And for Everyone Else
Choose between Jet Black / Jet White / Titanium Grey
Try UVMask 'Now' on Instagram Augmented Reality Filter
Simply use your phone's camera and scan the QR code to open Instagram and see how you'd look wearing it!
UVMask is fully managed by The Crowdfunding Formula (TCF), the biggest digital marketing team responsible for the top crowdfunding campaigns. Join our campaigns in raising an average of $1.2M.

We designed Zeus Wallet with the aim to have in a single wallet all the features of other wallets on the market and we called it Zeus, because it surely is the King of all wallets.

Money clip, sliding box, blocked rfid and tracked tag in a perfect match between design and technology.
column3: showinfo=0"">
column12:
s=78dd7d91f5b71a3531c54ce8c3113639"" src=""""/>

 

The distinctive feature of Zeus Wallet is its magnetic mechanism.

With a simple movement of the hand, the cards come out like a pack of cards and are easy to retrieve.

Zeus Wallet is very light thanks to its special aluminum alloy but, at the same time, it is resistant to corrosion and carefully tested against impacts.
column19:
s=ed91a02da7241848d66ce68f12b68e2c"" src=""""/>

 

The internal components will never break as it does not have any. Zeus Wallet is free of any type of mechanism subject to wear and thanks to its innovative magnetic closure, this wallet is guaranteed for life!

If you are wondering how many cards you can bring with your Zeus Wallet, please keep in mind that you are the one who decides. In fact, thanks to its modular system, your Zeus Wallet can have as many layers as you wish, thus adapting its thickness according to your needs.

For example, if you go out for a jog, you can even bring a single layer and minimize the thickness of your Zeus Wallet.

If, on the other hand, you have to face a long journey, you can add more layers in order to have extra credit cards with you.

column1: We know that in the past other manufacturers have tried to make a magnetic wallet but Customers had the unpleasant surprise of finding all the credit cards demagnetized.
Zeus Wallet is designed to be safe for magnetic stripe technology. As you can see, we have positioned the magnets inside a particular casing, which makes them safe, and, above all, invisible!
Every day we are forced to carry many objects...smartphones, keys, laptops, earphones and it is easy to lose something.

The chances of losing Zeus Wallet are practically impossible. It has a special layer with an active tracker tag that will synchronize with your smartphone to protect you from any theft or accidental loss.

Thanks to the light and sound signal, you can easily find your Zeus Wallet when you leave it out of its place. Just activate the search function from your Smartphone and you will find it in a few moments.

column8:
s=3a786b626454868d9205c025f5ee3d4d"" src=""""/>

 

Thanks to the easy free app available for IOS or Android, you can configure all the alarms you want in order to be notified every time you move away from your Zeus wallet.

 

 

 

You can receive automatic alerts when you move away from Zeus Wallet. Any distance between (2-8 m) can be specified for automatic alerts.

 

 

You do not have to worry if you do not remember the place where you left your Zeus wallet.

The smartphone automatically records its last position and will provide you with the information needed to start looking for it. 

 

 

If you forgot your phone somewhere, it will be easy to find it. Simply press the button embedded in the layer tag to immediately ring your phone.
column16:
>Zeus immune to all RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) attacks.

Zeus Wallet is made of a particular Aluminum (Aluminum 606 T6) which offers RFID-skimming protection by blocking 100% of the signals.

Even the most modern thieves will not be able to steal your personal data anymore and you can finally walk without worrying about someone reading your data.
column23:
s=429c1fb2270e9e903a058af72e89d47c"" src=""""/>

 

However, if you want even more space and you also want to carry keys, coins, SD cards, or your business cards, you cannot miss the innovative sliding box layer, practical, thin but still very roomy.
column31: >Thanks to the money clip, you can store banknotes in the lower part of your Zeus Wallet without increasing its thickness
column38: s=3f85fc306577073002ad544da267f75a"" src=""""/>
column46: >You will be able to easily identify and grab the card you need and then put it back in the order you prefer
column54: >Each single layer can store a maximum of two credit cards
column56: >Only adds 0.3mm / 0.01in to the total thickness
column63:
s=49cb501267e211a66dc321c5d1df8be1"" src=""""/>

 

It is very easy to store cards in your Zeus Wallet and you will not have to worry about dropping them. Zeus Wallet is carefully designed and thanks to the security support present on all the layers your cards will never fall to the ground, so you will decide when to extract what you need.
column64:
>The upper Pattern is really cool and has been designed to favor a secure grip on the wallet

 

We wanted to make a wallet able to withstand the most difficult conditions and therefore we decided to use a single material.

Zeus wallet is entirely made of 6061 anodized aluminum, without any plastic insert or other fragile material.

After its realization, each Zeus Wallet is enriched with a particular hard anodizing process able to resist any type of scratch.
column65: >Choose the colour you like the most, or choose more than one colour in order to have a different Zeus Wallet at any occasion.
column72:
s=a860f4122fdc594781b617ef445d8e21"" src=""""/>

column2: D project that combines design and advanced technology that makes the mask safe and sustainable. And with the devices integrated into the PRO version, your CLIU comes to life.

column1: From the anti-fog and pollution protection, passing through a lightweight design. Everything you need in one cool product.

Thanks to the collaboration of the Spin-off of the University of Siena, we are working to create a special filtering system which, in addition to allowing easy breathing, is able to retain PM 2.5 particles. All with full environmental sustainability.
To charge your CLIU and much more: discover the special Base on Cliu website

Staff and partners are the soul of your organization. Taking care of them means transmitting values that go beyond profit. CLIU allows you to customize your masks by giving style and safety to the people who best represent your brand. Restart with your original mask.
100 _ LAST 3 AVAILABLE
The working prototype in our hands is something incredible and exciting for us.

The result is a light, comfortable, safe, and cool product. The prototype not only respected all the aesthetic parts but thanks to your feedback on the measurements, we were also able to introduce an innovation in the ergonomic part to adapt the mask to the face of each, maintaining a very high level of protection. At the same time, we improved the breathability thanks to the increased surface of the filters. All these are fundamental features for normal daily use of the CLIU mask.
We worked also on the band’s design, reducing the bulk behind the head and further improving the easy fit.
Here we share with you some images of the first CLIU prototype.
At CLIU we have decided to commit ourselves to tackling climate change and contribute to the achievement of three different sustainable development goals (SDGs).
column2:
>


In addition to our commitment to the three SDGs, we have decided to make a small contribution to preventing the impact of throwaway masks on the environment. 

When the campaign launched on Indiegogo will reach 20.000 pieces sold, CLIU will co-finance the installation of a Blue Barrier at one of the most important rivers in Italy: the Arno, which runs from Florence to Pisa through all Tuscany. 

In partnership with:

Discover more here

column1: Most of the project is developed during 2020. In 2021 the installation of the great barrier on the river in Tuscany will take place, and obviously the great (and safe) community party in Florence.

From the milestone useful to production, up to the achievement of various objectives that bring benefit to everyone and also to the environment.

column2: >Introducing the stunning DC-3 Mk ll from watch designer Terrence Ray

column1: After the successful launch of the STROND DC-3 mark 1,  we are going to be launching right here on Indiegogo the much anticipated vintage DC-3 Mkll  pilots watch.
Limited Edition with Swiss movement......limited to only 1930 pieces

We get our inspiration for this new range, as with our first range, from the classic instrument panels of the WORLD FAMOUS Douglas DC-3 aeroplane, made famous over the last 80 years, and in films such as ""Raiders of the lost Arc"" and flown by James Bond in the film ""Quantum of Solace"" !

 

This time round we are using the renowned Swiss Ronda movement coupled with the British vintage design, and again  (for the last time) are using the material from an original DC-3 aeroplane to make the metal tags which you see on the dial.

 

So again for watch enthusiasts &
column2:
aviation lovers we are giving people the opportunity to wear a piece of history. Each watch will be made with a metal tag in the 6 hour position made from the wing of a 1940's DC-3, with the plane identification number NC - 16007 engraved onto the tag itself !

 

This is the last offering for a DC-3 inspired watch, no more models are going to be made, so this is the last chance to grab a piece of the history !

 

WEAR THE HISTORY

column1: We feel that it is nice to be wearing a piece of history and hope you can support us in bring this project to life, as there will be more classic designs and even more utilising of classic 1930's - 1940's vintage aircraft in our timepieces !

First of all we would like to say ""thank you"" very much indeed"" to all our backers who in 2020 supported us on the launch of our first range. It really was a tough year for us all, with most of us feeling the restrictions of this terrible pandemic, so thank you all so much for backing us!

With the kind support of our  original backers on our first campaign, we really got off to a flying start,(pardon the pun) and launched in 2020.  We managed to get the first range out as planned at the end of November 2020, although it was a bit of a challenge at times with Covid19 in full swing ,which did affect the supply of the movement and delivery,  however we are glad to say that we managed to keep things on schedule.

So now we offer this exciting new model, the DC-3 Mk ll 

 

Classic styling, with a generous 42mm case, SWISS MADE movement, all stainless steel case , sapphire glass, and comes with both a vintage Italian leather strap &
The movement we are using in this timepiece is the gold plated Swiss made Ronda movement.
Power saving mechanism with pulled out stem: Reduction of consumption approximately 70%

We put our heart and soul into the design and creation of our watches, and spend a lot of time in the whole process, so that the STROND brand will go from strength to strength, making our brand stand out !
Firstly the concept drawings for the new STROND range were made.
Then we move onto the detailed technical drawings
Next we had the 2D CAD images made up
The above images are CAD images and were used in conjunction with the technical drawing to make the  prototypes. Shown for demonstration purposes !
So much to say just on the dial !
We designed the dial so that no only is it in keeping with vintage 1940's styling, but the 2 sub-dials are very reminiscent of 1940's altitude metres.
OK, so lets look at the 2 sub-dials.  The function of the top &
column2: bottom dials are used as a stop watch.

column1: The top Dial........When used as a stop watch, the top dial acts as a 30min counter and a 12 hour counter.  So the top dial has 2 hands, the larger hand tracks the minutes (30m) and the smaller hand keeps count of the hours (12h)
So you can use the watch as a stop watch, with lapping function.

column2: >CAD image used to show the sub-dial

column1: And not forgetting that the metal dial tag in the 6 hour position is made from the wing of a 1940's DC-3, with the plane identification number NC - 16007 engraved onto the tag itself !

column2: >Wing material is taken from an iconic 1940's Douglas DC3
>The all black stainless steel and bronze .......She's a real Beaut !

column1: Comes with a handmade calfskin black leather strap, and a Khaki green cotton canvas strap
The all 316 grade stainless steel version......keeping it classic!
Comes with a handmade calfskin olive green leather strap, and a Khaki green cotton canvas strap, it looks the part !
Comes with a handmade calfskin, chestnut red leather strap, and a Khaki green cotton canvas strap........vintage and classy at the same time!

column2: >The all black model option .........dark and moody !

column1: The all black model shown with the canvas strap in the above picture

So for the case back. We have engraved an image of one of the DC-3 engines and propellers onto the case back. This is a nice individual touch and gives a unique feel to your new timepiece. Around the outer rim of the case back is where you will find engraved your serial number as well as other details such as Swiss movement, sapphire glass ect......

 

We chose a brushed  316 grade stainless steel case and case back for the DC3 Mkll as this is in keeping with the STROND brand, and when done right gives a really nice sheen to the watch.
Your new STROND timepiece comes with 2 lovely vintage watch straps
A vintage calfskin handmade leather strap with:
All our straps are hand made, oil tanned vintage style leather straps, with neat x2 stitching

This is a really nice looking cotton canvas strap, with a roller buckle and quick release spring bars for easy removal of the strap. Most canvas straps are nylon made, but we chose cotton canvas, which is in keeping with the era !

Boy do we an amazing 1940's vintage leather strap for those who take advantage of this upgrade .  A one off bespoke leather strap made from original aged 1940's Swiss ammo bags, made by English master craftsman Peter Robson.  Each piece is 100% hand made by Peter from original 1940's leather ammo bags. As you can see from the photo below, they really are amazing and will set your watch apart form others !

column2: >Hand made strap, made from 1940's Swiss ammo bags by master leather craftsmen !

column1: NOTE: Each strap will have the numbering  DC-3 and the STROND logo embossed onto the strap . Please keep in mind that each strap is cut from 1940's ammo bags, and no 2 pieces will be the same and, so may vary in shade (from reddish brown to dark chocolate brown)  and in texture from strap to strap, and have the markings which the bag may have picked up over time , however, we feel that's whats adds nostalgia to the strap !
Each strap will come with quick release spring bars and a roller buckle.
* Swiss made gold plated  Ronda 3520D quartz movement
* Strap 1: vintage calf skin leather (with quick release spring bar)
* Strap 2: vintage cotton canvas (with quick release spring bar)
*  Power saving mechanism with pulled out stem: Reduction of consumption approximately 70%
* Limited Edition:  Limited to only 1930 pieces

column2: >Luminous hands, hour and minute markers

column1: One of the longest-used airliners ever, the Douglas DC-3 nears 80 years in the air as an aviation icon.
​The Douglas DC-3 is universally recognised as the greatest airplane of its time, some would argue that it is the greatest of all time……..

The Douglas Aircraft Company built the ""Douglas Commercial 3"" and was based on the 1933/34 Douglas DC-1 and DC-2.  Design work began in 1934 and he DC-3 debuted in the mid-1930's as an aviation rock star.

THE FIRST FLIGHT December 17, 1935, was a sunny but cool afternoon in Santa Monica, California. The holidays were coming and spirits were high in the Douglas Aircraft Company. It was another ordinary day at Clover Field, a big polished propeller caught the sun’s light as it began to turn.

Slowly it revolved and then a belch of blue-white smoke appeared. The engine roared into life, and the propeller was lost in its own motion. A second propeller came to life. For a few minutes, the engines roared and then the plane began to move forward.

 

With its two powerful propeller engines it revolutionised the travel industry by cutting typical coast-to-coast flight time across the United States from 25 hours to just 18.

 

​Pilots, both military and civilian, loved the DC-3. It took off easily, cruised comfortably at 185 mph at 10,000 feet, and had a ceiling of 23,200 feet and a low stalling speed (67 mph). Pilots said it landed itself, and it had a cruising range of 1,500–2,100 miles.

 

When production of the DC-3 ended in 1945, more than 13,000 of them had been built. The DC-3’s ease of handling and maintenance, its facility at taking off and landing on short runways, and its remarkable reliability combined to keep it flying in many regions of the world into the 21st century.

James Bond flies the Gooney Bird (DC-3) in 2008.  A Gooney Bird helped James Bond get out of a jam........Fans of the Bond film ""Quantum of Solace,"" may recall actor Daniel Craig in the cockpit of a beat-up DC-3 fighting off a Marchetti plane......see the video clip below.

https://youtu.be/NZqbvJ-IBx8

 

Indiana Jones flies the DC-3

Back in the 1980s, a DC-3 served another movie franchise hero, in ""Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade,"" Indy flies from New York to Newfoundland to the Azores and Europe on his quest for the Holy Grail.

Our partnered manufacturer follows strict procedures to ensure the quality of the watches they produce. Generally, those procedures can be divided into three parts: Technical Control Check, Quality Assurance Check and Final Quality Check.

We stand firmly behind our products and are committed to giving a great service. Each STROND watch comes with a limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of 2 years after purchase.

We are going to randomly pick out one of our bakers who will receive this stunning vintage pilots Jacket, which will complement YOUR new STROND timepiece. It will be sent to you in your size.............all the best guys !

Watch designer Terrence Ray has been designing timepieces for a number of years and has worked in joint collaborations and designs with a number of watchmakers. Terrence was the designer for the Aston Martin tourbillon, designed as timepiece to celebrate the release of the new Aston Martin Valkyrie super car and presented to the design director of Aston Martin himself at their headquarters in Gaydon, Warwickshire.

Passionate about watches, Terrence Ray from a very early age had a keen interest in timepieces and at the age of just ten travelled half way across London on his own, taking 2 bus rides in order to purchase his first timepiece, and form that moment on Terrence became a bit of a collector of unique timepieces. So it goes without saying that Terrence later on in life became interested in Horology and subsequently gravitated towards designing watches himself.
Terrence Ray has now launched the new vintage STROND brand, with the release of the eagerly anticipated DC-3 Series.

For supporting us in bringing our brand to life ALL BACKERS will become ""founder members"" of STROND and will gain access into the departure lounge on our website which will give you access to all future releases at a good discount price, as well as a ""heads-up"" on new designs and the launch of any new models !

This is a really nice looking cotton canvas strap, with a roller buckle and quick release spring bars for easy removal of the strap. Most canvas straps are nylon made, but we chose cotton canvas, which is in keeping with the era !

Boy do we an amazing 1940's vintage leather strap for those who take advantage of this upgrade .  A one off bespoke leather strap made from original aged 1940's Swiss ammo bags, made by English master craftsman Peter Robson.  Each piece is 100% hand made by Peter from original 1940's leather ammo bags. As you can see from the photo below, they really are amazing and will set your watch apart form others !
Hand made strap, made from 1940's Swiss ammo bags by master leather craftsmen !

NOTE: Each strap will have the numbering  DC-3 and the STROND logo embossed onto the strap . Please keep in mind that each strap is cut from 1940's ammo bags, and no 2 pieces will be the same and, so may vary in shade (from reddish brown to dark chocolate brown)  and in texture from strap to strap, and have the markings which the bag may have picked up over time , however, we feel that's whats adds nostalgia to the strap !
Each strap will come with quick release spring bars and a roller buckle.
* Swiss made gold plated  Ronda 3520D quartz movement
*  Luminescent: Hands, hour makers, minute markers
* Strap 1: vintage calf skin leather (with quick release spring bar)
* Strap 2: vintage cotton canvas (with quick release spring bar)
*  Power saving mechanism with pulled out stem: Reduction of consumption approximately 70%
* Limited Edition:  Limited to only 1930 pieces

One of the longest-used airliners ever, the Douglas DC-3 nears 80 years in the air as an aviation icon.
​The Douglas DC-3 is universally recognised as the greatest airplane of its time, some would argue that it is the greatest of all time……..

The Douglas Aircraft Company built the ""Douglas Commercial 3"" and was based on the 1933/34 Douglas DC-1 and DC-2.  Design work began in 1934 and he DC-3 debuted in the mid-1930's as an aviation rock star.

THE FIRST FLIGHT December 17, 1935, was a sunny but cool afternoon in Santa Monica, California. The holidays were coming and spirits were high in the Douglas Aircraft Company. It was another ordinary day at Clover Field, a big polished propeller caught the sun’s light as it began to turn.

Slowly it revolved and then a belch of blue-white smoke appeared. The engine roared into life, and the propeller was lost in its own motion. A second propeller came to life. For a few minutes, the engines roared and then the plane began to move forward. With its two powerful propeller engines it revolutionised the travel industry by cutting typical coast-to-coast flight time across the United States from 25 hours to just 18. ​Pilots, both military and civilian, loved the DC-3. It took off easily, cruised comfortably at 185 mph at 10,000 feet, and had a ceiling of 23,200 feet and a low stalling speed (67 mph). Pilots said it landed itself, and it had a cruising range of 1,500–2,100 miles. When production of the DC-3 ended in 1945, more than 13,000 of them had been built. The DC-3’s ease of handling and maintenance, its facility at taking off and landing on short runways, and its remarkable reliability combined to keep it flying in many regions of the world into the 21st century.

James Bond flies the Gooney Bird (DC-3) in 2008.  A Gooney Bird helped James Bond get out of a jam........Fans of the Bond film ""Quantum of Solace,"" may recall actor Daniel Craig in the cockpit of a beat-up DC-3 fighting off a Marchetti plane......see the video clip below.
https://youtu.be/NZqbvJ-IBx8 Indiana Jones flies the DC-3

Back in the 1980s, a DC-3 served another movie franchise hero, in ""Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade,"" Indy flies from New York to Newfoundland to the Azores and Europe on his quest for the Holy Grail.

Our partnered manufacturer follows strict procedures to ensure the quality of the watches they produce. Generally, those procedures can be divided into three parts: Technical Control Check, Quality Assurance Check and Final Quality Check.

We stand firmly behind our products and are committed to giving a great service. Each STROND watch comes with a limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of 2 years after purchase.

We are going to randomly pick out one of our bakers who will receive this stunning vintage pilots Jacket, which will complement YOUR new STROND timepiece. It will be sent to you in your size.............all the best guys !

Watch designer Terrence Ray has been designing timepieces for a number of years and has worked in joint collaborations and designs with a number of watchmakers. Terrence was the designer for the Aston Martin tourbillon, designed as timepiece to celebrate the release of the new Aston Martin Valkyrie super car and presented to the design director of Aston Martin himself at their headquarters in Gaydon, Warwickshire.

Passionate about watches, Terrence Ray from a very early age had a keen interest in timepieces and at the age of just ten travelled half way across London on his own, taking 2 bus rides in order to purchase his first timepiece, and form that moment on Terrence became a bit of a collector of unique timepieces. So it goes without saying that Terrence later on in life became interested in Horology and subsequently gravitated towards designing watches himself.
Terrence Ray has now launched the new vintage STROND brand, with the release of the eagerly anticipated DC-3 Series.

For supporting us in bringing our brand to life ALL BACKERS will become ""founder members"" of STROND and will gain access into the departure lounge on our website which will give you access to all future releases at a good discount price, as well as a ""heads-up"" on new designs and the launch of any new models !",65.0,0,"2 Campaigns

No mask, no problem

FasT-Masks are easy to use with a sleek, comfortable, and secure fit. They create a quick mask with no straps, bulk, or waste. Easy to store and take with you anywhere, they make complying with face-covering ordinances easy.

People have found a lot of solutions to cover your face like bandanas, neck gaiters, balaclavas, and disposable surgical masks, but none that utilize the clothing you're already wearing. With FasT-Masks you can travel light, limit waste, and ditch the hot bulky winter gear.  

 

How does it work? 

A strong but flexible polymer core with a soft and skin safe over-molded silicone insures a snug but comfortable fit. It easily clips onto the collar of any t-shirt, then pulls up over your nose to cover your face quickly.

                              

After many hours of research and development our team came up with the perfect design balancing a comfortable and secure fit, ultimately designing a product that you will barely remember is there while in use or stowed away.

                            

   

How do I use it? 

Clip FasT-Mask on to the collar of your favorite shirt, and secure over the bridge of your nose until comfortable. Its super soft, non-slip, silicone surface will ensure face protection in even the most extreme of situations.

                          

Sometimes big things come in small packages, and that's definitely the case with FasT-Mask. This small but powerful device can easily be stored in your purse or pocket and taken with you on the go. You can even leave it clipped onto your shirt for quick use but with a much more discreet profile than a neck gaiter or balaclava. 

                         

But its uses don't end there, FasT-Mask can be paired with your favorite article of clothing to help make the most comfortable and customizable face covering. The possibilities are truly endless. 

 

Environmental Impact and Our Mission! 

More than 10,000 Metric Tons of Disposable Face Masks Have Already Been Produced In the Last Year 

The creators of FasT-Mask believe this product can help eliminate the need for single use face coverings by implementing a long lasting product that seamlessly fits into the users everyday life. This is possible by designing a product that works perfectly with other articles of clothing you already own. 

 

Discarded face masks pose social and environmental risks, both short-term and long-term. 

First, chemicals contained in the masks are a potential threat to our environment. In addition to non-woven fabric and activated carbon, medical face masks also contain large amounts of polypropylene (PP), which is a type of commodity plastic that takes a long time to degrade and releases a lot of toxic substances during the process. As all face masks sold on the market must go through rigorous quality testing, it’s fair to assume that these masks won’t break down easily, and their disposal will only create negative impacts on our environment and ecosystems.

 

Discarded face masks can become floating marine debris and impact the marine ecosystems.

According to RE-THINK Taiwan, a non-profit organization that advocates and organizes beach cleanup activities, discarded face masks have been showing up on almost all beaches in Taiwan since the beginning of the pandemic, with some already estimating 4,000 to 6,000 metric tons of face mask waste to be in our oceans.

Rivers and mountainous areas are becoming dumping grounds, which not only could hinder our pandemic response efforts to properly dispose of single-use masks, but also wreak havoc on wildlife, Complicating the already difficult problem to solve, pollution. 

Even the EPA doesn't have management and surveillance systems in place that are aimed at preventing waste from entering rivers. Because of this we believe that used face masks, which could potentially help spread the virus, are not being disposed of properly. What’s more, as more people look to rural areas as their preferred travel destinations during the pandemic, large amounts of discarded face masks are also being found in those areas, severely impacting local ecosystems.

 

Product Evolution

The current version of the product is 3D printed, because of this its not possible to produce large quantities. So to show proof of concept we shipped over one hundred 3D printed units to customers that tested the product and gave us their reviews. 

We are now ready to take that feedback and launch a new and improved product able to meet everyone's face covering needs. Unlike the drawbacks typically found in 3D printed parts such as fatigue failure, deformation, and cracking our new and improved product is designed for manufacturing allowing it to be highly durable, and long lasting. This is mainly due to a change in the material of the polymer core from the 3D printed version to something like polyethylene. This change in material is possible by making the product using a technique called injection molding.  This will allow the polymer core to have a high yield strength, and resistance to deformation, minimizing fracturing and cracking, resulting in a long useful life of the product. 

 

How can I contribute to the project?

1. Select ""Get This Perk”: Select how many FasT-Masks you would like on the right side of the page. You can only select one perk per transaction so please make it count :-)

2. Payment: You will need to enter your payment details at the time of checkout.  Your card will be refunded in the event that our campaign doesn't meet the funding threshold. Shipping cost is included in all of the listed pledge amounts.

3. Color choosing: After selecting your perk use the drop down menu to pick the color/colors you'd like. FasT-Mask is currently offered in Teal, Light Blue, Deep Red, Gun Metal Grey, and Gold Yellow.

4. Shipping - We will ship worldwide. Depending on how many backers pledge will depend where I ship from. Possibly everything from the United States. Our product is so light and small they can be sent by letter which means there shouldn't be a customs tariff. If by chance you need to pay any customs then this will need to be covered by you, but as the product is super small and affordable you won't get hit with a whopping bill.

column61: >
column62:
>
 

Having lost his wallet several times, Azat (our engineering ninja) started to think about developing an easy way to find it. He felt the need even more when his 3-year old daughter hid the wallet behind the stove. He thought that it was lost, and spent more than a month getting the documents inside reissued! 

He started to search the market of wallets, but all the wallets had only a Bluetooth tracking within 20 meters.

This remains the case today.

All this led to creating the world's most powerful wallet, named Volterman, with revolutionary features and stunning design. 

Our team of experienced software and hardware engineers have spent many sleepless nights and have been working on the project for more than two years from now to come up with the final fully functional prototype —  ready for a mass production. 

The design of Volterman Wallets is created by the award-winning Backbone Branding creative design studio

column2: >With every Volterman wallet you will receive 3 types of cables for Micro USB, iPhone and C-Type connector phones and a cable to charge your wallet. All cables are made from certified producers and are attached to with magnetic connector, which makes charging easy and fun.

column15:
>

 

  • Can I order more than one wallet?
column16:
>Yes. There is no limitation for the quantity you want to order.
 

  • What versions of Bluetooth Volterman supports?
column17:
>Volterman supports versions 4.0 and above.
 

  • Can I switch off the automatic alerts when the wallet moves out of range?
column18:
>Yes, you can disable alerts and push notifications from the App.
 

  • Is it possible for the wallet to explode?
column19:
>The PCB along with the power bank inside are isolated with a very strong and resistant material (epoxide resin fusion) to keep it safe. The epoxide resin fusion doesn’t allow oxygen to get in which makes it impossible for the battery to explode or be destroyed. It’s also waterproof and it acts like a cooling system which prevents the battery from heating.
 

  • How many cards can I fit in the wallet?
column20: >It depends on what type of the wallet you choose.
column21: >The cardholder has 2 pockets for cards and 1 inner pocket. You can place up to 6 cards in it.
column22: >The bifold wallet has 6 pockets for cards and 2 inner pockets.
column23:
>The Travel wallet has many pockets for cards, 4 separate inner pockets where you can place your passport, boarding tickets, and 1 bigger inner pocket is designed for various documents that one may need while traveling.
 

  • Can the wallet hold coins?
column24:
>There is no separate pocket designed for holding coins.
 

  • How long does it take to charge the battery?
column25:
>It takes 3-4 hours to fully charge the wallet and 3-5 hours to fully charge a phone depending on a model.
 

  • How does the wallet battery work?
column26:
>Volterman wallets have a built-in power bank which can charge your phone through a cable or wirelessly. 10% of the power bank is used for the functionality of the wallet and the power bank of the wallet can be easily recharged from a wall socket or wirelessly too.
 

  • Will I be notified when the battery is low?
column27:
>Yes, when there is only 10% of charge left in the power bank, you will receive a notification to recharge your wallet. Besides this, you can track the charge of your wallet anytime from the mobile application.
 

  • Can I replace the battery?
column28:
>No, the battery is embedded in the wallet (for your security) and cannot be replaced or removed.
 

  • Is Volterman waterproof/resistant?

column1: Does it have an RFID protection for my cards?

column2:
>Yes, it has an RFID protection to keep your cards safe.
 

  • When will it be shipped?
column3:
>We plan to start shipping this batch of production on February of 2018.
 

  • What’s the size of the wallets?
column4: >The dimensions of the wallets are as follows:
column5:
>Cardholder - 10x7cm
Bifold wallet - 12x9cm
Travel wallet- 19x9cm
 

  • How much does it weigh?
column6: >The weight of the wallets are as follows:
column7:
>Cardholder - 100 grams
Bifold wallet - 120 grams
Travel wallet - 150 grams
 

  • How durable is the wallet?
column8: >Our team has been working very hard to incorporate not only a great mix of unique features into a slim and elegant wallet, but also make it very comfortable for everyday use. It's very durable as we have isolated the PCB inside with a very strong and resistant material (epoxide resin fusion) to keep it safe.

I always, always end up needing to charge my devices at the middle of the day, and guess what? I don't always have a charger with me. I've noticed that this happens to lots of people and lacks their days. This is how the idea of T E G S bag came to me.

is new unique invention that serves those who want to combine, convenience, chic and technology at once. With this smart bag that has a built-in power bank, carrier has the opportunity to charge two mobile devices at the same time. In
addition to that, mobile devices can be charged from outside the bag, through a
snap opening, and/or inside the bag.
The power bank that we are

level of the power bank and a Power Inlet to charge the power bank itself. The
process is shown in the video.

column6: >Millions of people across the globe travel via

column1: bicycle every day, and the number of bicyclist is increasing. It means
that more and more bicycle accidents occur.

automobile is the greatest fear most people have about cycling. especially, accident is fatal that occurs in the night-time because of invisibility. Most of cyclists know this hazard, so they usually put a LED lamp on their bike and shining stuff on their body.
We wonder why it is, and finally found out the fundamental cause: There isn't any communication between car driver and bicyclist.

Therefore, we invented communication tool, which is LED direction signal that cyclist can control in accordance with where they are going. Once car drivers see the signal, They can decide how to drive. We used 'Bluetooth technology' so that any wire never annoy the cyclist.
It was not enough. We thought that it should be more enjoyable experience so that every body finds it in their heart to have it. We decided to convert this technological tool into fashion.

Millions of people across the globe travel via bicycle or scooter everyday. Given the growing number of people who use these modes of transport, demand to improve safety on the roads is on the rise.

Through its innovative design and technology, the main goal of SEIL is to make your daily commute safer and easier. The next step chapter for the SEIL bag will be an exciting one, but first we need you to help us bring it to the global  market.
Ourgoal is to raise $100,000 USD to manufacture this product on a mass scale. Every dollar raised over this amount will be used to upgrade and improve product design.
Reaching our goal will help us develop accessories and products alongside the SEIL bag and help us to provide more great products for riders around the globe.
1. How bright is the LED light on the SEIL bag?

This product is designed for use during dark or cloudy days to help increase the visibility of the wearer to those around. Generally, other lighting accessories can be attached to the bicycle to enhance security. Our focus is on the individual biker, itself.
2. Is the SEIL bag water resistant?
Yes, this bag has been made with water resistant components. However, it cannot be used under water or during water-related activities.
module be separated from the SEIL bag?
separated from the SEIL bag. We also offer a special wiring kit  for attaching it to any other bag.
4. When will I receive my SEIL bag?
After we achieve our campaign goal, we will ship the product as soon as production is completed.
5. Is there a wholesale price list?
Any orders for up to 100 units can be placed right here on the campaign site.
column5: >If a larger order is needed or for larger quantity pricing, please email us directly.

column1: 6. Is SEIL looking for global partners?
Yes! We are always looking for the right partner.
","Millions of people across the globe travel via
bicycle every day, and the number of bicyclist is increasing. It means
that more and more bicycle accidents occur.

automobile is the greatest fear most people have about cycling. especially, accident is fatal that occurs in the night-time because of invisibility. Most of cyclists know this hazard, so they usually put a LED lamp on their bike and shining stuff on their body.
However, the accident still happens. Why?
We wonder why it is, and finally found out the fundamental cause: There isn't any communication between car driver and bicyclist.

Therefore, we invented communication tool, which is LED direction signal that cyclist can control in accordance with where they are going. Once car drivers see the signal, They can decide how to drive. We used 'Bluetooth technology' so that any wire never annoy the cyclist.
It was not enough. We thought that it should be more enjoyable experience so that every body finds it in their heart to have it. We decided to convert this technological tool into fashion.
And if it's fashion, it should be chic.
So The SEIL (Safe Enjoyable Interactive Light) bag has been born.

Originally developed in 2010, the SEIL bag has been continuously improved over the past 5 years, making it the highest quality product of its kind on the market. Though it has been copied, it is the only such product that has been on the market and in finalized development since 2010.
Direction signals and short messages can be shown via the wireless controller
controller, you can communicate traffic signals and direction of travel (right,
left) or express a cyclist's mood or feelings. The SEIL-APP can be used to
custom design emotions. Both transmit images to the bag's color LED display.
Upgraded!SIEL bag says what you said.
The app can create custom messages through voice-recognition
– the highest quality LED display, with various color options.
The 15 x 9 RGB LED unit is 120 x 110 x 8 mm (4.7 x 4.3 x 0.3 in) in size and weighs 140g . It has a 1500 mAh Li-ion battery that lasts a minimum of 24 hours between charges.

is used to activate a left or right direction arrow shape via Bluetooth4.0. Its 450 mAh battery lasts 24 hours between charges. Additional buttons on the top can display a stop/emergency symbol or simple custom messages or alerts.
