DiveBack, the first GPS for scuba divers
Have you dragged your flippers across several
seas and oceans? Have you also seen wonderful things, and experienced fabulous
diver, like us. And like us, you may have felt completely lost on several
occasions, not knowing where your boat was. Like us, like all divers, you dream
of not having to worry about the navigation of your diving and to freely and
for divers came on the way back from a diving cruise in the Red Sea, when no
one was able to find the boat ! Eduardo and Bertrand decided to design
DiveBack. Bertrand had worked for a company specialized in the construction of
civil and military submarines. The company attached buoys to submarines, which
enabled radio communication when they emerged. They decided to use a SIMILAR
system to provide divers with GPS data/navigation.
months and carrying out tests in the sea, they designed a prototype. Every time
they used it, DiveBack got them back to the boat
easy to use, you just need to memorize the boat’s GPS position before getting
in the water. Then, simply enjoy your aquatic stroll. At some point, you’ll
want to go back to the boat, and perhaps you won’t know exactly where you are.
No worries in that case! Even if you are 60 feet under the surface, you can
just release the DiveBack antenna-buoy. It will quickly indicate the direction
and distance from your boat. Whatever the configuration and the visibility
conditions, DiveBack will provide you with the most direct route to your boat.
DiveBack is very useful in case of reduced visibility
(lots of divers have already experienced that !), because you can
find the boat even if it is invisible under water. DiveBack can also be very
useful for the scientists, who will need to note the GPS address of objects and
studied places, without having to resurface.
and Hong Kong and a scuba diving monitor. He as been working  for more than 20 years in the
development and manufacturing of consumer electronics and computers which are
sold in mass-market retailing. His idea of creating a Scuba-diving GPS was born
nearly 10 years ago, and he took time to mature his project to develop it at an
is a product designer and a diver.
He has been friend with Eduardo for many years. He designed DiveBack.
DiveBack and launch mass production to enable thousands of divers to enjoy
their aquatic strolls freely.<span> And that is why we need you !

We need help from you all : if it is
impossible for you to invest money in this project, do not hesitate to
communicate, to talk about it around you, to your friend divers, your diving
club, or to underwater photographers and reporters you may know.
a DIVING accessory that is easy to carry, either attached to a carabiner or
slid in the stab pocket (diameter: 3.9 in and thickness: 2.5 in). Its body
consists of a very powerful satellite receiver with an interface made of a
liquid crystal screen and four control buttons. Around this GPS, a drum with a
handle allows the diver to unwind up to 60 feet of cable which connects the
floating antenna to the DiveBack device as you dive. A rotary axis provided
with a grip will allow the simple and fast rolling-up of the cable after its
use. The detachable lid contains the satellite antenna of the GPS. Filled with
air, it contains a reserve that acts as a buoy to unwind the cable and maintain
the antenna on the surface during its use. A rechargeable battery (10 hours of
useful capacity) feeds the GPS. A ring allows divers to fix
DiveBack to any system of attachment.
Many Thanks to Alexandra to have lent her
attractive voice to the presentation movie !

       Hair colorists work long hours creating beautiful hair colors. They post pictures of their work online to attract more clients locally and never divulge formulas. But The Formula Shop would like those hair colorists to make as much money as possible on their amazing formulas while also democratizing hair color education and making this world a more beautiful place to live.
 
      Until now, hair color education has been dominated by the largest color companies who are pushing their products. But we see beautiful colors uploaded everyday on social media and we believe those hair color masters are just as valuable as educators. Even more valuable because they will tell us what products work best for a desired effect without any brand loyalty sullying their message. The entire hair color industry will benefit from a sharing of this knowledge and expertise. And we want to build an online community to help hair colorists share it while maximizing their incomes infinitely.
 
       Celebrity colorists sell their formulas. They recognize their value and have assigned  a dollar amount to them. We would like the hair color artists amazing us daily on social media to do the same. Hair colorists could be selling each of their formulas globally for weeks, months, even years after their client has left the salon. On the flip side, colorists who have never experimented with a certain color before can go straight online to their colleagues and pay them for expertise. 
 
     The Formula Shop is on a mission to stomp out bad hair color and get everyday master colorists the kind of financial reward they deserve for all their talent, creativity and awesomeness. We want to build online marketplace and community where colorists can get some much-needed hair color real talk about which products and methods work best to create all of the loveliness we are seeing in the hair color industry today. Please help us do this.

column2:
>We are a contemporary design company creating a range of fairly priced, minimalist design, high quality leather products for the modern, discerning professional. 

Through this campaign, we bring to you our first product, the Personalisable Soft Briefcase.
column5: >What is so special about the RockDove Briefcase?
column7: >From the onset, we have been committed to using the very best materials for RockDove.
column10: > uses full-grain leather, which is the strongest and most premium part of the hide and maintains the natural look and feel of leather.
column11: >Despite being significantly more time-consuming and expensive than chrome-tanned leather, we have chosen the more environmentally-friendly, artisanal vegetable-tanned leather for our products. Tanned using a blend of tannins from chestnut, mimosa and tara tree barks, our leather has a rich fragrance and develops a beautiful patina over time.
column13: >In order to ensure optimal reliability, the Soft Briefcase features premium
column17: >. Riri® is a Swiss brand which makes very high quality metal zips in Italy. Some say it trumps on quality over all other brands like YKK and Ideal.
column19: >For lining fabric, we have used a Cordura® brand Nylon Oxford 500D dust and water resistant nylon fabric. Using Nylon provides durability and flexibility without deformation. Cordura® is a well known American brand which manufactures high quality fabrics used in many luxury brands.
column21: >Additionally, all handles and structure of the briefcase are made to hold in excess of 22 kg with all stress points double stitched to avoid failure during usage.
column22:
>It's Personalisable:

In pursuit of creating a unique user experience for our leather bags, we have integrated customisation unlike any other leather briefcase to suit your individual needs.  Along with choosing leather colour: you may also choose the inlay fabric's colour, gold or silver finish metal hardware as well as the embossed signature. 

Our soft briefcase features a modular section that allows users to interchange two removable utility modules based on their unique lifestyle requirements. Users may choose between five different module designs with each offering a varied function.
column24: >These modules are also detachable and use magnetic buttons for support, which allows them to be carried independently of the briefcase as well.
column27: >choose between gold or silver plating
column28: > for the metal hardware such as loops, buckles, buttons and zips. Our default design is with a
column30: > but you may decide which given option reflects your aesthetic sense better.
column32:
> 

If you would prefer an alternative to the standard Venetian Red colour for the lining fabric, we offer you an option to choose from either Emerald or Smoke. Any of these three colours will bring out the accents in your personalised briefcase.
column33:
>

 

As a thank you for your support, we offer to emboss your name or initials, depending on your selection, at a preset position at the back of your personalised briefcase.
column34: >Soft Briefcase At a Glance
column36:
>

 

HOW TO PERSONALISE YOUR BRIEFCASE:
column39:
>

 

DELIVERY SCHEDULE
column41:
>THE TEAM

We are a passionate group of designers and engineers, who’ve come together to create a suite of luxury leather products that compliment the modern lifestyle whilst retaining the essence and elegance of an age old craft.
column43:
CHALLENGES

In making any RockDove product, we have to deal with an extensive supply chain network, comprising of multiple vendors across geographic locations. Although our previous professional experiences have made us adept at project management, we are still limited by external factors such as the availability of materials, lead times and force majeure. We have however identified our supply chain partners based on their experience, professionalism and skill and will work to ensure that we manage all external issues effectively and efficiently.

Working with full grain leather offers a unique challenge where each leather skin is different. With unique scuffs and marks, being the natural characteristics of this type of leather, our challenge is to source materials with consistency in their look so all our products have the same texture. Our partner tanneries are all international quality certified and have extensive quality controls in place, including visual inspection of every hide at different stage of the production process.

In addition to quality controls set up by our tannery partners, we will also set up an internal quality control mechanism where our team will inspect every piece in order to mitigate the risk of a defective piece making it through the supply chain. 

 

OUR STORY

A lot of great companies today started off with making products completely different from their current offering, such as Fortune500 company 3m, which was founded to mine corundum and now makes anything but that. We at RockDove also have a similar story to share, and with your support we hope to reach a similar happy ending.

Our journey started with developing of a tracking chip embedded in premium leather products. Along the way, however, it was the leather manufacturing and designing which we really developed a combined passion for. After launching our first crowdfunding campaign and developing an amazingly supportive community, we realised that the future of RockDove lies in the striving to bring luxury leather products at non-luxury prices to the market.

It has been over a year since we have been speaking to hundreds of individuals globally, sharing our ideas and prototypes and understanding what people really want in their ideal work bag. And at the core of our finding is this: people have widely varying lifestyles and requirements from their work bag, and rarely do they find a bag that matches their needs exactly. And for these discerning professionals, we have designed a premium quality bag that they can personalise to meet their individual needs and aesthetics.

Rock Dove Soft Briefcase is how we envisioned a Soft Briefcase  to be, and we are proud to present what he had set out to create.

 

PRESS KIT:

We are extremely excited to present RockDove to the press. It is only because of enthusiasts and reporters that we can rely on to amplify the message of RockDove. We welcome any questions and will try our best to promptly respond. Please send all queries to sara@rockdovedesign.com.

 

 

","We are a contemporary design company creating a range of fairly priced, minimalist design, high quality leather products for the modern, discerning professional. Through this campaign, we bring to you our first product, the Personalisable Soft Briefcase.  What is so special about the RockDove Briefcase?Its Materials:From the onset, we have been committed to using the very best materials for RockDove. RockDove Briefcase uses full-grain leather, which is the strongest and most premium part of the hide and maintains the natural look and feel of leather. Despite being significantly more time-consuming and expensive than chrome-tanned leather, we have chosen the more environmentally-friendly, artisanal vegetable-tanned leather for our products. Tanned using a blend of tannins from chestnut, mimosa and tara tree barks, our leather has a rich fragrance and develops a beautiful patina over time.  In order to ensure optimal reliability, the Soft Briefcase features premium Riri® zips and gold and silver-plated hardware. Riri® is a Swiss brand which makes very high quality metal zips in Italy. Some say it trumps on quality over all other brands like YKK and Ideal.   For lining fabric, we have used a Cordura® brand Nylon Oxford 500D dust and water resistant nylon fabric. Using Nylon provides durability and flexibility without deformation. Cordura® is a well known American brand which manufactures high quality fabrics used in many luxury brands.  Additionally, all handles and structure of the briefcase are made to hold in excess of 22 kg with all stress points double stitched to avoid failure during usage.It's Personalisable:In pursuit of creating a unique user experience for our leather bags, we have integrated customisation unlike any other leather briefcase to suit your individual needs.  Along with choosing leather colour: you may also choose the inlay fabric's colour, gold or silver finish metal hardware as well as the embossed signature. Our soft briefcase features a modular section that allows users to interchange two removable utility modules based on their unique lifestyle requirements. Users may choose between five different module designs with each offering a varied function.   These modules are also detachable and use magnetic buttons for support, which allows them to be carried independently of the briefcase as well.  You may also choose between gold or silver plating for the metal hardware such as loops, buckles, buttons and zips. Our default design is with a silver finish but you may decide which given option reflects your aesthetic sense better. If you would prefer an alternative to the standard Venetian Red colour for the lining fabric, we offer you an option to choose from either Emerald or Smoke. Any of these three colours will bring out the accents in your personalised briefcase.  As a thank you for your support, we offer to emboss your name or initials, depending on your selection, at a preset position at the back of your personalised briefcase.  Soft Briefcase At a Glance  HOW TO PERSONALISE YOUR BRIEFCASE: REWARDS DELIVERY SCHEDULETHE TEAMWe are a passionate group of designers and engineers, who’ve come together to create a suite of luxury leather products that compliment the modern lifestyle whilst retaining the essence and elegance of an age old craft.  RISKS & CHALLENGESIn making any RockDove product, we have to deal with an extensive supply chain network, comprising of multiple vendors across geographic locations. Although our previous professional experiences have made us adept at project management, we are still limited by external factors such as the availability of materials, lead times and force majeure. We have however identified our supply chain partners based on their experience, professionalism and skill and will work to ensure that we manage all external issues effectively and efficiently.Working with full grain leather offers a unique challenge where each leather skin is different. With unique scuffs and marks, being the natural characteristics of this type of leather, our challenge is to source materials with consistency in their look so all our products have the same texture. Our partner tanneries are all international quality certified and have extensive quality controls in place, including visual inspection of every hide at different stage of the production process.In addition to quality controls set up by our tannery partners, we will also set up an internal quality control mechanism where our team will inspect every piece in order to mitigate the risk of a defective piece making it through the supply chain.  OUR STORYA lot of great companies today started off with making products completely different from their current offering, such as Fortune500 company 3m, which was founded to mine corundum and now makes anything but that. We at RockDove also have a similar story to share, and with your support we hope to reach a similar happy ending.Our journey started with developing of a tracking chip embedded in premium leather products. Along the way, however, it was the leather manufacturing and designing which we really developed a combined passion for. After launching our first crowdfunding campaign and developing an amazingly supportive community, we realised that the future of RockDove lies in the striving to bring luxury leather products at non-luxury prices to the market.It has been over a year since we have been speaking to hundreds of individuals globally, sharing our ideas and prototypes and understanding what people really want in their ideal work bag. And at the core of our finding is this: people have widely varying lifestyles and requirements from their work bag, and rarely do they find a bag that matches their needs exactly. And for these discerning professionals, we have designed a premium quality bag that they can personalise to meet their individual needs and aesthetics.Rock Dove Soft Briefcase is how we envisioned a Soft Briefcase  to be, and we are proud to present what he had set out to create. PRESS KIT:We are extremely excited to present RockDove to the press. It is only because of enthusiasts and reporters that we can rely on to amplify the message of RockDove. We welcome any questions and will try our best to promptly respond. Please send all queries to sara@rockdovedesign.com.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: We are Loirus Co. That project was started in the mind of a men of 17 years old who gets the conclusion that the big enterprises were not using fair prices, so people who can not spend money in accesories, like watches, can not wear the nice complements that they really would like to wear. So he started Loirus Co with the purpose to give fair prices and best quality to the world.
We want to Help people, we want TRUE revolutions.

We know that you have heard this so many times, and we will explain why we are on Indiegogo. We need to grow fast. When we started selling, all the customers sent us congratulations messages, so we know that we had to keep growing as fast as possible. All we had was the money of the sells, we invest it in improving the product and in social media marketing, the CEO of the company sold his personal things, and put all the money he had on the enterprise for keep making people hear about us. We did it, we were growing every day, but we have to grow as fast as possible, and we need your help!

We need your help for growing faster, now are coming new watches models, but we need your contribution for make people know that we are here, that we have quality products, fair prices, and really talented and trained people working day and night, we need your help for shouting louder and let the world hear about us.
We started by watches and we have in mind to transmit the philosophy of ""best quality, fair prices"" to other products in the future.

If we reach the funding, we will spend part of the money in social media marketing, because our preference was have really quality products, so we invest the biggest part of out money improving the products.

Investing the money in the Social Media Marketing methods we have been testing succesfully, will increase the velocity of our growth, so we will be ready for start producing other products and selling them around the world too.

We have to compete with big enterprises who don't want company's like us hitting the prices, but we have the mission to gives every body fair prices, and no body won't shut up us. And that is why we need your cooperation. We want to keep on moving with this revolution, we love that people feels identified with us, we love our customers and thats the way we want to welcome them.
Band Material: Italian Leather /  Carbon Stainless Steel

Red Helen has been playing shows and selling merch all over South Africa for many years now but one merch item that we've never been able to do is hoodies!

Many of our fans have asked us: ""Why don't you guys ever get hoodies made?!"" Well, there is one very simple, but very good, reason for this - having hoodies done is very expensive - we just don't have the money up front to buy them and have them printed.
With your help, this campaign will solve this problem and we can finally make the fans, as well as the band's, dream come true!

Step 1 - Go to the 'Perks' section and claim the perk with the amount of hoodies you want to buy
Step 2 - Select your size/s
Step 3 - Enter your payment details and select shipping options
Step 4 - Get 49 more people to pre-order a hoodie
Step 5 - We get the hoodies printed and delivered to your doorstep
To keep the costs relatively low, we need to order in bulk.
We need your help to get at least 50 people to buy one hoodie or more. The more hoodies you buy, the more perks you get.
How much money do we need to raise?

In order to cover costs AND have at least a couple more printed to sell at shows, we need to sell them for R450 per hoodie. This works out to R22 500 for 50 hoodies. With the current exchange rate, it's  about $1750.

Please remember NONE of this money goes into our own pockets. Everything we make goes straight back into the band in order to print more merch. We only mark up the prices enough to cover costs and possibly have a few more hoodies made.

You get more than just a hoodie!
The more hoodies you buy, the more perks you get. These include:
• Hard copies of the album signed by each band member
If you're viewing this on mobile, scroll down to view the full list of perks.

What happens if we can't sell 50 hoodies?
You get you money back. Simple as that.
If we have to order any less than 50 hoodies it'll shoot the pricing right up and it'll become economically unviable, so there would be no point to take your money.

What About Shipping?
Unfortunately, these prices do NOT include shipping. You can pick it up from a band member's house in Johannesburg or from any of our shows. We also have paid shipping options which you can choose at checkout.
• To pay for shipping click on ""CLAIM PERK"" in the Perks section.
• If you are based in Joburg and want to rather pick it up from a band member's house, click on ""BACK IT"" to bypass shipping fees. Please be sure to contact us and arrange a pick up.

We're all about quality so we try to order from the best, most trusted brands. 
-The physical hoodies will be ordered from Fittees. Click here for more details about the hoodie you'll be receiving.
-The printing will be done by Inner City Ink. If you liked any of the past merch we've printed then you'll love these too.
• Make a deal with your friends. If you get a few of your friends to pitch in some cash, one of you can keep the hoodie/s while the rest of you keep the perks like an album, stickers, etc.
• If you can't do that but you still will want to help, then please spread the word to as many people as possible.

This campaign is dedicated to those in need. If you're reading this, chances are that you spend more money in groceries or shopping than you do giving to charity. Thus, this company strives to merge the world of fashion and shopping with charity-giving.

As citizens in a global community, it is our privilege to give to charity. Even so, many donations to charity are improperly allocated and progress is minimal. Thus, this campaign revolves around select charities -including the Against Malaria Foundation, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative, and Deworm the World Initative- that have demonstrated outstanding efficacy. Customers will get the unique opportunity to not only purchase domestically-sourced, sustainably-made clothing from Haven, but also donate to charity alongside. Indeed, 50% of all profits from this company are allocated to the most effective charities in the world (this is the largest margin of profits ever allocated by a modern clothing company).

By simply contributing to this campaign here on Indiegogo, you are expressing that you care about charity, you care about impoverished individuals in third-world countries, you care about malnutrition, you care about chronic diseases, you care about water quality, and you believe that our world is only strong when we're united.

Every dollar counts in this $5,000 campaign. With successful funding, our team will be able to launch the company to the web, officially partner with our select charities, outreach to the world about our efforts, domestically and internationally source our products, and hire professionals around the world to expand our coverage. As you donate to this campaign, remember that your donations are essentially, in large part, direct donations to charity.

The impact of this campaign is far-reaching. We selected the charities based on years of research, as well as data from GiveWell (a nonprofit dedicated to finding outstanding giving opportunities and publishing the full details of their analyses to help donors decide where to give). Here's a brief perspective on the impact of your funding:
• $5 is enough to fund a bednet for a family in sub-Saharan Africa. Every 60 seconds, on average, a children dies from malaria. One bednet is enough to save multiple lives.
• $0.50 is enough to deworm a children of parasitic worms. There are currently around 900 million children at risk of parasitic worms worldwide.
• $0.30-0.40 is enough to treat schistosomiasis, which affects over 200 millions individuals worldwide.

Think about these costs, how minimal they really are, and then think about how many lives we can save together here at Haven. This is not just a clothing company --this is a lifestyle that we should all adopt.
The main challenge is to receive funding. We want to bring you high-quality, sustainably-sourced products and we want to save the world. To do this, we humbly ask for your donations.
The biggest way you can help, besides donating, is by spreading the word! Tell your friends, family, relatives...everybody! Also remember to use Indiegogo share tools.

If you've read this far, chances are that you belong in this movement.

showinfo=0"">

 

 

Key? is a beautiful and functional key holder made to fit perfectly in your wallet.

 

After having lost the keys on countless occasions, leaving them inside the house so many times, and being tired of the discomfort of having them in a pocket and / or bag , we saw the need for a more comfortable and functional key holder that will not occupy more space and we will never forget or lose. 

 

 

 

So we decided not to wait until someone solved this problem and we started to dream, design and create this solution. 

 

 

 

After 2 years of many trials, multiple prototypes and after immense frustrations, mistakes and many good moments. 

 

 

Finally we made Key?

 

 

 

Key? is a key holder made with the finest leather and hand made by experts, which guarantees its quality, durability and enhance its aesthetics. 

 

 

The size and design was made to fit perfectly in your wallet since it has a measurement similar to your credit card or driver's license.

 

Makes it very comfortable to carry in your wallet and thus not having to take up more space in your pockets or purse. 

 

You will not need more of those annoying key rings they gave you and that you hated so much, either for their sound, for their discomfort, 

 

 

because they damaged your cell phone or simply for their uglyness.  

 

 

 

You can keep 2 keys no matter what type of key it is.

It is compatible with most world-wide keys used. 

 

It's simple to use.

 

You just take the keys out of the wallet, 

 

 

make the flip,

 

 

and use it !

Thanks !

 

 

Special thanks to all who supported us in this crazy idea of doing something great, and exposing it to the world, today.  Key? Team.

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

In this great project we have innumerable risks but especially we have great challenges since it is our first and obviously it is our biggest project.

Therefore we have prepared every detail of the product for 2 years, studying every detail, testing innumerable prototypes and working with experts from sun to sun in order to be prepared to face the great and beautiful challenge that lies ahead.

Risks: We have tried to minimize them to the maximum, now we have a product made by hand and of the highest quality due to multiple field tests performed by real people using the key holder Key?

Challenges: The biggest and expected challenge we have is the large-scale production for the distribution of this amazing idea / product Key? worldwide

column12: >Handcrafted with premium leather and the best Italian carnaza, the villemond wallet has a minimal and clean design that brings the best sensations at touch.
column16: >We create a product available in two orientations, the easy access to cards and bills reduces the movements and increases the practicality regardless  of your handedness, with a combination of silk and carnaza you are able to slide notes.
column20: >With a pull you will have access to your main cards.
column22: >
column24: >The wallet is available in two orientations,
column30: >The full grain leather give a unique character to each wallet, for that every wallet is different, the natural marks show the naturality of the best leathers.
column35: >Italian Carnaza and waterproof silk for the interior
column37: >Easy access to bills and principal cards
column39: >Comfortably fits 8 cards and 10 bills

column84: >Where are the wallets made?
column85: >All the wallets are handcrafted in Bogota, Colombia.
column87: >Where i can choose the color and the orientation of the wallet?
column88: >you will be able to choose the color of the wallet and the orientation via email, if you do not specify the orientation we will send a right-handed wallet.

column91: >We include free international shipping, additional charges and import fees are not included.

> 

","The Villemond wallet was designed to provide the simplicity and functionality for everyday, is made of the finest natural materials that brings practicality and elegance, each wallet is handmade by professionals.  Handcrafted with premium leather and the best Italian carnaza, the villemond wallet has a minimal and clean design that brings the best sensations at touch.  We create a product available in two orientations, the easy access to cards and bills reduces the movements and increases the practicality regardless  of your handedness, with a combination of silk and carnaza you are able to slide notes.  With a pull you will have access to your main cards.  The wallet is available in two orientations,  The full grain leather give a unique character to each wallet, for that every wallet is different, the natural marks show the naturality of the best leathers.   Full grain leatherItalian Carnaza and waterproof silk for the interiorRFID ProtectionEasy access to bills and principal cardsMagnetic closureComfortably fits 8 cards and 10 bills Fits any currency    For the creation of an excellent product, it is necessary to use the best materials, the sensation from the materials creates the quality of a premium product
column97: for that reason, we use the best leathers and the best Italian carnaza.  Equally important, to produce the wallet we seek the excellence of a good manufacturer, we could find the tradition and experience of people with the best skills to create innovative products, they allowed us to design and create a great product.   *The colors of the wallet may vary depending on your screen. Each wallet is sent in its own box  ""Villemond is a company founded with the vision of creating competitive products, some months ago we started to work on the design and production of the wallet, we are proud of the result, we are growing and we are prepared for anything.""Nicolás Pinilla (founder) Where are the wallets made?All the wallets are handcrafted in Bogota, Colombia. Where i can choose the color and the orientation of the wallet?you will be able to choose the color of the wallet and the orientation via email, if you do not specify the orientation we will send a right-handed wallet. What is the cost of shipping?We include free international shipping, additional charges and import fees are not included.",36.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: My name is Agatas Katkus, I was born in Lithuania and my family immigrated to Colorado when I was about 5. From the moment I could, I was always creating and building things. I have always had visions in my head for what something should look like and the idea for infinity bandz came to me when I broke my cheap pair of sunglasses. I found a rubber band in my car and wrapped it around the top of my lens in the shape of an infinity symbol and it held them together.

During my first 2 years of college, I wrote a business plan and dialed in what I wanted the product to be. Then proceeded to learn how to 3d model and print. I then learned how to cast and mold using silicon. After experimenting with models and silicon materials I finally got something that wrapped around and looked half decent. My issue is that in order to get the product to its final form I need help from a prototype company that knows way more than I could even imagine.

I am asking for fifty thousand dollars and all the funding I'm asking for will go to getting a perfect final product made with the ability to be mass-produced. The bulk of the money will go towards making a mold for mass production.
Once the final infinity band form is reached. The customization portion will be easy to adapt with different colors and lettering.
Even if the full amount isn't reached every cent will go into getting a final product made.
The biggest hurdle that I can foresee is that this is something completely different. People will have to understand what it is and how to use it.
Once it's out in the world and people understand it. I truly believe people will seek them out as they are different and a whole new type of fashion accessory.
Spread the word and be a part of helping a new era of fashion accessories sprout.

Classic design French Inspired watches that won’t break your bank

There is not a single item that says as much about a man as their watch. Who does not fancy the idea of carrying an elegant, timeproof and sleek piece of art on their wrist? However, there is an obvious obstacle stopping the vast majority of people from acquiring such a timepiece. This is the same reason why most of us do not drive luxurious cars or own mansions

Montre Vintage which means ""Vintage Watch"" in French was born to solve this problem and provide the market with an affordable yet refined alternative. This is the watch for people who love watches but do not want to spend a fortune on them. There is no reason to keep paying hundreds or thousands over the watches production costs, pledge now and receive a discounted Montre Vintage.
The aim of this campaign is to finance Montre Vintage’s next great step
column2: moving forward into mass production and increasing our portfolio of designs. This way we will be able to satisfy more customers around the world and provide them with a greater variety of elegant watches to choose from.

column1: In order to get your very own Montre Vintage back this project and choose a reward. In the rewards section you'll have the option to donate or purchase a Montre Vintage. Take advantage of the early bird discounts!  We encourage you to pledge early to receive a great deal on your Montre Vintage.

0,"

Be the wave

 

 

In mOa we have always been clear about one thing: not only do we want to say we make sustainable footwear, we actually want that to be real. And to make that happen, we designed a production process that considers both environmental and social impact throught the entire life cycle of our products.

Not only we address every factor that influences on an environmentally friendly final product but we’ll take it one step further: for every pair of sneakers we sell, mOa will provide footwear for a child in conditions of extreme poverty.

The clothes you wear do not define you, but they can shape the world you live in. Sneakers made with vegetable fiber from the pineapple plant. Can you imagine that?

We want you to be part of something bigger with every step we take. Join the wave of change.

 

 

Contributions &
column2:
Perks

 

 

It is important you know we will only receive the funds if we reach the goal. If by the end of the campaign the funds raised have not reached the set amount, your money will be refunded.

By the way, your contribution can have a reward! Of course you can collaborate with whatever amount you choose, every little helps us greatly. However, there are a series of advantages explained in the right hand side bar which you will able to get if your contribution matches the indicated amounts.

 

 

 

Truly Sustainable

 

 

The textile industry is the second most polluting on the planet. 

We are completely against brands that untruthfully market their products as sustainable.  In mOa we do not want to label ourselves as sustainable without really being it, what we want is to give maximum importance to each and every one of the factors influencing the final result
column3:
raw material transformation, crafting, workers’ rights, packing, logistics and life cycle of the product.

 

 

Workers’ rights are one of our biggest concerns and a frequently forgotten subject when it comes to sustainability. According to Fair Trade Cooperative Ideas, the precariousness and systematic violation of human rights affects 80% of rural workers and processors. We do not contemplate the possibility of being part of that percentage, that is why we will not allow any production phase to be unfair with workers or put them under unhealthy conditions.

 

 

mOa Sneakers

 

 

Our proposal is sneakers made with vegetable fiber from the pineapple plant. It is a natural, sustainable and cruelty-free material.

Turning waste into material: The process begins with the recollection of pineapple leaves, a by-product of the existing farming industry. This way we achieve a way of producing which does not involve taking soil away from nature in order to create new growing areas. We do not need to destroy ecosystems, cut down forests or burning down jungles: we only need to contact with pineapple plantations to purchase what was traditionally considered as waste. This raw material boosts local economy without bringing further human invasion into the environment.

 

 

Our design is simple, clean and minimalistic.

We already have two prototypes up &
column4:
running! Stay tuned during the crowdfunding period for further news about our designs. For the moment, we can only tell you one thing: you will love it!

 

 

 

Quality

 

 

Our goal is to make an excellent product for the environment, and society but for our clients as well. That is why quality and comfort are key.

In order to achieve that we partnered with an experienced and professional factory based in Elche (Spain), a European hot spot for footwear production. Moreover, regular quality tests will be carried out throughout the entire production process.

 

 

 

Although client satisfaction is a must, we believe product quality goes beyond: it is here where we find the struggle between linear and circular economy.

Currently the fashion industry is shaped by a linear economy. Infinite natural resources are extracted, cheap costs matter over quality when it comes to producing, and that results into low quality products that end up in the garbage really quick. We propose a circular pattern instead: using waste from the farming industry, producing while reducing the carbon footprint to the fullest and making quality a priority. Thanks to this, products will have a longer lifespan. But even when their time to garbage finally comes, they will 100% biodegradable waste.

 

 

Value Proposition

 

 

Our product offers two clear values: material innovation and post-sale social impact.

Around 300 million children in conditions of extreme poverty suffer diseases because of walking barefoot. Not only do we want to raise awareness about this issue, but also to act accordingly to the circumstances. That is why with every pair of sneakers sold mOa will provide footwear for one of these children. Our company philosophy is thinking the clothes you wear do not define you, but they can shape the world you live in.

 

 

 

 

Pesticides, Insecticides and Water Waste

 

Conventional cotton in the most used natural textile in the fashion industry. Nevertheless, its natural origin does not mean it is sustainable. 25% of the world’s pesticides and 11% of insecticides are used in its growth. On top of the environmental issue this generates, according to the World Health Organization, every year around 28.000 cotton field workers decease due to these chemicals. Water is another big problem related to cotton production: according to the United Nations, the fashion industry is responsible for 20% of wasted water on a global scale.

In fact, cotton needs so much water in order to grow that it is to blame for the vanishing of the Aral Sea in Central Asia.

 

 

Our fabric does not require water nor pesticides given the way it is grown and the location of the cultivation area. The dyes used are approved by GOTS and the resins meet the AFIRM standards. It is important to note the raw materials come from what is currently regarded as waste in pineapple plantations. Every year this growing areas produce nearly 13 million tons of waste.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may not be able to contribute to helping mOa sneakers becoming a reality, or that you feel like you cannot contribute as much as you would like. It is okay, it is not all about money!

There is something that you could do to help without spending a single euro: spreading the word about our campaign! Share this link with your family and friends, use social media, call your rich uncle and tell him this is a worthy cause…

We will be eternally grateful for your help.
column7:
>The mOa Team

We are not going to lie: the road to getting here has been very hard. Starting a business was in the three founders’ minds and we all knew it would be difficult. However, the reality is much harder that the simple word “difficult”.

Nevertheless, here we are! We have already walked a long part of the way and still excited to keep going on. This could have only turned out the way it did thanks to a team like ours: multidisciplinary, creative, hard-working and very motivated.

 

 

We want to thank everyone who has been instrumental in making mOa come to reality. Many thanks to Irene Fernández for the 3D designs
column8: to Carlos Climent and Miguel Omedes at MAKING VISUALS for the filming and editing of the Pitch Video
column9: to Rafael Martin for the video logo
column10: to Berta Catevilla, Claudia Martínez, Carlos Matallana and Carla Praga for supervising the translations
column11: to Susana Mazzarino for being so patient and making mOa-factory communication smoother
column12: and to the entire Compluemprende crew (Paloma Bel Durán, Gustavo Lejarriaga, Pepa Casado, Esther Cubo, Bárbara Barro and Alba Salas). We owe you all so much, but special thanks must go to Javier Sánchez Espada, who has advised, supported and encouraged us from the very first day.

column1: Using 3D printing technology i would like funding to help purchase a printer so that i can begin supplying cosmetic covers to people that have had amputations and sometimes feel that showing the prosthetic limb by wearing shorts, skirts or t shirts can make them feel even more uncomfortable. In more cases children will benefit from this.
100% of the funds will go towards buying the 3d printer and materials needed to start printing covers.
From my own personal experience i know how much of a difference mentally it helped me by being able to wear shorts in the summer and not be ashamed to show off my prosthesis once i had a cover on it.

Anybody who finds themselves feeling at a low point after an amputation would soon feel a little happier knowing that they can at least design a part of their prostheses. And, would not feel like they have to just take what they are given.

12 Animal Tattoo Stickers
The origin of this concept takes place with the Chinese Zodiac Signs. We made a lot of different sketches in order to find the perfect one to use as tattoos. Finally, we managed to express these animals in a truly Korean Folk style which are well suited for tattoos. There is also a special font and emoticons that allow you to create your special message! They also are designed in the folk style. You can use them for any kind of occasions and with everyone!

Pick Tattoo For Tattoo Simulation,  App
For this product, we launched “Pick Tattoo” app on App Store several month ago. It was developed for simulating this tattoo sticker with phone camera. So it is free. Besides, after simulating, you can buy it on this app.

• The reason of creating this campaign is because we wish that we can keep trying to develop our app service further more. Our team is now focusing on developing “DEIGN ON DEMAND” platform service to make this app go further. It could be a sort of the platform to share ideas each other, based on “ON DMAND”. So we now guess it might be needed about over 100K $ and 6 month to achieve our goal.

1000$? 
Yeah, we know our fund-raising goal(1000$) is so small and not enough but we want to see and get some confidence from your supports. And we want to see you’re using our products. So we think 1000$ is just meaning “START” of our business’s good signal.

About Perks
- Just ONE Sheet of animal characters : 2$ (Retail price 3$)
- 6 Sheets of animal characters : 12 $  (Retail price 18$)
- 12 Sheets of animal characters : 24 $ (Retail price 36$)
- 17 Sheets of animal characters ( All Kinds of Black Sheets) : 30 $ (Retail price 51$)
- 31 Sheets of animal characters  ( All Kinds and All Colors) : 50 $ (Retail price 93$)

*** And we will give you our own font in folk style, ""Asian folk tattoo Light"" in the case that you buy over 17 sheets of them. You can use this font only for personal uses.

If our projcet dosen't reach its entire goal?
You can buy them in retail price on the belows
column2:

- 12 aniaml tattoo sticker's page
- www.ideadot.co.kr (Korean shop)

column1:
You can create your own design by putting together the animals, letters or signs available. In this way, you will be able to buy exactly what you need.

If you love NY Yankees and a specific player
1. You guys can have a good time with 12 ANIMAL TATTOS on your body or the beer cups in a festival!
2. Show support to your favorite player! During a game, you can wear the player’s initials and number as a unique support!
3. Having a Birthday or Special Occasion Party? Make each guest feel special with their own glasses designed by you!

4. How about having good time at the water park with your entire family wearing our tattoos? And when travelling, you can easily make your luggage stand out with your own customization! All stickers are easy to remove, so you can change it whenever you feel like it. It works on phone too!
It is very simple to apply on your body or any surfaces, and as easy to remove.

The 12 Animals, Large Size: 90 x 65mm / One character
The 12 Animals, Small Size: 90 x 65mm / 4 characters a pcs
Alphabets / Numbers: Maximum 10 x 10mm
Emoticons: Maximum 14 x 14mm
Materials: PP

12 animals‘ Stories
----------------------
- Rat : It is the first runner among them, so very diligent and witty.
- Bull : Lead a sober, hard working life.
- Tiger : A ball of fire
- Rabbit : An idealist.
- Dragon : Think bigger and do it.
- Snake : So ambitious to bear hardships.
- Horse : Open-mind and favor with merriments.
- Ram : A tender-hearted pacifist.
- Monkey : Positive and active
- Rooster : A great intelligence and beauty.
- Dog : Open-hearted and bright
- Pig : Simple and very strong

Orientypes Inc. is now developing a new product that will bring together makers and companies in need of design ideas, based on our previous service, ""ORIENTYPES"". ORIENTYPES is an On-Demand Design platform, that allows you to create your own design freely, on the web or through our App. We also developed various design products (like wall stickers or mobile cases) with our affiliates. You can find them on sale on online channels like our App or open markets.

• We plan to fulfill all orders within 1 weeks after suceess. However, if I sell much more than expected, shipping may take a little more time, but don't worry, I will keep you update on any potential delays.

• You can get a cheaper shipping price in case you live in Asia.

    So please ask me to add your country's shipment fee in advance.
• If you want to buy with another kind of option, please don't hesitate to tell us. We can create proper options for you.
*** Thank you very much for your support!
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that's all there is to it.

We know that some people just can't contribute, but you can still help!
Spread the word  with Indiegogo's share tools (below).
Tell your favorite blogs and newspapers.
Tell your friends!

12 animals‘ Stories----------------------- Rat : It is the first runner among them, so very diligent and witty.- Bull : Lead a sober, hard working life.- Tiger : A ball of fire- Rabbit : An idealist.- Dragon : Think bigger and do it.- Snake : So ambitious to bear hardships.- Horse : Open-mind and favor with merriments.- Ram : A tender-hearted pacifist.- Monkey : Positive and active- Rooster : A great intelligence and beauty.- Dog : Open-hearted and bright- Pig : Simple and very strong

Orientypes Inc. is now developing a new product that will bring together makers and companies in need of design ideas, based on our previous service, ""ORIENTYPES"". ORIENTYPES is an On-Demand Design platform, that allows you to create your own design freely, on the web or through our App. We also developed various design products (like wall stickers or mobile cases) with our affiliates. You can find them on sale on online channels like our App or open markets.

We plan to fulfill all orders within 1 weeks after suceess. However, if I sell much more than expected, shipping may take a little more time, but don't worry, I will keep you update on any potential delays.
You can get a cheaper shipping price in case you live in Asia.So please ask me to add your country's shipment fee in advance.
If you want to buy with another kind of option, please don't hesitate to tell us. We can create proper options for you.
*** Thank you very much for your support!
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that's all there is to it.
We know that some people just can't contribute, but you can still help!Spread the word  with Indiegogo's share tools (below).Tell your favorite blogs and newspapers.Tell your friends!

Die Deutsche Übersetzung findet Ihr auf www.nemcall.com

nemCall is the smartest children's watch ever

nemCall is not only a watch, a mobile phone or a camera, it is also a GPS and fitness tracker for children. In addition nemCall offers learning modules, organization tools, information systems and a large security package to make the daily lives of parents and children easier. 

nemCall has been designed with children's needs in mind, as well as an app for parents, guardians, family members and teachers that is easy to use, understandable and intuitive to customize.

With a quality app from Denmark, modern Scandinavian design and the highest safety standards, nemCall clears away the teething troubles of previous wristphones. 

nemCall accompanies you all day long, no matter what you have in mind.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

The most advanced children's smartwatch

This high quality and modern watch with touch screen and water resistant IP67 case will please your child. With just one nano sim card for the watch and the free app for your smartphone (in 11 languages), GPS and LBS tracking keeps you informed of where your child is. With the Geofence function, you can determine the area the child is supposed to be and the app notifies you when the child leaves this area. 

 

 

Your child will love the watch

Who's child doesn't want to be like ""the big ones""? But that's not so easy if you can't read the watch yet. With symbols nemCall wants to help the kids to be more independent in everyday life. And, of course, they also get to know the time in a playful way. 

Telephoning made easy

You define the contacts (in the app) that your child can call and also those that can call your child. Your child can select the desired person from the contacts (with picture or symbol) and call them by simply touching them. If the person they want to reach is not available, your child can send a voice message. 

In an emergency, your child can also reach you (and up to 3 other people) immediately by pressing the SOS button for 4 seconds.

In addition to excellent voice quality, the watch also has a front camera so you can not only hear but also see your child. Of course, your child can also see you on the phone and all communication is encrypted to protect you and your child.

Capturing and sharing moments

How many times have you taken a picture of a beautiful moment in your life and shared it with friends and family? Your child now has this opportunity too (when you activate it). Your child can now take photos and videos and share them with family and friends. 

More exercise playfully

Your children will be rewarded for exercise (steps and/or calories) with points, which in return open up new playing possibilities. As parents, for example, you can offer your kids a reward system in which you may read two bedtime stories instead of one, or allow them to watch a episode of their favourite series when they reach a certain score. 

Tasks and scheduling

With the app on the smartphone, parents create a visual schedule for their children. Light vibrations and icon pop-ups draw the children's attention to their memories. The look is designed for children between the ages of 4 and 10, with the clock displaying the time and associated icons that children use to perform specific tasks or functions.

Individual and adaptable

In addition to customizing background images and entire themes, you can replace the silicone wristband, which also protects the watch and is equipped with an NFC chip, at any time without tools. This makes the watch even more flexible and it can also be worn as a necklace or attached to clothing with a clip as well.

You are in control

The development of a child progresses rapidly and there is always something new to discover. In order not to disturb this development, access to the digital world should not be too early and certainly not unattended. 

Nevertheless, the digital world offers many possibilities to make life easier for families and especially for living together. In order to solve this balancing act, we have invested a lot of time and effort in the development of the app and software to leave you in control, while not leaving you alone with tons of functions. 

With nemCall, your children can call you freely, but they have no possibility to play uncontrolled mobile games or access content from the Internet.

The nemCall-Watch adapts to your wishes

Of course, you can determine who can be called from the nemCall-Watch or who can call your child's nemCall-Watch. Via the admin app you also have the possibility to activate or deactivate functions of the watch, depending on which of the functions you consider useful for your child. 

Age appropriate and preference-based profiles

After pairing a nemCall-Watch, you have the option of setting up the watch with a wizard, maximum mode or in minimum mode. While in minimum mode all functions are reduced to a minimum by default and in maximum mode all functions are activated, the assistant offers the possibility to activate and define the settings of the watch based on the age of your child as well as on your selected preferences (in the categories monitoring, emergency, communication, freedom, independence, etc.). 

We have previously evaluated the preset ""profiles"" in a large number of tests with parents to make it as easy as possible for you to set them up. Of course you can edit all these presets manually and adapt them to your individual needs. 

More than just a gadget

The functional range of the clock is already very extensive, but even we cannot think of everything yet. In order to be able to extend the range of functions in the future, we are currently planning an App Store in which you can download further educational game and learning apps for the watch and install them on the nemCall-Watch. 

The smartwatch for children of safety-oriented parents

Protection for your data

In order to offer you the highest level of protection, all communication with our servers hosted in Europe takes place with 256-bit encryption according to the latest security standards. In addition, all data is stored on the servers in encrypted form. If you permit it, the data can be transmitted unencrypted to security authorities in emergency situations. 

Security thought ahead

Hubs the extensive setting options for tracking the nemCall-Watch, you can define security zones (GPS-Fence) time-coupled and temporary so when they leave the zone you will be automatically notified.  But also emergency contacts, emergency settings, disaster warnings (via catwarn), first-aider information (with ICEdot) and much more is already integrated to provide you with a maximum of safety for your child. 

When the situation gets serious

In addition to an SOS emergency call button, nemCall has two built-in cameras that are activated immediately after the emergency call is triggered.  The recorded images including the ambient noise and the current position are then continuously sent to our servers until you deactivate the alert in the app.  If the child gets lost, it can simply send its location to you. Using GPS tracking, WiFi localization and GSM triangulation, you can also locate your child at any time - or check the 72-hour history of where the little ones have been.

The nemCall App - Clear, Intuitive, Innovative

After pairing with a nemCall-Watch, a map is displayed with the current position of the paired nemCall-Watch. Clicking on the marker opens the context menu from which you can call the watch (voice or video call), send a message / emoji or access one of the many other functions. 

Useful for the whole family

Tasks and schedulers, timetables and much more make it much easier for the modern family to coordinate. You can also set the alarm clock on the watch using the app, mute the watch during school and much more... 

You decide who has access

As the first paired device, you have full control over who has access to the respective nemCall-Watch and who doesn't. The sophisticated rights system is based on different user groups to which you can assign different authorizations. In addition, all security-relevant setting changes must be confirmed on your end.

APP Development

It goes without saying that the software of our products is developed and programmed in Europe in compliance with all data protection regulations and that the data storage on our servers is completely encrypted and carried out in European datacenters with the highest level of protection against downtime and state-of-the-art security mechanisms.

The people behind nemCall

We, the founding team, consist of four successful independent entrepreneurs with different expertise and backgrounds who have come together for a common goal: We want to create products that serve the whole family and make family life and its everyday needs easier, safer, and more enjoyable, with more freedom and leisure. 

Due to the different specializations, as well as the professional and private interests of the founders, every aspect and every feature of the product is controversially discussed, analyzed and, depending on feasibility and relevance, optimally implemented or postponed or discarded. 

Our philosophy is always to put the benefit and handling first. If we discover that a desired function or feature causes more problems for the user than it promises in terms of benefits, we will not integrate it into the function portfolio.

Follow us and help spread the word

Get the latest updates and help us to spread the word so we can make this great product happening. All support is very appreciated!

Risks and challenges

We know that security and privacy is the most important part, we have to take care of. To face that battle we work close together with a award-wining app developer team in Denmark, to make sure we can meet the highest security standards in the market right now. 

Not only will we be able to update the watches over the air, we will own the source code of the chips and components in the watch to make sure that there is no backdoor or any security flaw in there. 

All ip-based communication and exchanged/stored informations will be encrypted. Only the parents (admin-app) can decide who gets access to these informations. Additional our data center is in the EU and will be monitored all the time as there are over 600.000 parents already trusting the systems with their own and their kids personal data. 

The biggest challenge is therefore the development of the software, since even small errors can lead to security gaps, which pose a great risk both for parents and children. 

Since our software has to be simple and understandable for all users, we will make the app available to a test group together with the first version of the clock after the beta version has been completed, and will put it through its paces. If the subsequent evaluation of the test shows that we need to make fundamental changes to the app or watch, this could result in a delay of 4 to 6 weeks. 

As this product is worn by children, all components must of course be tested for their health compatibility and technical safety. In addition to a CE test, we will also carry out a TÜV test and have RSA values examined. Since we are dependent on external companies for this, unforeseeable waiting times can occur, which can also lead to a delay of the project.

UPD: Hello, I'm Jilda, brave woman launching her personal creative startup:)) Nice to meet you!
I'm new in crowdfunding and I think I'm on the hard path of mistakes committed by all newbies haha :D but I'm told that this year is favorable for the Archers, so I decided to annoy you all with my genial ideas all this year :))) so maybe it’s better to support me right away? LOL thanks ))

UPD2: btw, the music in video is my composition so I have also music projects in mind, and I would like to hear from you if you find it interesting. I'm waiting for your comments! Thanks! :)

 

*********

I'm 2D/3D artist freelancer. I have been doing digital graphics since 2005. I love my work very much, but I was always sad that my works were not embodied in the real world.

By the invention of 3D-printing, we finally got the opportunity to bring the 3D-design in the material world. But many years all 3D-printers that print with high precision were very expensive. And I waited for many years the appearance of more economical models. Finally, I chose a suitable model, but even this model I cannot afford at the moment.


If you like my idea and my designs, then you can help me start embodying my designs in the matter right now.

I will be grateful to everyone who donates to this project. For the most generous, I will gratefully provide new printed items.

 

I want to buy this model of 3D-printer:
ANYCUBIC Photon LCD

I will use these materials:
Harz Labs

In the requested amount I included the cost of 3D-printer and materials, as well as the cost of transportation and printing of test models, since I will need to find the optimal rigidity for the printed products.

Thank you for your attention to my project!
Have a Great Day!

Sorry for my poor English :)

 

 

Здравствуйте!

Меня зовут Джильда, я занимаюсь 2D/3D дизайном с 2005 года. Мне очень нравится моя работа, однако мне всегда хотелось, чтобы мое творчество нашло свое воплощение в реальном мире осязаемых вещей.

 

С появлением технологии 3D печати дизайнеры получили возможность воплощать в жизнь свои смелые идеи. Но долгое время принтеры, печатающие модели с высокой точностью, стоили очень дорого. Я много лет ждала появления бюджетных моделей 3D принтеров, и наконец на рынке появились подходящие модели. Но к сожалению, даже эти расходы я не могу себе позволить в данный момент.

Эту модель принтера я хочу купить:

ANYCUBIC Photon LCD

Для печати я буду использовать эти материалы:

Harz Labs

 

Если вам нравится моя идея и мои концепты, вы можете поддержать мой проект пожертвованиями, либо вы можете поделиться с друзьями этим проектом и рассказать о нем. Я буду признательна всем, кто поддержит мой проект. Ваша поддержка очень важна для меня!

Для особо крупных пожертвований я предусмотрела вознаграждения.

В сумму, необходимую для реализации проекта, я включила расходы на покупку 3D принтера, материалов для печати, растаможку, а также расходы на тестовые распечатки для определения необходимой жесткости изделий.

 

Благодарю за внимание к моему проекту!

Удачного вам дня!

hello everybody! I'm Sushmita Bisannah from India,Hyderabad working as a fashion designer since two years. Studying fashion and getting into this job wasn't that easy in my life. I had to go  through tough hurdles to get to this place.  I was the happiest person on the earth when i got my dream job. I always has plenty of work in my hands which kept me engaged all the time and i loved that.  I enjoyed every bit of my work, like talking to clients, knowing their requirements, Inspecting production and execution, exploring trends, material procurement, handling bunch of workers &
column2: late deliveries, quoting bills, and my OTs, everything.

column1: And that was one of my routine days, i was just browsing through and accidentally redirected to an article saying TEXTILE POLLUTION. I felt it interesting and started reading the article. That article shook me up,  I literally never knew that Textile pollution is the SECOND MOST POLLUTION globally. and 15 million tons of textiles are being dumped every year according to statistics. and most of them are synthetics which takes up to 60 years and above to decompose. Just one thought made me restless i.e THEN HOW MANY YEARS DOES IT TAKE TO DECOMPOSE ALL OF THEM? AND WHAT IS THE FUTURE?

After a week of research and analysis I came up with an idea. A concept of creating garments using only(90%)  hand-made, eco-friendly and bio-degradable fabrics with three prime principles Remodel-Reuse-Recycle, which derives SUSTAINABLE FASHION. The fabrics which we work with decomposes very quickly compared to synthetics, yet we try not to dump but Recycle.

Concept was good, but i was wondering how many people would prefer these fabrics over synthetics since synthetics are the cheaper pick. First I tried them on me and referred it to few of my friends and the response was AWESOME. They loved the designs since they are trendy yet comfortable. ","My story - Origin of IDEA

column1: hello everybody! I'm Sushmita Bisannah from India,Hyderabad working as a fashion designer since two years. Studying fashion and getting into this job wasn't that easy in my life. I had to go  through tough hurdles to get to this place.  I was the happiest person on the earth when i got my dream job. I always has plenty of work in my hands which kept me engaged all the time and i loved that.  I enjoyed every bit of my work, like talking to clients, knowing their requirements, Inspecting production and execution, exploring trends, material procurement, handling bunch of workers & late deliveries, quoting bills, and my OTs, everything.

And that was one of my routine days, i was just browsing through and accidentally redirected to an article saying TEXTILE POLLUTION. I felt it interesting and started reading the article. That article shook me up,  I literally never knew that Textile pollution is the SECOND MOST POLLUTION globally. and 15 million tons of textiles are being dumped every year according to statistics. and most of them are synthetics which takes up to 60 years and above to decompose. Just one thought made me restless i.e THEN HOW MANY YEARS DOES IT TAKE TO DECOMPOSE ALL OF THEM? AND WHAT IS THE FUTURE?

After a week of research and analysis I came up with an idea. A concept of creating garments using only(90%)  hand-made, eco-friendly and bio-degradable fabrics with three prime principles Remodel-Reuse-Recycle, which derives SUSTAINABLE FASHION. The fabrics which we work with decomposes very quickly compared to synthetics, yet we try not to dump but Recycle.

Concept was good, but i was wondering how many people would prefer these fabrics over synthetics since synthetics are the cheaper pick. First I tried them on me and referred it to few of my friends and the response was AWESOME. They loved the designs since they are trendy yet comfortable. When I was actually getting the orders, I couldn't believe myself that there were so many people who would want to go eco-friendly and that gave me lot of confidence. But I couldn't manage to take many of them cause neither I had my own space to meet the clients nor the workshop to work on, and Time was another issue since I work in somewhere my whole day. Then I understood the need of launching the start-up of this sustainable fashion label but It wasn't that easy since It needed lot of money into it. Then I started searching for the possibilities to make it happen

After many trials and failures, after so much of exploration I stopped at this one place to share my thoughts and Ideas with the people who actually would understand and care. YOU guyz are our BEST POSSIBILITY to make it happen.  Me and my team need you to make our campaign successful and give our Start-up a shape. Please do help us to make it Stand and Serve

The TWISTLET  is a product that would be perfect for Anyone who wants to carry the essentials, phone, keys, money and lipstick,  and be hands-free/care free!   There is nothing on the market like it.  I actually came up with the idea sitting on the beach wanting to leave my beach chair to go for a walk, and I had no idea how to carry my ""essentials"" so as not to leave my valuables behind.  After observing a multitude women walking the beach in bathing suits (with no pockets), carrying their beach bags, leather purses, phones in their hands, etc.,  I realized my idea had value.   Hence, the first neoprene Twistlet (a twist on the wristlet), came to be.  At that time I was a teacher (recently retired), and I made them for all my teacher friends who used them for carrying their phones, keys, money, to lunch duty, bus duty, meetings, etc.  The TWISTLET  became a staple of our schools.  I refined my idea, and after I retired last year from teaching (after 30 years), began experimenting with different fabrics and now have the pattern and look I want to include luxurious reversible stretch velvets, sequin lined with stretch velvet as well as bright water-resistant neoprene fabric.
I first sold the TWISTLET in the French Market in New Orleans and soon realized they were a hit
column2: not only were they cute and classy, they carried the essentials safely and conveniently.

column1: With funding, I can move the TWISTLET into manufacturing and marketing on a much larger scale.  My product has all the makings of a new approach to simplicity and minimalism that is both timely and highly sought after by a myriad of individuals.  It is both clever and functional, and it will be a problem-solver for those looking for convenience, sensibility, and comfort without foregoing style.

TWISTLET is a dually patented product with both Design and Utility Patents filed, and the Trademark is secured.  The TWISTLET project needs manufacturing and marketing funds to move forward, with hopes of securing $100,000 of which 75% will be used for manufacturing costs and 25% for marketing.    For those individuals who contribute to our project, for each $25, a TWISTLET will be mailed to the donator.  If we do not reach our entire goal, the contributed funds will still go to manufacturing and marketing.

The TWISTLET is all about freedom: freedom from having to carry a purse or handbag and still being able carry all of the essentials.  Traditional purses and handbags were definitely not all designed for convenience, activity or safety, or comfortable portability
column2: however, the TWISTLET is!  No matter where you're heading, just grab your essentials and go
column3: lock in your keys, slide in your phone, tuck in your money, and don’t forget the lipstick!  The TWISTLET is the compact and convenient bag that comes in styles from fashionable and stylish to rugged and weather-ready.  One simple turn of TWISTLET's patented straps keeps your belongings safe and secure and creates a hands-free/care-free carrying experience.

column1: In the first three months of sales at a community market in New Orleans, the TWISTLET was purchased by folks from 11 countries and 42 states (pre-COVID, obviously).  It is such a unique product that folks purchased them for themselves as well as their friends and family members.  There were some customers who were buying a dozen at a time!  The TWISTLET is guaranteed to be a game changer when it comes to convenience, functionality, and design.

TWISTLET is ready for major production and searching for the right manufacturer.  While several estimates have been received from west coast manufacturers, there still hasn't been the ideal offer.  Presently, The TWISTLET is being manufactured in southwest Louisiana by a small seamstress company, Sew What.  They do impeccable and amazing work, and approximately five seamstresses are employed to construct the product.  There is hope that TWISTLET can be manufactured by such a loving company, and that is the type of manufacturer we are hoping to find.  At this time, Sew What, is not able to up the production without more machinery and staff to meet our needs.  If that were to change, I would not hesitate using Sew What as the manufacturer of TWISTLET.

As social media becomes more and more the marketing approach, TWISTLET is happy to be a center of attention.  Any shout outs or happy customer pics of the TWISTLET  would be quite beneficial to getting the word out.  Using the Indiegogo share tools would be just a wonderful way to help us!
