column1: Me Next is all about comfort, enjoy comfort is an attitude and the way to express a lifestyle. A comfortable lifestyle should start with choosing a great pair of shoes.

Therefore, we decided to use groundbreaking technology and the top-notch supply chain to create a new brand Me Next, which will completely subvert people's imagination of the comfort of shoes. We call it ""Be Perfectly comfortable, Always.""

column8: s=b5faa7213e25770874abba1b23b03daf"" src="""" style=""font-family: benton-sans, Helvetica, sans-serif

column1: A special gradient sandwich structure, a concept used in the aerospace field has been applied to the midsole design for the very first time in footwear. Compared to other structures with the same weight and material, this design has the best buffer performance and shock absorption capability.

The gradient sandwich structure originated from the aerospace field, this structure was used by flight vehicles to absorb energy when the aircraft was hit by space debris and meteorites, significantly reduce the impact damage to the main structure.

 

Me Next’s midsole: The bottom layer is designed for absorbing energy from the ground, the middle layer is made for energy storage and transmission, and the top layer can return more energy as force is applied to efficiently reduce fatigue caused by long-distance walking.
The structurally ordered midsole provides unrestricted airflow and breathability in all directions, which helps to remove moisture and prevent sweat and odors.

The midsole buffer structure is made with micron-sized TPU powder as the raw material and uses SLS high-precision 3D printing technology under a nitrogen atmosphere. The midsole consists of more than 762 cushioning units, which completely protect the pressure points of your feet.
The world first uses an embedded design, combining a 3D printed structure with the outer shoe frame of the sole.
•  Inserting the Gradient Sandwich Structures into the sole, provides a great solution to problems that avoids gravel that damages the form of the shoe sole.

•  The outer frame structure has a particular mechanical ability, which can control the deformation direction of gradient sandwich structures and effectively avoid the imbalance of the human center of gravity.
•  The perfect combination of practicality and transparent appearancestylish unique design.

Today, considering the environmental impact of any product is essential. We care about protecting the environment for future generations so Me Next's outsole and the internal buffer structure were designed to use thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU), a plastic material that is recyclable, non-toxic and environmentally friendly. Moreover, the TPU material lasts longer than typical footwear to extend the lifecycle of the shoes.

Me Next excels at any workout or exercise such as cross-training, cycling, HIIT, jogging, and more. The midsole buffer structure can decrease the impact of your steps and cushion the foot from heavy landings. Boost your workout performance with Me Next!

Me Next is perfect for walking and daily wear with excellent shock absorption capability for any activity. Great cushioning properties effectively reduce the damage on the knee joints and help you feel better all day.
By focusing on fashion, sustainability, and quality at the same time, Me Next provides 3 different styles that can express different personalities in a unique way.
(Sailor) Inspired by an aerodynamic design from the sports car. Yellow, blue, and black combined together are interlaced to release visual impact. Sailor represents the combination of power &

(Shadow) Global warming has accelerated the melting of Antarctica's glaciers, and the environment in Antarctica has also been deteriorating. We are using 3M™ reflective fabric to draw out penguins' images and express our deep concern about the Antarctica environment. We want to express our worries about climate warming through Shadow and remind people to protect the environment.
(Sunday) The inspiration comes from the facial design of Sichuan Opera. A bold attempt by combining traditional Chinese culture and modern design.
• What Makes Us Different From The Other?
1.Stand straight with your feet on a piece of paper and your heels against the wall, then draw a line around your foot.
2. Measure the length of your foot from the tip to the heel.
3. Compare your foot length with our size chart to choose a perfect size for your sneakers.
*We recommend sizing up for a wider fit or sizing down for a narrow fit if you typically are between two sizes.

Introducing Flick

After having launched 3 previous successful Kickstarter &
column2:
Indiegogo projects, we're now happy to introduce Flick.

Flick is a patented arm- and wrist rest that provides computer mouse users with better ergonomics. Flick is engineered and designed with physicians, out of published scientific studies, and feedback from thousands of previous customers.

Did you know that an average person at work makes up to 7000 mouse clicks every day?

While doing this, you also move your arm and wrist in micro-movements with high friction that damages your muscles and tendons.

As a result, maintaining your arm in the current position towards your computer mouse without an arm or wrist rest in many cases lead to repetitive strain injuries:

The injuries often lead to low productivity, and in some cases might even cause you to stop working entirely.

We've engineered and designed a product that provides you with better ergonomics when you are working, in order to ensure healthy computer mouse usage.

Our background is in Esports, and we've combined the best from two worlds to bring you the all-in-one solution product.

With Flick, you can build a more ergonomic workstation to create a healthier and more productive future for yourself. After all, the workstation is where many of us spend the majority of our time during the days, so it is necessary to create a healthy and sustainable environment.

Flick has a built-in-incline that always provides you with an optimal angle towards the computer mouse, no matter where you move your arm. This angle gives you a better ergonomic position to help you sustain a healthy use of your computer mouse while working long hours.

Furthermore, Flick is covered with PTFE on the underside to reduce friction towards the surface as much as possible. 

PTFE is the same material commonly referred to as mouse skates, which are usually placed on the underside of your computer mouse. 

This means that your arm and hand will have the same friction as your mouse, which will, in turn, allow more effortless movements.

Flick is also equipped with memory foam on the inside, to provide extreme comfort, and a custom user experience so that every product is shaped according to the user's arm.

The memory foam also naturally induces slight supination of the wrist, which is a better ergonomic position than the normally fully pronated position.

Finally, at the front Flick has a rotation support. The rotation support works as a perfect pressure point to relieve pressure from other parts of the arm that would lead to injuries, and ensures that the wrist is in a controlled and safe rotation for better stability. 

Our new flow design enables you to rotate freely with the rotation support at all times.

Flick is placed in front of your computer mouse, and is extremely easy to use. It is highly manageable for all types of work duties, and is designed to fit in at your workstation as a beautiful accessory. 

It comes in different sizes and two different colors, Obsidian Black &
column3:
Pearl White.

We have a long history with Kickstarter &
column4:
Indiegogo, and that is the reason why we got started in the first place, and the reason why we can continue to create products that bring great value for our customers. Because of that, we always make sure to create exclusive rewards for our backers, with huge discounts. We try to set the prices as low as possible, in order to provide our amazing crowdfunding community with a unique opportunity. 

 

After the Indiegogoo campaign, Flick will be sold online and in retail stores. The retail prices will differ a lot from the Indiegogo prices. Below is a compilation of the exclusive Indiegogo prices:

Early Bird | Flick ($79) - Retail price $139 USD, 45% off (save $60 USD).

Indiegogo | Flick ($89) - Retail price $139 USD, 35% off (save $50 USD).

 

Early Bird | Flick Co-worker ($139) - Retail price $278 USD, 50% off (save $139 USD).

Indiegogo | Flick Co-worker ($165) - Retail price $278 USD, 40% off (save $113 USD).

 

 Early Bird | Flick Team ($319) - Retail price $695 USD, 55% off (save $376 USD).

 Indiegogo | Flick Team ($379) - Retail price $695 USD, 45% off (save $316 USD).

 

 Early Bird | Flick Office ($1109) - Retail price $2780 USD, 60% off (save $1671 USD).

 Indiegogo | Flick Office ($1389) - Retail price $2780 USD, 50% off (save $1391 USD).

A team of passionate product developers, engineers, designers, and creative minds who care deeply about our customers, and the future of working ergonomics. We want to create a healthy and productive future for everyone that spends the majority of their day working at a desk.
 

We started out in Esports, and have since the beginning launch several products. The first products were the Gaming Glove &
column5:
the Gaming Sleeve. After that, we released Xdapter, followed by Xsleeve in November 2020. However, we quickly realized that many of our customers use our products at the office, or at home for work. So we decided it was time to make a product that was better suited for that type of work. After receiving feedback from thousands of users of our previous products, we used all that knowledge to develop Flick.

 

We are so happy to finally share all of our hard work with the world and continue on our mission to create a healthy working environment for everyone. 

In 2018, we launched our first Kickstarter project. It all started when Oskar Ödmark (founder) suffered from a shoulder injury related to movement with a computer mouse and took a break from gaming, with rehab training for almost 2 years.

 

After struggling for so many years with high friction and unstable movement, he wanted to find a solution for the problems that people encounter every day while using a computer mouse. He then developed the first edition of the Flashe Gaming Glove. For the first time in many years, he didn't feel the stress on the shoulders that he usually would after long hours in front of the computer, and his gameplay was improving drastically. Oskar knew that this was something that could potentially help millions of people around the globe.

 

With a never-ending passion for helping people with repetitive stress injuries, Oskar launched Flashe Gaming Group in 2018. The first Kickstarter campaign became an immediate success, and this enabled Flashe Gaming Group to extend its team and its product portfolio. With new innovation, engineering, and design, we aim to revolutionize the ergonomic industry.

 

The second Kickstarter was Xdapter: 6-in-1 invisible adapter. Xdapter has helped thousands of people around the globe become more minimalistic and enabled them to use their phone at work instead of a laptop. 

 

Finally, in November 2020, we launched Xsleeve: Esports Performance &
column6: Ergonomics. Xsleeve is a specially engineered and designed gaming compression arm-sleeve with PTFE on the underside for reduced friction. Xsleeve was delivered to our backers in record-time
column7:
only 2 weeks after the campaign ended!

 

With all this experience from Kickstarter, we know what it takes to launch and deliver a successful crowdfunding project. We are forever grateful for all the amazing support we have received throughout the years.

 

After raising $185 000 USD from 3 projects, we are now very happy to introduce Flick.

How does the reward/perk system work?

You can only pledge for 1 reward, so make sure that the one you pick has the correct amount of Flick that you want. 

 

How much does Flick cost?

The price for Flick on Indiegogo ranges from $79 USD - $1389 USD depending on how many you back. Flick as a base product is made out of expensive high-quality materials, and compared to other products on the market that might have 1 or 2 ergonomic components, Flick combines 4 Key components to ensure an optimal ergonomic product. These components are also made of expensive high-quality materials, including:

- Memory foam

- PTFE underside

- Rotation support 

- Embedded incline

 

When do I get to choose the size and color for Flick?

We will contact everyone with surveys that will be sent to your email after the campaign has ended. In the survey you will find size sheets, so you'll know which size fits you. The survey will also include color options.

 

How do I know which size fits me?

Together with the survey, we will send size charts so you will be able to measure with ease what size you need.

 

Is Flick washable?

Flick won't really need to be washed, but if you'll need it, Flick can be hand-washed.

 

Does Flick support ambidextrous use?

Yes, Flick can be used by left-handed and right-handed users.

 

What are the shipping costs?

The shipping costs start from 9 USD, and depending on how many products you have in your pledge, it might increase up to a maximum of 90 USD.

 

When will you send surveys?

We will send out surveys as soon as possible after the campaign has ended, in order to speed up the delivery process as much as possible.

 

How do I get in contact with your team?

The easiest and fastest way is to message the creator (Oskar Ödmark) here on Indiegogo, and someone from our team will get in touch. You can also comment on our Indiegogo project page.

 

Risks and challenges

This is our 4th crowdfunding project, and needless to say
column8:
we've learned a lot during the past few years. Making hardware is almost always a difficult process. We've overcome many obstacles, and solved problems that will save us a lot of time for this project. Making products that bring value to our customers is the key to all things we make. Since Flick is the first of its kind, and since there is nothing similar to it on the market, it could potentially lead to delays in manufacturing. However, we are confident about the capability of the product and possess deep knowledge of all the fundamental components.

 

That being said, Flick is a complex product and we hold ourselves to incredibly high standards in terms of quality and experience. We won’t ship unless we are confident we have met or exceeded these standards. We've done everything we can to set ourselves up to be ready and on time to solve unanticipated delays. If something does come up, we will be forthright and transparent about it. Having done 3 successful crowdfunding projects before, we know that we have a very capable team that can solve all different kinds of problems that come our way.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

We expect that Flick will last all users a very long time. The product is designed with high-quality robust materials, in order to keep the product viable for as long as possible.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

All factories have to pass a rigorous supplier evaluation and sign a supplier code of conduct. The supplier code of conduct includes standards around:
• Working Conditions/Health and Safety
• Labor practices
• Discrimination
• Working Hours
• Living wages and Benefits
• Environmental
• International Trade Compliance
• Suppliers/Contractors

Specifically around the environment, regardless of where the supplier is based, the products supplied comply with applicable regulations, such as, but not limited to, REACH, RoHS, CE, and W.A.S.H. (Wage, Age, Safety, Hours). Furthermore, the factories will not produce anything containing dangerous phthalates, such as, but not limited to, DEHP, DBP, DIBP, and BBP. Furthermore, the factories have to confirm that the products offered and delivered have full compliance with:
• EU Regulation 1907/2006
• EU Regulation 528/2012
• EU Regulation 850/2004
• EU Regulation EN71:2013

","Introducing FlickAfter having launched 3 previous successful Kickstarter & Indiegogo projects, we're now happy to introduce Flick.Flick is a patented arm- and wrist rest that provides computer mouse users with better ergonomics. Flick is engineered and designed with physicians, out of published scientific studies, and feedback from thousands of previous customers.Did you know that an average person at work makes up to 7000 mouse clicks every day?While doing this, you also move your arm and wrist in micro-movements with high friction that damages your muscles and tendons.As a result, maintaining your arm in the current position towards your computer mouse without an arm or wrist rest in many cases lead to repetitive strain injuries:The injuries often lead to low productivity, and in some cases might even cause you to stop working entirely.We've engineered and designed a product that provides you with better ergonomics when you are working, in order to ensure healthy computer mouse usage.Our background is in Esports, and we've combined the best from two worlds to bring you the all-in-one solution product.With Flick, you can build a more ergonomic workstation to create a healthier and more productive future for yourself. After all, the workstation is where many of us spend the majority of our time during the days, so it is necessary to create a healthy and sustainable environment.Flick has a built-in-incline that always provides you with an optimal angle towards the computer mouse, no matter where you move your arm. This angle gives you a better ergonomic position to help you sustain a healthy use of your computer mouse while working long hours.Furthermore, Flick is covered with PTFE on the underside to reduce friction towards the surface as much as possible. PTFE is the same material commonly referred to as mouse skates, which are usually placed on the underside of your computer mouse. This means that your arm and hand will have the same friction as your mouse, which will, in turn, allow more effortless movements.Flick is also equipped with memory foam on the inside, to provide extreme comfort, and a custom user experience so that every product is shaped according to the user's arm.The memory foam also naturally induces slight supination of the wrist, which is a better ergonomic position than the normally fully pronated position.Finally, at the front Flick has a rotation support. The rotation support works as a perfect pressure point to relieve pressure from other parts of the arm that would lead to injuries, and ensures that the wrist is in a controlled and safe rotation for better stability. Our new flow design enables you to rotate freely with the rotation support at all times.Flick is placed in front of your computer mouse, and is extremely easy to use. It is highly manageable for all types of work duties, and is designed to fit in at your workstation as a beautiful accessory. It comes in different sizes and two different colors, Obsidian Black & Pearl White.We have a long history with Kickstarter & Indiegogo, and that is the reason why we got started in the first place, and the reason why we can continue to create products that bring great value for our customers. Because of that, we always make sure to create exclusive rewards for our backers, with huge discounts. We try to set the prices as low as possible, in order to provide our amazing crowdfunding community with a unique opportunity.  After the Indiegogoo campaign, Flick will be sold online and in retail stores. The retail prices will differ a lot from the Indiegogo prices. Below is a compilation of the exclusive Indiegogo prices:Early Bird | Flick ($79) - Retail price $139 USD, 45% off (save $60 USD).Indiegogo | Flick ($89) - Retail price $139 USD, 35% off (save $50 USD). Early Bird | Flick Co-worker ($139) - Retail price $278 USD, 50% off (save $139 USD).Indiegogo | Flick Co-worker ($165) - Retail price $278 USD, 40% off (save $113 USD).  Early Bird | Flick Team ($319) - Retail price $695 USD, 55% off (save $376 USD). Indiegogo | Flick Team ($379) - Retail price $695 USD, 45% off (save $316 USD).  Early Bird | Flick Office ($1109) - Retail price $2780 USD, 60% off (save $1671 USD). Indiegogo | Flick Office ($1389) - Retail price $2780 USD, 50% off (save $1391 USD).A team of passionate product developers, engineers, designers, and creative minds who care deeply about our customers, and the future of working ergonomics. We want to create a healthy and productive future for everyone that spends the majority of their day working at a desk. We started out in Esports, and have since the beginning launch several products. The first products were the Gaming Glove & the Gaming Sleeve. After that, we released Xdapter, followed by Xsleeve in November 2020. However, we quickly realized that many of our customers use our products at the office, or at home for work. So we decided it was time to make a product that was better suited for that type of work. After receiving feedback from thousands of users of our previous products, we used all that knowledge to develop Flick. We are so happy to finally share all of our hard work with the world and continue on our mission to create a healthy working environment for everyone. In 2018, we launched our first Kickstarter project. It all started when Oskar Ödmark (founder) suffered from a shoulder injury related to movement with a computer mouse and took a break from gaming, with rehab training for almost 2 years. After struggling for so many years with high friction and unstable movement, he wanted to find a solution for the problems that people encounter every day while using a computer mouse. He then developed the first edition of the Flashe Gaming Glove. For the first time in many years, he didn't feel the stress on the shoulders that he usually would after long hours in front of the computer, and his gameplay was improving drastically. Oskar knew that this was something that could potentially help millions of people around the globe. With a never-ending passion for helping people with repetitive stress injuries, Oskar launched Flashe Gaming Group in 2018. The first Kickstarter campaign became an immediate success, and this enabled Flashe Gaming Group to extend its team and its product portfolio. With new innovation, engineering, and design, we aim to revolutionize the ergonomic industry. The second Kickstarter was Xdapter: 6-in-1 invisible adapter. Xdapter has helped thousands of people around the globe become more minimalistic and enabled them to use their phone at work instead of a laptop.  Finally, in November 2020, we launched Xsleeve: Esports Performance & Ergonomics. Xsleeve is a specially engineered and designed gaming compression arm-sleeve with PTFE on the underside for reduced friction. Xsleeve was delivered to our backers in record-time

column5:
>Carried away by the result, we felt that our immediate care should be to equip Icarus with the best parts. In fact there is a huge variety in the market, that could produce an ""OK"" watch within an expected price. But our wish was to provide something Special at the Best Price.

To do that we had to find a powerful core for our watch, it's power generator.

 

 

ETA 2824-2 Automatic Mvt was the obvious choice. Automatic, tested, durable ,Swiss, used by Breitling, Omega, Tissot, Hamilton and others.         

ETA 2824-2 ensures the THETA Icarus reliability, longevity and accuracy.

THETA Icarus Automatic movement has 25 Jewels.

column27:
>An automatic watch is a living thing, as you soon discover when you hold one for the first time. One of the beauties of them is that the seconds hand travels in a smooth ""sweep"".

 

 

Having secured the ETA 2824-2 Automatic Movement,the next step was to make a Strong, Elegant case to Protect it. So, we chose this Beautiful, Brushed 316L Stainless Steel, with a Screw Down Diamond Crown.
column32:
> 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sapphire glass is created by crystallizing corundum, or aluminium oxide, at temperatures of 4000° F and then by moulding the mixture into clear disks. These disks are then machined to the proper crystal size, polished and perfectly fit to the watch case.

Combined with sapphire crystal at both sides , improved with a Double Anti-reflective Coating. Double Domed: The arch on both sides of the Sapphire Crystal makes it better able to dissipate the forces of impact and once treated with an inner Anti-reflective coating it looks almost like a quality lens, the dial really sharp and clear. The Sapphire Glass width is 38.5 mm.
column33:
>Strength and hardness

With a hardness of 9 on the Mohs scale it has a considerably higher scratch resistance and a resistance to fracture than mineral glass. With these properties, it is only  exceeded by diamond (Mohs hardness of 10).

 

Stereo indexes and minute hands, as well as the markings on the dial are covered with strong luminescence, Super Luminova C3. This makes reading the time easy, is aesthetically pleasing during the day and gives you great visibility at night.

 

 

 

 

                  THETA Icarus Automatic is Water Resistant more than 5 ATM / 50 M.

column86:
>Warranty and Packing

 

For every new purchased watch we grant legal warranty of 2 years.
Warranty contains the remedy of all defects, which are free of charge and referable to material or production defects. Defects and damages on the watch or the strap/bracelet, which are attributable to inappropriate handling or signs of wear, are not covered by our warranty.

Right of withdrawal / cancellation
In the case of non-availability of goods both parties have the right to cancel a purchase.

Right to return unsatisfactory products
Purchased and obtained goods can be returned within 14 days from day of receipt and without giving reasons for the return. As soon as we have checked the watch we will refund the money. This happens rarely as normally all our customers are convinced of the quality delivered. In case of return we kindly ask our customer to cover the costs for the reshipment.
column87:
>Limited Edition

 

The first 300 pieces of the THETA Icarus Automatic Watch will be limited edition pieces and individually numbered. First backed, first served, meaning the earlier you back us, the lower the number you will get. Please note that your backer number does not indicated the number you will receive because of the way production is set and since some backers before you may have purchased multiple watches.

THETA Icarus watches produced after the first 300 watches will not be individually numbered or considered Limited Edition

You will receive the watch in a high quality Wooden box placed in a black inner carton box with THETA logo. 

The box will include: 

THETA Icarus Automatic watch

Certification Card

Warranty card

column90: >The warranty does not cover damage arising from normal wear, scratches, accidents or misuse, or from any alteration by the user, service or repair performed by any party other than THETA Watches.

Ronda has been committed to time for decades now.  Is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of precision electronic watch movements of innovative design. Ronda's quartz movements tick away in a vast range of watches from the elegant to the sporty, in the models of numerous fashion brands and in the exclusive timepieces produced for the luxury market sector.Ronda attaches great value to maintaining its full independence. Their movements are debatably the most accurate in the world and built to last for many years.

column112: >The Winder rotates with brake. It has room for two Automatic Watches.  It can rotate in different directions and speed. There are four rotating programs. You can set the programs by changing the metal speed controller. It's motor is an original Japanese Mabuchi motor. Furthermore it can work with batteries, which are not contained in the packaging.

If we fail to reach the minimum amount of $ 65,000 for launching the products, you will be

factories workload. We know there are a lot of attractive projects out there.

 

We hope that you will help us in our first step.

column136:
>Your Support

 

By pledging you are not just buying a watch, you are supporting our project and helping us make it a reality. There are other ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We need help from a community of friends who love watches and are a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you see here, please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Thank YOU !!!
column141:
>OUR INSPIRATION

 

 

Icarus, is a Greek Mythological Legend, the son of the master craftsman Daedalus, the creator of the Labyrinth. Held against their will, by the King of Crete, Minos, who wanted to keep their genius talent for himself, escaped the island by means of wings constructed by his father.

 

THETA  (uppercase Θ or ϴ, lowercase θ (which resembles digit 0 with horizontal line) or ϑ
column144: UK /ˈθiːtə/, US /ˈθeɪtə/) is the eighth letter of the Greek alphabet, derived from the Phoenician letter Teth . In the system of Greek numerals it has a value of 9.
column145:
>Frequently Asked Questions

 

How the funds will be used?

Our Plan &
column146:
We Need Your Support to build THETA watches!

We are now ready to make THETA Icarus Automatic watches available to our backers. We have completed the final design and all specifications. We have been testing several prototypes and are fully satisfied with the look, feel and quality of the watch. Our manufacturing partners have confirmed that they are ready to start production as soon as we give them the go-ahead. Once we place the order with our suppliers, they will start the manufacturing and assembly of the different parts of the watch. The completed and assembled watches will then be shipped to us for final inspection and testing. The only thing missing is the initial order fee. We need to order a minimum quantity of watches in order to get the best deal and that's where you come in, to make this mission become a reality and it will not happen without your support. By becoming a backer for this project, you help us fund the first production run and make this awesome watch come  to life, not to mention you score a Premium Quality Watch at a huge discount!

If somewhere along the way we find that there is a setback in production, or that we cannot make the timeline, we will keep all of our backers informed. 
In the end, we want to make THETA a long-lasting brand of affordable watches. We will do whatever it takes to fulfill our promises and to deliver watches that will exceed our backers’ expectations!

Thank you! Thank you for your support. Please remember to pledge and make this cool, fun and premium quality watch a reality. It will not happen without your support. 

HOW DO I BUY A THETA WATCH?

On the right side of the campaign, you can see the price of each model. You need to click on the model you want to order. Each watch: has a reference.

Check the pictures to see the reference of the particular watch you are looking at.
You can pay with your credit card.

 

How do I choose my watch/strap after making my contribution?

The available cases for the first 300 watches come in two colors (silver &
column147:
rose gold) and the stripes in three different colors. After the campaign ends you will receive our survey to your e-mail where you will note your choice.

When do I receive my watch?

We plan to start shipments in the end of June 2017

(delivery time for perks)

Do you ship worldwide and how much does it cost?​

We ship worldwide and the shipping is free.

Are there any extra fees?

Our products are manufactured and assembled in Hong Kong, in the best factories we could find. We have to ship from there, and because of this, the customs in your country may stop your package and tax it around 15%. In our experience, around 5 to 10% of our contributors had to pay customs fees. We are already offering free shipping and the customs are different in each country so we  can not  refund you the customs fees.

You can calculate customs fees here:

www.dutycalculator.com

Can I estimate the price in my country’s currency?

You can use the following link to estimate:

https://www.google.com/finance/converter

 

Can you refund me in case I buy a watch and then regret doing so?

Per Indiegogo terms, we cannot refund you. When you make a contribution to our project, we use the money to pay commissions to both Indiegogo and Credit Card fees, and of course for the manufacture of the watch you pre-order. We launch the production of the watch  because you bought it. If you help us with a contribution, be sure you want it, because we will not refund you (unless the project fails). ( Terms of Indiegogo )

When will my card be charged?

 If you’re new to Indiegogo this might be confusing to you but all cards will be charged as soon as the campaign has been officially funded and the time has ran out on the campaign. You should see a charge on your account 3-5 days after the campaign ends

When can I select my watch?

We will be sending out our official survey once our project ends. You will then be able to select your watch and give us your correct shipping instructions.

Who do you use for shipping orders?

We use DHL Express for all international and domestic shipments (excluding PO Box addresses).

How can I order the watch APLOTIS and the items on A LA CARTE MENU list?

At the end of the campaign and given that our goal is reached, every owner of a THETA Icarus Automatic Watch will receive a voucher to use for ordering the item/s of their choice directly from our website (e-shop). Delivery time of these items may vary from the watch’s.

Please read carefully the Indiegogo Terms of use: https://www.indiegogo.com/about/terms

 

 

If we do not succeed in reaching the minimum amount of $ 65,000 for launching the products, you will be refunded. The only  risk is a delay in production. We are working with the best factories, but even if we are a brand, we are also customers, so we are dependent on the factories. We know there are a lot of attractive projects out there - this is not our first ride and we hope that you will help us for a third time.

 

We believe this is going to be a successful one and that you will be part of it.

 

Join us!!


Many thanks to:

Emi Dakou: Administrative Assistant

George Pappas: Web Desighner/Consultant

Fotis Papadopoulos: Graphic Designer 

Paris Panou: Photographer

And the spirit of my Campaign, my girls:

Dion, Argi and Rafa.

 

Please follow us to stay in touch with the brand:

Links:

www.theta-watches.com

https://www.facebook.com/thetawatch/

https://twitter.com/theta_watches

https://www.instagram.com/thetawatches/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCd-v_mXl4W0aFi...

 

","In THETA, we love quality watchmaking. Always seeking watches that are timeless, luxurious and at competitive prices. Through this particular effort we take a step further: Your support will launch the production of the first ICARUS series, 300 individually numbered pieces. This is not an advertising campaign. This effort can not be a success without your help. For the first order $65.000 are required . Your funding supports the production of 300 excellent quality watches, which will fulfill all of your expectations.  Pilot Watch has been the most successful type of watch for more than a century. Since the beginning of man's flying course. Designed with simplicity and purity of indications, it has become a fashionable trend.     We choose only top quality materials, to build a timeless, Swiss Mvt watch at a Really Affordable Price.                                                                     Your support is the key to our project's success. Everything is ready for Icarus to be launched. All it takes is for you and fellow watch enthusiasts to become part of this visionary project and join the THETA Community.  After you pledge, you can continue supporting this project by passing the word to anyone who Shares your passion.                                     Help us Grow and Give Yourself the Opportunity to unlock special perks and upgrade the final product.                 We really hope that you share our love for this great watch, get involved and Join the Icarus.#lets_fly_icarus   New Entry PERK THETA Icarus Japan Automatic Watch from $149  Click Here to enter our contest!! A Blog to Watch PresentationA la découverte de la THETA Icarus You can Find Us on The Gadget Flow Find us on globie           By offering the THETA Icarus Automatic directly via Indiegogo we are able to cut out the retail channel, middlemen markups, brand exclusivity and offer a $599 watch from $299  with 50% discount.  Offering the watches at a price less than half of our competitor's  Seriously, try to find a better watch for a better price, and we’ll match it.   Great News for All THETA Icarus Owners  Exceptional Quality, Full-Featured, Truly Affordable.   This Series is Dedicated to those who live by High Standards and Ideals.Those who aim higher and brake their owns binds.

column1: Watch Our Concept Design VideoWe have been working on freehand sketches which captures the pure lines of the THETA Icarus for months, meticulously caring for every detail, curve and line.  The sketch is then given volume by 3D rendering, followed by two working prototypes.                             Carried away by the result, we felt that our immediate care should be to equip Icarus with the best parts. In fact there is a huge variety in the market, that could produce an ""OK"" watch within an expected price. But our wish was to provide something Special at the Best Price.To do that we had to find a powerful core for our watch, it's power generator.  ETA 2824-2 Automatic Mvt was the obvious choice. Automatic, tested, durable ,Swiss, used by Breitling, Omega, Tissot, Hamilton and others.         ETA 2824-2 ensures the THETA Icarus reliability, longevity and accuracy.                                                       Jewels are synthetically produced rubies, which are used to reduce friction in the main bearings of the moving parts of a watch movement. For complicated watches such as with automatic winding,  the number of jewels necessarily increases.THETA Icarus Automatic movement has 25 Jewels.  ETA 2824-2 operates at the Swiss standard 28,800 beats per hour.    Regulator System ETACHRON and Regulator Collector    The handmade rotor is included in THETA Icarus Automatic with engraved THETA logo.  An automatic watch is a living thing, as you soon discover when you hold one for the first time. One of the beauties of them is that the seconds hand travels in a smooth ""sweep"".  Having secured the ETA 2824-2 Automatic Movement,the next step was to make a Strong, Elegant case to Protect it. So, we chose this Beautiful, Brushed 316L Stainless Steel, with a Screw Down Diamond Crown.            Sapphire glass is created by crystallizing corundum, or aluminium oxide, at temperatures of 4000° F and then by moulding the mixture into clear disks. These disks are then machined to the proper crystal size, polished and perfectly fit to the watch case.Combined with sapphire crystal at both sides , improved with a Double Anti-reflective Coating. Double Domed: The arch on both sides of the Sapphire Crystal makes it better able to dissipate the forces of impact and once treated with an inner Anti-reflective coating it looks almost like a quality lens, the dial really sharp and clear. The Sapphire Glass width is 38.5 mm.Strength and hardnessWith a hardness of 9 on the Mohs scale it has a considerably higher scratch resistance and a resistance to fracture than mineral glass. With these properties, it is only  exceeded by diamond (Mohs hardness of 10). Stereo indexes and minute hands, as well as the markings on the dial are covered with strong luminescence, Super Luminova C3. This makes reading the time easy, is aesthetically pleasing during the day and gives you great visibility at night.                      THETA Icarus Automatic is Water Resistant more than 5 ATM / 50 M.           The THETA Icarus secures on the wrist with a Double Butterfly Deployant Stainless Steel Buckle which carries the engraved THETA logo.     Each THETA Icarus watch is equipped with an advance Italian, Anti-allergic, Genuine  Calf Leather strap, allowing you to enjoy a luxurious feeling.This leather will last for ages and is very comfortable to wear.Each strap also has what we call “Quick Release Pins” so you can change your strap in just a few seconds without any tools.     Domed Anti-reflective Sapphire Glass at front and Anti-reflective Sapphire Glass at back, you are given the opportunity to admire the Harmonious Motion of the Heart of the New THETA Icarus Automatic Watch.    Our classical design ensures a Durable Construction for years to come.  THETA Icarus isn't a smart watch. It has Heart and Soul, like YOU.                               THETA Icarus Series In the beginning of the campaign we will have two different cases: silver and rose gold, plus two different colour bands: black and brown.Furthermore, THETA offers the option of engraving a Message on the back case or a Name to every new owner of THETA Icarus watch. This option will be available once we reach the milestone of 500 produced units.  TESTINGAll watches and movements are tested for accuracy, water resistance and durability.   ASSEMBLINGOur watchmakers will take great care during the assembly of your THETA watch.   Wear Your Personal Style on Your Wrist    For HimProvided in a variety of cases, bezel and band colours, at the size of 43 mm, Icarus is the ideal choice for a masculine, sport or casual style.   For HerBut according to fashion trends it would suit perfectly on a woman's wrist, just as well.     A Luxury Time-peace For Every Moment   Do not compromise - Get the Best    Warranty and Packing For every new purchased watch we grant legal warranty of 2 years.Warranty contains the remedy of all defects, which are free of charge and referable to material or production defects. Defects and damages on the watch or the strap/bracelet, which are attributable to inappropriate handling or signs of wear, are not covered by our warranty.Right of withdrawal / cancellationIn the case of non-availability of goods both parties have the right to cancel a purchase.Right to return unsatisfactory productsPurchased and obtained goods can be returned within 14 days from day of receipt and without giving reasons for the return. As soon as we have checked the watch we will refund the money. This happens rarely as normally all our customers are convinced of the quality delivered. In case of return we kindly ask our customer to cover the costs for the reshipment. Limited Edition The first 300 pieces of the THETA Icarus Automatic Watch will be limited edition pieces and individually numbered. First backed, first served, meaning the earlier you back us, the lower the number you will get. Please note that your backer number does not indicated the number you will receive because of the way production is set and since some backers before you may have purchased multiple watches.THETA Icarus watches produced after the first 300 watches will not be individually numbered or considered Limited EditionYou will receive the watch in a high quality Wooden box placed in a black inner carton box with THETA logo. The box will include: THETA Icarus Automatic watchCertification CardWarranty card     The watch is covered by a 2 years guarantee against manufacturing or material defects. We will, within two years from date of purchase, repair or replace the movement of your watch free of charge if the movement proves to be defective in material or workmanship under normal use.  The warranty does not cover damage arising from normal wear, scratches, accidents or misuse, or from any alteration by the user, service or repair performed by any party other than THETA Watches.  Help us Grow and Give Yourself the Opportunity to unlock Special Perks.  Simplicity meets High Quality ""The Beauty of Style, Harmony, Grace and Rhythm derive from Simplicity"". Plato On the most complicated of days, anything that can simplify your life is a very good thing. And that's one of the reasons THETA 's New Swiss Guartz Mvt watch feels so appealing right now: At a glance, it can tell you the present second, minute, hour and day.   Ronda has been committed to time for decades now.  Is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of precision electronic watch movements of innovative design. Ronda's quartz movements tick away in a vast range of watches from the elegant to the sporty, in the models of numerous fashion brands and in the exclusive timepieces produced for the luxury market sector.Ronda attaches great value to maintaining its full independence. Their movements are debatably the most accurate in the world and built to last for many years.   RONDA Caliber 505 Features        ACCESSORIES Luxury Piano Wooden Box: Elegant Piano Wooden Box with leather trim on the inside.  THETA Air WinderTHETA Icarus Needs to be stored in a Watch Winder when not in use. While an automatic watch doesn't require winding if you wear it regularly, if you don't, you'll need to store it in a Watch Winder. THETA's Air Winder Features :The Winder rotates with brake. It has room for two Automatic Watches.  It can rotate in different directions and speed. There are four rotating programs. You can set the programs by changing the metal speed controller. It's motor is an original Japanese Mabuchi motor. Furthermore it can work with batteries, which are not contained in the packaging. THETA Air CaseTHETA Air Case is a Genuine Leather Pouch with four positions for your watches or straps and one for THETA Air Tool.In the outer part the pouch  is decorated with THETA's logo. THETA Air Tool  With Air Tool you can change very easily a strap from one watch to another in few seconds.THETA Mini ToolThe easiest way to change your strap.   Our Model A non traditional method which ensures considerable benefits for you. Furthermore, it will give you the ability to have direct communication on any matter or need concerning your THETA.The overwhelming majority of watches on the market today are grossly overpriced. By skipping the middleman and selling directly to you, we are able to cut the retail price considerably.Post Funding This is where Indiegogo comes in. We need your continued support to launch this specific line of watches. We are raising funding specifically for further R&D, manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for the THETA Icarus Automatic Watch collection.  Your support for the production of these affordable, quality watches will also make them available to all in the future. And of course, you will be the first to own a THETA Icarus Automatic Watch. Thank you for taking the time to check out our project.   First time to Indiegogo? 1. Decide how many THETA Icarus Watches you would like to purchase then click the pink      button that says, ""GET THIS PERK.""2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.3. Receive and fill out the survey for color choices via email4. When we receive your color choices we will prepare your watch. 5. You receive your order and your new asset is effortlessly in your hands   Payment Method If we reach our goal, contributions received via PayPal are held until our campaign's deadline . If we do not reach our goal, all contributions will be refunded within 3-5 business days of campaign's end. ANY RISKS  If we fail to reach the minimum amount of $ 65,000 for launching the products, you will berefunded. The only risk is a delay in production. We are working with the best factories, buteven though we are a brand, we are also customers, so our production line depends on thefactories workload. We know there are a lot of attractive projects out there. We hope that you will help us in our first step.  Shipping And TaxesFree Worldwide Shipping for All.               The estimated delivery time of the product depends on your country.         Please be aware that international customers are still responsible for duties charged by their respective countries. You can have more information on:www.dutycalculator.com Your Support By pledging you are not just buying a watch, you are supporting our project and helping us make it a reality. There are other ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We need help from a community of friends who love watches and are a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you see here, please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Thank YOU !!!   OUR INSPIRATION  Icarus, is a Greek Mythological Legend, the son of the master craftsman Daedalus, the creator of the Labyrinth. Held against their will, by the King of Crete, Minos, who wanted to keep their genius talent for himself, escaped the island by means of wings constructed by his father. THETA  (uppercase Θ or ϴ, lowercase θ (which resembles digit 0 with horizontal line) or ϑ
column4: UK /ˈθiːtə/, US /ˈθeɪtə/) is the eighth letter of the Greek alphabet, derived from the Phoenician letter Teth . In the system of Greek numerals it has a value of 9. Frequently Asked Questions How the funds will be used?Our Plan & We Need Your Support to build THETA watches!We are now ready to make THETA Icarus Automatic watches available to our backers. column1:
0,"

Hello Indiegog community. I want to introduce to you the Kik Clip.

As a father of three young children I was always dealing with my kids trying to get their shoes on to go to school, practices, and everything else. I must have smashed my index finger countless time trying to get my kids shoes on. I knew that I was not not the only parent that had these issues. It was also to much for me to expect my young kids to use a shoe horn on a daily basis. My kids also never untied there shoes to get the shoes on. My older son had ruined many pairs of shoes by his constant mashing of his feet into his shoes.

I had been doing my research for over a year going back forth whether I had a viable idea. I realized after talking to tons of parents my kids weren't the only ones who had these same issues. I finally decided to go for it and see if I could make a better shoe horn!

I need to raise money for the Tooling and initial production run. The tooling is the most expensive part of this project is alway the largest initial cost. Depending on the volume ordered the cost can come down.

I also need to have enough capital to make the first initial order which will be a minimum of 1,000 pieces.

column2: >These are the parts you are looking for!
column3:
>

Saber enthusiasts know all too well the ultimate thrill of a customised, self-designed saber, but previously in the UK and Europe we have been limited. Reliant on overseas companies to supply the high quality parts needed, the shipping costs, delivery times and customs charges seriously affect the financial viability of creating that perfect saber.

Speaking from personal experience there is nothing more frustrating than having to order one small part or having to order numerous small batches because items are temporarily out of stock, each time paying high shipping fees and charges that are beyond the suppliers' control.

Our goal is to raise the capital to manufacture mass-produced parts and set up a UK-based online shop. This will allow us to provide saber enthusiasts, hobbyists, cosplayers, and duelists with a wide selection of interchangeable, modular parts to create beautiful, yet durable pieces of equipment. 

Over the last 6 months we have invested heavily, both in terms of finances, effort and time, in samples from a range of  companies to ensure  we found the right manufacturer to bring you impeccable high quality parts. Our manufacturer is  now ready and waiting to produce the components for us as soon as we reach our funding goal.

It is our belief that we bring you the first modular cross guard pieces. Whilst some  manufacturers offer completed cross guard sabers, to our knowledge no one else gives you the opportunity to create your own personalised cross guard.

Our modular system will allow you to use any of the emitters, bodies, pommels and accessories in our range leaving you completely free to create a unique design.


              

Our hilt pieces will form a standalone system  not compatible with any existing modular systems available on the market. The parts will come in polished aluminium then anodised silver to achieve superior scratch resistance and making them more hard-wearing than standard aluminium parts. 

If we are successfully funded we will also be offering single colour powder-coating, in a range of colours, for a small additional cost (sorry but this will not be available on backer perks). 

The majority of our pieces will have an outside diameter of 37mm and an internal diameter of 30mm as standard, meaning that they will have the strength to withstand even the heaviest duelling.

Right from launch we will be offering a great selection of parts to ensure that the number of possible hilt designs, you can come up with, is endless. When choosing your pledge reward pieces you will be able to pick from the following:

• 17 Emitters

• 10 Pommels

• More than 15 Main body pieces, varying between 10-23cm in length

• A wide selection of choke, extension and adaptor pieces
column13: >You can choose the parts for your backer perk from the selection here:
column14:
target=""_blank"">https://www.flickr.com/gp/141311114@N05/6gn62C

We don't plan to stop there though. After launch our passion to continue to design new pieces will ensure we are constantly updating our offerings and we fully commit to working with our customers,  bringing you the designs you want to see. 

Our investement in a 3D printer enables us to  print prototypes of new pieces, before they go into production whilst also producing our own battery sleds, speaker holders and eventually crystal chambers.

The parts will come in polished aluminium then anodised silver to achieve superior scratch resistance and making them more hard-wearing than standard aluminium parts. If we are successfully funded we will also be offering single colour powder-coating, in a range of colours, for a small additional cost (sorry but this will not be available on backer perks). The majority of our pieces will have an outside diameter of 37mm and an internal diameter of 30mm as standard, meaning that they will have the strength to withstand even the heaviest duelling.Right from launch we will be offering a great selection of parts to ensure that the number of possible hilt designs, you can come up with, is endless. When choosing your pledge reward pieces you will be able to pick from the following:• 17 Emitters• 10 Pommels• More than 15 Main body pieces, varying between 10-23cm in length• A wide selection of choke, extension and adaptor piecesYou can choose the parts for your backer perk from the selection here: https://www.flickr.com/gp/141311114@N05/6gn62CWe don't plan to stop there though. After launch our passion to continue to design new pieces will ensure we are constantly updating our offerings and we fully commit to working with our customers,  bringing you the designs you want to see. Our investement in a 3D printer enables us to  print prototypes of new pieces, before they go into production whilst also producing our own battery sleds, speaker holders and eventually crystal chambers.We aim to provide exceptional service supplying a range of QUALITY modular hilt parts, for a FAIR price, with QUICK delivery times but we need your help to make this possible...Obi Wan Kenobi isn't our only hope, YOU are!",7.0,1,"1 Campaign

Hi my name is Joshua Miller and I'm the creator of X. I created x because I hated bulky wallets.

",Hi my name is Joshua Miller and I'm the creator of X. I created x because I hated bulky wallets.,0.0,0,"1 Campaign
Well, Madeleine, our visionary-sock-dreaming co-founder, is a little Frenchie who's loved stylish socks since childhood.
After working with designer Marc Jacobs in Paris she was given the opportunity to move to the US. She arrived full of energy, looking to conquer her new world.
It was at her first home, an Airbnb that openly welcomed her to NYC, that she met Josh, our other socks-loving co-founder. The two felt an instant connection and a year later they were married.
Josh, working in Finance at the time, had a background in entrepreneurship and decided to team up with Madeleine to fulfill her life-long dream of starting a sock brand… thus L’énoncé was born.
Give your feet the luxury they deserve, drape them in the softest piece of art. They will feel like a million bucks without breaking the bank.
We want to provide you with THE BEST socks experience. Here is how we do it:

Our premium bamboo fiber is considered one of the softest fibers on the market (5x softer than cotton). This innovative yarn is fine but strong, giving your feet the best of both worlds: a light sock made to last.

We are manufactured in China, where our bamboo is grown. We teamed up with a knowledgable factory, that is engaged in producing high end socks while also pay attention to the protection of our living environment.

The design approch at L’énoncé is different than most other socks companies. We don’t use a computer generated pattern, we see our designs 3 dimentionally. We create them like we would a sculpture, like a real piece of art where each little detail is purposly and preciselly placed. Our socks are one-of-a-kind designs.
Crowdfunding will allow us to get enough initial orders to secure the large quantity production that our factory is asking for.
Fundraising will go towards production, manufacturing, building online presence and website, and then finally shipping you the beautiful product we came up with.
We also hope that if we get higher funding we can develop and produce more exciting and exclusive designs.
At l'énoncé, we want to ensure that our customers get the best experience shopping with us and, later on, wearing our socks.

That is why we have devoted about a year to the of preparation for this launch.
We spent time researching, designing, developing our socks and improving them, establishing logistics and executing pre-production runs to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience to our backers.

With any high volume production run, the biggest risk is timing. We've run a pre production batch of socks to ensure that our manufacturer can deliver an amazing product on time. We have also added some buffer time to our timetable to ensure that our socks arrive to you with no delays. We will be extremely transparent and open in regards to updates on the status of production and shipment.

Our manufacturer has years of experience producing high quality socks, especially in bamboo fiber. They work with some of the biggest brands in the industry and have the capability, scale and expertise to meet our demand.
Finally, please keep an eye out for our survey in order for us to deliver our socks on time. We will be messaging you through indiegogo and your email.

column5: >We've always known that we wanted to be parents. After we were married in 2013, we started to explore what our path to fatherhood might look like.
column18: >We believe that creating and building a family is one of the most important things we can do in life. As two men, starting a family meant we would have a long road ahead of us and a lot to consider. After many conversations and research on all of the options available to us, we decided to try to start our family through gestational surrogacy.
column22: >We value honesty. We believe in a community with diverse perspectives. We strive for authenticity and compassion. We practice altruism. And we're going to be awesome dads. We have the resources to raise and care for child, but we don't have the resources to bring that child to us.
column26:
>We are asking for support from the thousands of people out there who understand the meaning of family and connection. We are seeking to make this dream a reality and we can not do it with out you.

Why gestational surrogacy?
column30: >We have been talking about starting a family almost the entire time that we’ve been together, and have been more seriously working towards that goal since we got married two years ago. We have had many long, difficult conversations with each other and with various professionals in order to understand all of our options. We know that we want to start a family based on openness and honesty, and one built on life-long connection and stability.
column34: >Deciding whether to pursue adoption or surrogacy first was a difficult choice, as they both offer the option of starting a family built on life-long connection and stability. They both also have steep costs associated with them, depending on the particular path taken (domestic or international adoption, infant or an older child, first-time surrogate or proven surrogate, etc). Ultimately, it was a personal decision that we needed to make in terms of which option felt like the better fit for us. We are not opposed to adoption in any way. But we have decided to pursue gestational surrogacy for now.
column38: >What are the costs of gestational surrogacy?
column42: >Below is a summary of the expenses based on our research and meetings with various local surrogacy agencies and reproductive medicine clinics.

column7: >Surrogacy Agency Fees, Screening Costs, Legal Fees: $19,000 – $25,000
>Fertility, In-Vitro Fertilization, Embryo Transfer, and Other Medical Fees: $45,000
>Variable Expenses Deposit (to cover unexpected medical or surrogate personal expenses): $20,000

column6: >Total Costs: $120,000 – $125,000
column11:
>Our goal of $75,000 will help us to get started with this process.

How can you help?

Some people say that it takes a village to raise a child. In our case, it will take a village to help us to have a child. As two men, there is no easy road to starting a family for us. While we have the resources to raise a child, we do not have the resources to bring that child to us. So, we're asking for a little help from our friends and family, and from the crowdfunding community.
If you believe that love is what makes a family, please support our journey by donating.
Thank you!
column15: >For more information about our journey, follow our blog at www.twobeardsandababy.com

Mainstream economic theory teaches us that capitalism is an economic system which incentivizes people to use their energies, resources and talents in the most efficient and socially beneficial ways possible.  World Wide Scrotes, and the Scrote'n'Tote are perfect examples of this theory in action.

Last year this
column18: target=""_blank"">photo of me waiting in line to see the
column27: target=""_blank"">Tim and Eric live show went viral, including buzzfeed articles and facebook posts from Ludacris and
column29:
__mref=message"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Tommy Lee.

Since then, thousands of requests to acquire this life changing product have poured in.  As a result, out of a sense of profound humanitarianism, I and several friends have had to interrupt our lives in order to fully dedicate our lives to the production of lifelike, hideous, giant scrotum backpacks. 

Great job, capitalism!

column1: The aim of this campaign is to solve one of humanity's most urgent and pressing problems: the complete lack of fully functional, realistic human scrotum apparel available in the world today.
Although the video may suggest otherwise, this is an actual and legitimate project.
The aim of this campaign is to produce sturdy, functional, durable, high quality and of course stylish Scrote'n'Tote backpacks to be made available to aesthetes  all over the world.

The funding goal of $33,000 will cover the cost of producing the mold for the skin textured part of the bag, which is the biggest pre-production expense.  The money also covers various research costs including testing out different materials, different methods for attaching the skin part to the backpack part, producing various prototypes, quality tests, trying out different production facilities in different locations to see who can make the best product, etc.  Once we have enough sales to produce the first run, they'll be made and shipped, from various distribution centres on different continents, so as to keep shipping costs reasonable to most countries.

The Scrote'n'Tote pre-prototype you see in the images was produced by hand by special effects prosthetics artist C.J. Goldman and is too heavy and delicate to be used as a proper backpack, on top of costing almost $1000 to produce per bag, which is why we can't use that method or materials.

Once we've produced something functional and sturdy that looks as close to the original as possible, we'll sell the Scrote'n'Totes online for $120 USD each, plus shipping.  However, everyone who donated $10 will be entitled to buy one for only $69 plus shipping, as well as getting the satisfaction of knowing that they helped bring the gift of scrotes into the world.
There's also the option to put the whole $69 down right away which saves you the extra $10 - this will entitle you to get one Scrote'n'Tote for the cost of shipping once they are produced.

The bag was designed by me, but sculpted and made by prosthetic makeup artist C.J. Goldman, who has worked on many well known films, including the X-Men Apocalypse, The Hobbit, 300, Terminator 3, the Conan and Dawn of the Dead remakes among many others. This is not a joke, check IMDB.

column7: >The main challenge is to make sure the final product looks as close to the prototype as possible while being fully functional, spacious, lightweight, durable etc. There will be some experimentation with various materials, though by now we have a pretty good idea of which materials will be used and what the costs will be.  The main risk in terms of aesthetics is that at this point we don't know if we'll be able to mass produce a hairy version or not.  Meanwhile in terms of business plan, the main challenge is to sell enough Scrotes!

>Thankfully, one of the main advisors in this endeavour actually runs a handbag manufacturing company so we have a very realistic understanding of the costs, work and processes involved, and thus these numbers are based on years of experience in the field of handbag and backpack production, not just random estimates, or second hand opinions.
>Note that this is a ""fixed funding"" campaign, which means that if we don't reach our funding goal, everyone gets an instant refund.

column9: >このクラウドファンディングプロジェクト（基金計画）の目的は、人類の最も差し迫った緊急の問題：
>今この世の中で機能的で現実的な人間陰嚢衣類が完全に欠如しているという問題を解決することです。
>あなたの寄付金が、頑丈で高品質且つスタイリッシュ なスクロタントート（陰嚢リュックサック）を世界中のお目の高い方々に入手可能にできます。

column1: 可能な限りオリジナルに近い機能的で頑丈な品物を作り出した場合、インターネット上で一つ120アメリカドル＋送料でスクロタントート（陰嚢リュックサック）を販売します。しかし、10アメリカドル寄付して下さった皆さんは、一つたったの69アメリカドル＋送料で購入可能であり、又、スクロウトというギフトを世界へもらせたという満足感を得ていただくことができます。
資金調達目標額（約$ 33,000 アメリカドル相当）は、生産前段階の最大の必要経費であるバックの皮膚感を作り出す為の費用に使われます。寄付金は、色々な素材や様々な方法でスキンパーツをリュックサック部分に繋げる様にできるかを試験したり、どの製造会社が最高級の品物を作り出すことができるかを見極める為に異なる場所での種々の製造設備を試したり等の様々な小規模の調査費用にもあてがわれます。
映像でご覧になったスクロタントート（陰嚢リュックサック）原型は、特殊メイクアーティストのCJゴールドマンによって手がけられたものです。
あの原型は、映画の小道具として作成され、約＄1,000（千ドル＝10万相当）の費用を用い特有なリュックサックとして使用される為に重く繊細に作られていた為に同様の製作方法や素材を使用することができません。

column9: >主な課題は、最終製品が機能的でバッグの中に十分なスペースがあり、軽量で耐久性があり、できるだけ原型に近い様相の仕上がりになることです。
>ありがたいことに、この企画に携わっているパートナーの一人は、ハンドバッグの製造会社運営を援助している為、私達は関与コスト、作業やプロセスに関してとても現実的な理解を持っています。従って、これらの数字は不特定な見積もりや人づての見解ではなく、ハンドバッグやリュックサック生産の分野で長年の経験に基づいていたものです。
>多様な素材にて幾つかのテストがこれから行われますが、この時点で唯一重要なことは私達が毛の部分をもっと優れた見た目にできるか、それとも最終製品が無毛の状態になるかということです。
>唯一の他の主なリスクとは、新製品開発に伴う通常起こりうる予測不可能な事や障害がもたらたす生産スケジュールの遅延です。

このクラウドファンディングプロジェクト（基金計画）の目的は、人類の最も差し迫った緊急の問題：
今この世の中で機能的で現実的な人間陰嚢衣類が完全に欠如しているという問題を解決することです。
あなたの寄付金が、頑丈で高品質且つスタイリッシュ なスクロタントート（陰嚢リュックサック）を世界中のお目の高い方々に入手可能にできます。
可能な限りオリジナルに近い機能的で頑丈な品物を作り出した場合、インターネット上で一つ120アメリカドル＋送料でスクロタントート（陰嚢リュックサック）を販売します。しかし、10アメリカドル寄付して下さった皆さんは、一つたったの69アメリカドル＋送料で購入可能であり、又、スクロウトというギフトを世界へもらせたという満足感を得ていただくことができます。
資金調達目標額（約$ 33,000 アメリカドル相当）は、生産前段階の最大の必要経費であるバックの皮膚感を作り出す為の費用に使われます。寄付金は、色々な素材や様々な方法でスキンパーツをリュックサック部分に繋げる様にできるかを試験したり、どの製造会社が最高級の品物を作り出すことができるかを見極める為に異なる場所での種々の製造設備を試したり等の様々な小規模の調査費用にもあてがわれます。
映像でご覧になったスクロタントート（陰嚢リュックサック）原型は、特殊メイクアーティストのCJゴールドマンによって手がけられたものです。
あの原型は、映画の小道具として作成され、約＄1,000（千ドル＝10万相当）の費用を用い特有なリュックサックとして使用される為に重く繊細に作られていた為に同様の製作方法や素材を使用することができません。
主な課題は、最終製品が機能的でバッグの中に十分なスペースがあり、軽量で耐久性があり、できるだけ原型に近い様相の仕上がりになることです。
ありがたいことに、この企画に携わっているパートナーの一人は、ハンドバッグの製造会社運営を援助している為、私達は関与コスト、作業やプロセスに関してとても現実的な理解を持っています。従って、これらの数字は不特定な見積もりや人づての見解ではなく、ハンドバッグやリュックサック生産の分野で長年の経験に基づいていたものです。
多様な素材にて幾つかのテストがこれから行われますが、この時点で唯一重要なことは私達が毛の部分をもっと優れた見た目にできるか、それとも最終製品が無毛の状態になるかということです。
唯一の他の主なリスクとは、新製品開発に伴う通常起こりうる予測不可能な事や障害がもたらたす生産スケジュールの遅延です。",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

The BERNICCE Movement

BERNICCE is a fashion brand with a French high fashion character, born in Paris to redefine the worldwide luxury concept, by merging the high fashion and the Parisian streetwear style.

High Fashion

VOGUE assures that haute couture (high fashion) was born at the end of the XIX century in Paris and it is the most genteel version of fashion. High fashion is more than exclusivity, it is an space where fashion designers can translate its creativity and expressiveness to designs carefully crafted.  In order to be considered as part of haute couture firms need to present at least two collections per year in Paris, with 35 different looks, between day and night designs. It is necessary to have an atelier with no less than 20 artisans working full time and dedicate between 100 and 1000 hours per each garment. The designer must guarantee the exclusivity of the fabrics used, and each clothing needs to be custom to each client, who will have to perform three tests before the delivery.

Along the first half of the XX Century the French haute couture growth quite fast and it reach its golden period with the consolidation of firms such as Dior, from Christian Dior, Channel, from Coco Chanel, or Balenciaga, from Cristobal Balenciaga, among others. The effects of the Second World War reduced the number of people who were able to afford high fashion clothes, and the haute couture went through its lowest hours. Pierre Cardin was one of the pioneers to promote a new system of patterns which allowed designs to be mass produced and expose them in shops, in different sizes, ready to be dressed.

Now a days the lines of great fashion firms such as Channel or Dolce &
column2:
Gabbana present yearly their prêt-à-porter collections, more accessible than the haute couture designs, but still with a high quality. The collections are mass produced, in different sizes, but still not affordable for everyone.

 

Mission, Vision, Values

MISSION

To reinvent the high fashion style bringing innovation and inspiration to fashion lovers, by creating clothing through the fusion of the concepts of streetwear and the elegance. Sell exclusive clothing, ahead of trends to come, adapted to the needs of our clients.

VISION

Our vision is to become more than a brand, be a movement that joints the best from high fashion and the streetwear style, by providing to our clients, prestige, exclusivity and innovation. And do it through a sustainable process along all our value chain, inspiring our stakeholders, specially our employees, to do their best for the brand.

VALUES

Our main values are the following:

column1: Passion: our team has deep commitment to a project in which we strongly believe and demonstrate it through our loyalty to the brand. We put a special affection and care that can be seen in each of our pieces of clothing, achieving the quality expected from our clients.

Innovation: our passion for the project leads us to look for creative and innovative solutions in order to advance and evolve. The haute couture is part of a golden past of fashion, so that, in order to recover its essence, it is necessary to be creative and use new formulas that allow us to connect it with the contemporary streetwear style.

Excellence: we seek perfection in each minimal detail that comes out our firm, by applying the best practices in terms of management and the achievement of our goals. It is based on our both goal and client-oriented vision, leadership, perseverance and mutually beneficial alliances.

Closeness: The decisions made by our clients are based on emotion and instinct, so that our brand is committed to appeal and connect to people’s emotions. We want our clients to share the Bernicce movement values. For us is quite important to create strong emotional connection which allows us to understand better our clients and make them see the reflect of their lifestyle in our brand.

Curiosity: our employees have curiosity about the aspirations of our customers, that is why they seek for the design and production of innovative clothing that fit their most exquisite demands. Because of that they explore, learn and imagine how the brand can grow and reach its goals.

 

 

Design and Fabric

We have designed a checklist that all our items need to have in order to be considered a Bernicce clothing ready to be send to our clients.

We only select the premium functional fabric and components on each detail to provide the guarantees for both functional features and comfy wearing feeling

 

How does it work?

 

Whatever the occasion, BERNICCE clothes are ready to wear

If you need to pick an item from your closet, Bernicce clothes should be one of your first thoughts. All the clothing has been designed in order to be versatile, no matters if you are going to a casual activity or going out for party, by combining Bernicce clothes with your favourite ones, you will be ready.

 

Easy iron

Thanks to the high-quality fabrics we use, you do not need to worry again either for your seasonal closet change, when travelling abroad with your case full of Bernicce clothing, or after washing the item at home. Our products are quite easy to iron so it will not take much time to have the clothing ready for going out.

 

Hydrophobic fabrics

We use a special type of fabric which is capable to refuse the water or other liquid that may fall on it, producing a mercury effect, allowing you to keep dry and prevents your clothes from getting stained with any liquid that could fall. Now you can wear our clothes without worrying if something could dirty the clothes such as when having dinner or going out for party, our clothes will keep free of any liquid.

         Classic               Hydrophobic
column2:
/>

 

     

 

 

 

All our stakeholders’ matters

We have developed a sustainable value chain since all our process, from design to delivery, is done by proximity suppliers.

1. Our pieces are designed by a haute couture located in Barcelona by using the traditional techniques in its atelier.

2. The designs are sent to our production workshop which will cut all the pieces of fabric and joint them handcrafted taking care of each of the piece details and complements.

3. The packaging has been designed by a local company with 100% sustainable raw materials.

4. We deliver all our products through a local network of deliverers.

 

BERNICCE's Club

Bernicce’s Club is a society founded for those clients closest to the brand. For every purchase made at Bernicce customers will receive Bernicce Points. These points will be accumulated by a loyalty card, with a member number. Depending on the number of points, customers will be part of different categories of members, which will give them access to different advantages such as accessing exclusive collections of the brand or having access to new designs before other buyers. Club members in the higher categories will also have access to VIO events, exclusive limited-edition products and other VIP experiences. In order to stay in this Club, customers must accumulate a minimum number of points during the year, obtained through purchases of Bernicce garments.

 

Corporate Social Responsibility

 

Risks and Goals

Before the project launch, we have prepared a production plan with our manufacturing partners. The first design of the clothing has been done thanks to a partnership with a haute couture atelier and its creative designer, so we are confident we can fulfil this project and its goals. However, some unforeseen challenges or problems could still happen, especially in these uncertain years and the worldwide pandemic we are suffering. When an investor trusts us and invest in Kickstarter, a commitment between him and the Bernicce team is created, the commitment of work in order to create our products and send to them.

 

About Us

 

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

 

Legal advice

Individuals (IRPF)

According to the Spanish Law 29/1987, de 18 de diciembre, del Impuesto sobre Sucesiones y Donaciones, the donation done can be deducted from the yearly IRPF declaration. In the first 150€ of the donation, the deduction is 80%, that is, 120€. In amounts over 150€, the deduction is 80% for the first 150€ and 35% for the remaining amount

Legal persons (Corporate Tax)

The reduction will be 35% if it has only been donated in the year corresponding to the declaration, or 40% in the declaration if it has been donated in the 2 previous years.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

column1: • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
