column2:
>The Best and Safest Backpack by G-Design!

            

Every year thousands of cyclist are injured or killed on roads. Cyclists, never worry about this as we have created the safest cycling backpack. Key features of this backpack are the signals, that make aware other road users.                                                                                                                                 G-Design Backpack improve visibility, reduces accidents and save lives! Integrated turn signals make sure driver know where you-re making a turn, and the warning sign make other road users aware that you are breaking or stopping on the road.
column3: >

column2: >                                                    SIZE OF THE BACKPACK

column1: Backpack Material: Nylon Fabric and Oxford Fabric
Battery Type: Rechargeable 650 mah built in lithium battery
Turn signal Pattern: forward, left, right and stop/break
LED Lights fitted in the turning signals to keep you safe making aware other road users
Remote Control wireless can transmit up to 5 metres from the backpack, depending on the surroundings. Easy to operate with five buttons and can easily fit with cycle hand grip.
The G-Design Vest can be used for your protection while jogging or cycling. Especially at night, it can make you more visible to other road users

A special feature of this Vest is that it can be attached to any backpack. You can use your own backpack attaching out Vest that will make you fell more secure and more aware other road users while turning
Vest used as Single
We have been in close contact with the factory and they are ready to start the production of our backpacks once the project is funded.
In the last few months we have been analyzing the cycling backpack and the vest in close details, in order to offer the best backpacks to our pledgers.
We have received samples of both of the products and we are satisfied with the quality. Please remember that we offer a 180 days warranty on our products in order to protect our pledgers.

Our challenge will be the shipping time, and not the production time. We hope that all the backpacks will be delivered even before our set month target. By mid-May the production will be completed and the backpack will be out to be shipped.

We have learnt from our previous mistakes and we are confident we will offer the best quality of products to our customers.
We are happy to answer any enquiry from you and all messages will be replied within 24 hours.

Hi there! We are Herban Turtl. Currently,We is just Me. But I'm hoping that you'll stick around long enough to learn about the concept and find it either relates to you or someone you know. I wouldn't want to waste your time or money on anything that you can't relate to so it makes this my risk
column2:
my gamble.

 

The Business Concept 

Herban Turtl is a clothing brand with the optimistic idea to start a new kind of market for fashion. Influenced by #hashtagactivism, we will:

column1: • Represent products that promote awareness on social issues in 'Merica.
• With each purchase, monetary support will be given to those who are active in the community and are working to relieve the issues at hand.

This isn't new news. Clothing and apparel companies have started supporting causes more regularly. However, many times, the company dedicates all efforts to one cause or a series of relatable causes. This is where We will expand. Why give all the attention to one matter when there are many out there that need addressing? Why not house all social causes under one label? The two connections each issue will have to each other are that they are issues brought to matter by society, and that they are happening right here in 'Merica.

How We Can Reach Multiple Issues  

Our strategy is to launch a series of product campaigns. Each campaign will offer a fresh design that relates to a social issue. During the lifespan of the campaign:
• Make monetary contributions to the organizations that show the most success in research or in methods of resolving the issue.
• So basically, the more products we sell within a campaign, the more funds we can provide to each organization.

We Need Support!

Some people who are interested simply can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help! Not only do we need monetary support, but we also need a pay-it-forward kind-of-support:
• Like, Follow, Share @herbanturtl on our social media pages: Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter (WordPress website and Blog coming soon)
• Get the word out and make some noise about HerbanTurtl.

...each person who shares Herban Turtl to their own audience is a brand ambassador to social issues in the US. Like superheroes, Herban Turtl will stand for justice and we'd like to stand together! The more likes, follows, and shares Herban Turtl receives, the stronger our potential of making differences that count. So the pay it forward kind-of-support is extremely helpful and only costs you a bit of your time. Roughly 10 minutes. Which can be done in bed, while you're on the toilet, or watching TV! 

 

Monetary Support Is Crucial! 

If you can, there are two ways to help us here:

• (Currently the most crucial) is to make a donation to this crowdfund campaign. We estimate $2,000 should help kick things off by squaring away our licensing, trademark registration, business brand, and enough funds to create products for our first official campaign.
• Purchase products! Share in our contributions. When we finally release products for sale, the more sales we make, the bigger the contributions to the organizations.
Good News and Bad News to Prepare For
Bad News First. With any start-up business, there is always the risk of failure. However, my strong belief is that failure is merely someone's choice to give up. One choice that isn't an option here.

In addition to the potential of failing, another risk is being washed out in the flooded clothing industry. But we have a niche in the market and as long as we have a strong support system, we have a shot at success!
What's the Good News? The good news is, that even if we don't reach out funding goals, we will continue our efforts to get Herban Turtl out there! Can't stop, won't stop.

And for all those that support, we'd like to give you something in return for your contributions. We haven't quite figured out what that will be. But as our campaign matures we'll be sure to update this section.

What A Campaign Looks Like 

Our first campaign will be dedicated to the research efforts of cannabis and the treatment for PTSD in our Veterans. An established connection has been made to MAPS (Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies) and the documentary they have sponsored From Shock To Awe. This documentary is expected to release by Fall 2017. Funds from this crowdfunding will help us put our design concepts into production and distribution. We will most likely utilize Shopify as it is a socially accepted e-commerce platform with abilities to connect directly to our Facebook page. We are still figuring out who our manufacturers will be based on their sustainability efforts. Originally, the plan was to release the product campaign on Memorial Day. However, so much to do with so little time! And so our crowdfunding campaign will officially kick off on Memorial Day instead with hopes to release the product campaign by end of June/early July.

Who is Me? 

Hi everyone, my name is Ashley. I'm a petite, multi-cultured female who likes to smoke weed and would consider myself a working-class citizen. Each of these identifiers has made me feel unqualified at some point in my life. To compensate, I've developed a mantra of needing to prove everything by action. Yet this mantra evolved into the desire for perfection at everything I did which resulted in some bad anxiety issues (self-diagnosed of course because who can afford healthcare these days). And then, the unexpected happened. I got fired from my job. For the first time in my life, I wasn't the best at something and no matter how high I got, nothing could suppress the self-doubt I was having.

Dramatic Much? Perhaps. But, d'you ever wonder why it's beautiful out after a crazy storm? If chaos is necessary in order to create something amazing, I was going to see this as my big ""slap-in-the-face"" clue that something great needed to come from this situation. My storm was the built up frustrations from needing to prove myself. So my beauty will be the defiance of needing to prove anything. But instead of hating on society, I wanted to create a brand that stood up for those being hated on by bringing awareness to the issues that society doesn't understand. And with each person joining me on this movement against ignorance, than we become a part of something worth representing.

Thanks for sticking with Herban Turtl this far! We hope you stay for the long haul!

So basically, the more products we sell within a campaign, the more funds we can provide to each organization.
We Need Support!Some people who are interested simply can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help! Not only do we need monetary support, but we also need a pay-it-forward kind-of-support:
Like, Follow, Share @herbanturtl on our social media pages: Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter (WordPress website and Blog coming soon)
Get the word out and make some noise about HerbanTurtl.

...each person who shares Herban Turtl to their own audience is a brand ambassador to social issues in the US. Like superheroes, Herban Turtl will stand for justice and we'd like to stand together! The more likes, follows, and shares Herban Turtl receives, the stronger our potential of making differences that count. So the pay it forward kind-of-support is extremely helpful and only costs you a bit of your time. Roughly 10 minutes. Which can be done in bed, while you're on the toilet, or watching TV!  Monetary Support Is Crucial! If you can, there are two ways to help us here:

(Currently the most crucial) is to make a donation to this crowdfund campaign. We estimate $2,000 should help kick things off by squaring away our licensing, trademark registration, business brand, and enough funds to create products for our first official campaign.
Purchase products! Share in our contributions. When we finally release products for sale, the more sales we make, the bigger the contributions to the organizations.
Good News and Bad News to Prepare For
Bad News First. With any start-up business, there is always the risk of failure. However, my strong belief is that failure is merely someone's choice to give up. One choice that isn't an option here.

In addition to the potential of failing, another risk is being washed out in the flooded clothing industry. But we have a niche in the market and as long as we have a strong support system, we have a shot at success!
What's the Good News? The good news is, that even if we don't reach out funding goals, we will continue our efforts to get Herban Turtl out there! Can't stop, won't stop.

And for all those that support, we'd like to give you something in return for your contributions. We haven't quite figured out what that will be. But as our campaign matures we'll be sure to update this section.

What A Campaign Looks Like Our first campaign will be dedicated to the research efforts of cannabis and the treatment for PTSD in our Veterans. An established connection has been made to MAPS (Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies) and the documentary they have sponsored From Shock To Awe. This documentary is expected to release by Fall 2017. Funds from this crowdfunding will help us put our design concepts into production and distribution. We will most likely utilize Shopify as it is a socially accepted e-commerce platform with abilities to connect directly to our Facebook page. We are still figuring out who our manufacturers will be based on their sustainability efforts. Originally, the plan was to release the product campaign on Memorial Day. However, so much to do with so little time! And so our crowdfunding campaign will officially kick off on Memorial Day instead with hopes to release the product campaign by end of June/early July.

Who is Me? Hi everyone, my name is Ashley. I'm a petite, multi-cultured female who likes to smoke weed and would consider myself a working-class citizen. Each of these identifiers has made me feel unqualified at some point in my life. To compensate, I've developed a mantra of needing to prove everything by action. Yet this mantra evolved into the desire for perfection at everything I did which resulted in some bad anxiety issues (self-diagnosed of course because who can afford healthcare these days). And then, the unexpected happened. I got fired from my job. For the first time in my life, I wasn't the best at something and no matter how high I got, nothing could suppress the self-doubt I was having.Dramatic Much? Perhaps. But, d'you ever wonder why it's beautiful out after a crazy storm? If chaos is necessary in order to create something amazing, I was going to see this as my big ""slap-in-the-face"" clue that something great needed to come from this situation. My storm was the built up frustrations from needing to prove myself. So my beauty will be the defiance of needing to prove anything. But instead of hating on society, I wanted to create a brand that stood up for those being hated on by bringing awareness to the issues that society doesn't understand. And with each person joining me on this movement against ignorance, than we become a part of something worth representing.Thanks for sticking with Herban Turtl this far! We hope you stay for the long haul!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hi, we're Anne, Sue, and Katie, and we're so happy you're here! We are three friends from the Philly area who teamed up to help make life easier for nursing moms.

Anne was ready to get back to jogging and teaching yoga after she had her first daughter, but none of her old workout clothes fit her new postpartum body. So we started brainstorming and came up with two workout shirts that combine a nursing sports bra with a comfortable tank top for working out.

We understand the needs of women who are breastfeeding, so we designed our shirts with:

column1: • Soft fabrics and elastics that won't chafe
• Adjustable straps and bands for your changing body shape
• Loose but flattering fit around the waist and hips
And the best part is that the built-in nursing sports bra can be easily and quickly opened for breastfeeding, whether your baby is ready before, after, or even during your workout!
column18: >Here we are after winning the Innovating Small Business of the Year Award in 2016. Thank you to all of our friends and supporters - and we can't wait for you to be on the Just Bloomed team too!
column21:
>Meet Anne's daughters Maeve, Grace, and Elizabeth!

Keio Nature is the result of my 3 years of work, learning about wood, wool and processing technologies of these materials to create the best quality. Now the time has come when I thought that I could not be more ready to show my first product, which arises from passion and desire to show how close we can be to nature without giving up the comfort and interesting design.
column2:
>Łovcee is the most comfortable slippers
in the world!

I want to show that approaching nature does not mean giving up comfort or quality, and does not mean killing it - quite the contrary!

 

What is my goal?

I am planning to collect $ 30,000 for renting the appropriate premises and adapting it to the production of Łovcee and technological development for which I need appropriate tools and shoemaking machines. I'm also planning to start an internet shop with Keio Nature products too.

I want every supporter to be a visible part of the Keio Nature and the Łovcee project. Thanks to these awards, I will always remember that thanks to you I can realize my passion and create products that benefit from nature without killing it.

Each of my actions will be available on my Keio Nature fan page, where I will show you how the łovcee project is developing and how I used your support. When I am somewhere in another city, country, I will gladly drink tea with you to talk about Keio Nature and Łovcee :)

 

When can I start?

I would like to start regular production, so I need a proper workshop and a professional shoemaker equipment. Thanks to this, I will be able to efficiently create new projects and sew more Łovcee. I design and make shoes from the beginning to the end and I know what is needed most to achieve the goal and not miss anything and do the most comfortable slippers in the world!

 

A lot to me means your support, both expressions of appreciation for what I do and donations. Do not forget to share and encourage to support this campaign in the pursuit of everyday life.

Keep up those executive appearances at work or at play. Carry your laptop, stationery and other essentials to the office. Pack your boots and drinks for the festival or everything you need for that long weekend, or week away. All in a backpack that’s as smart and spacious as a briefcase, but packs hands-free carrying convenience.
column8:
s=0c225842af0a5d6afef8ae3239af2569"" src=""""/>

The thick and detachable shoulder straps can be custom adjusted according to the person’s level of comfort and height. We added an air ventilating material for more comfort and relieve. As a functional city backpack for everyday life, comfort lies at the lightweight design of the backpack.

From boots to laptops, clothing to pens and pads, there’s a space in the Aponic Backpack for what you need to transport from A to B. There are hidden compartments too, so only you will know where they are for added security, or for a surprise for someone special.

Every inch of this backpack is fashioned with a specific purpose in mind, to make carrying awesomely comfortable. The backpack is formed of PVC leather and electroplated film. It’s also scratch, dirt and water-resistant, so wherever you’re going, whatever the weather, the Aponic Backpack will have your back.

The material of the backpack is an imported high-quality material originated from Korea which has a splash-proof coating to ensure that the backpack is always dry.

 

180 degree zipper design allows a wide opening of the bag so that you can have better access to the space available. 180 degree design also allows you to traps your bag into a briefcase.

The expandable side pocket allows you to store your bottle, foldable umbrella or any items that you would like to have easy access without opening the zip.

 

Felt like skipping the whole fuss of searching for your keys? The retractable key clip can help you with that, it’s great for quick access for unlocking a door or any objects. After using it, simply have it retract to the side of your bag.

Sure, this is a backpack that’s smart enough to accompany you during your executive lifestyle. But the backpack is also ideal for school, college or university books and stationery, or taking your belongings on a weekend away. It’s ideal too for flights as you can take it in the cabin as hand luggage, or you could use it throughout the summer festival season.

Zippers are great for closing and opening things, but appearance-wise, they’re not the best. So here’s a backpack that keeps them out of sight and out of mind until you need them.

An extra interlayer within the laptop storage compartment adds extra protection to your laptop when you carry it around. The 180º degree compartment opening design allows laptop-like access to the bag for stress-free packing and unpacking.

 

 

For easy attaching of other luggage or extra belongings to your backpack.

When you’re miles and miles from anywhere, the presence of this port will come in super-handy.

It’s fair to say that backpacks are getting more and more sleek. And they’re featuring more and more elements that make them an indispensable accessory for everyday life. That’s definitely true of this compartment-packed, comfort designed carrier.

So don’t keep slinging any old backpack over your shoulder for work, that trip, or even that work trip. Choose comfort, durability, flexibility, secret compartments and a backpack that’s going to attract admiring glances every time you use it.

 

Aponic is an e-commerce company filled with energetic and enthusiastic people. Due to our nature of work, we are heavy users of backpack. We find our computer bags way too small, so we got our team of thinking caps to solve this issue for us. We also have a team of professional designers who help to make our ideas into reality, from sketches into a physical bag In our company, our motto is ""conveniently user-friendly"", and we make that a priority for all our products.

Our socks may not be able to catch our pace all day long. It was like this until this time! Now, Yason Socks do it.

As we move around during the day, our socks start sagging and falling down into our shoes. This could put us in a bad situation. Especially after washing our socks a couple of times, we will have to pull up them continuously during the day.

Yason solves this problem with a special silicon grip. Thanks to this, your socks will not fall down all day long.

In addition, it fits into your feet comfortably and does not bother your leg and do not make marks on your leg. You just have to enjoy this comfort.

column1: Hi, I´m Tillmann, and I am the CEO of De Uul. Our mission is to make lifestyle bags more sustainable. We are developing bags you will love to use everyday and made it our goal to create a fresh and innovative take to a minimalistic lifestyle.
Let us tell you a little more about our backround:
• 10+ Years of experience in bag production.
• Trying to find solutions to make our lifestyle more sustainable.
We are developing a bag collection which is highly functionable and sustainable. Our bags are made of materials that can be 100% recycled.
We believe, that sustainability is the key to create a better tomorrow.

With the ultra-durable material Tyvek®, we take a step into a green future. To achieve the same environmental friendliness as Tyvek®, a cardboard box would have to be recycled four times. On top of that, the strong material has a lot of other awesome features:
We need you as a community to fulfill the following steps:
• We need your backing to start our production process.
• We already have working prototypes, now we want to bring De Uul bags to you!
• We have different stages of perks with amazing products for you. You, as an early stage supporter will have the chance to get your De Uul bag first and discounted.

We have great partners we are cooperating with. To start the production with our manufacturing partners, we need to combine a certain amount of quantities per item. As soon as we have reached the minimum amount, we will start producing your De Uul bag.
If you like and share our vision of De Uul, tell the world about it: igg.me/at/deuul
If you want to help us via Transfer:
Subject: Your E-Mail address and the perk you want to save

Thank you all for being part of the change!

Say hello to our minimalist and most compact leather wallet for 2020!
Made with bovine full-grain leather. It's a wallet that gives the user the classic leather wallet feel with the no-compromise in MODERN functionality.

Risks and challenges

The challenges of 444 ((o.o)) Wallets will be getting the word out, and convincing Indiegogo backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest.

To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word. Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has given us a lot of confidence in them.

Inspired by story of the French botanist David Latimer, we've decided to create a biosphere jewellery.

 Terrac' lume contains essential natural ingredients in a small, elegant flask which together create an unique and beautiful necklace.

Each Terrac'lume is hand-made by our team with manually selected materials. During production process we use different types of moss which easily adapts itself to the soil and humidity in the flask.
column3: > The length of the life of each necklace can be defined by the length of the life of the individual moss.
column10:
/>

 

 

Packaging is also going to be related to the nature theme and harmony within, as it is 100% biodegradable.
column14: > Part of the society living in big cities often lack constant contact with the nature. Wearing a Terrac'lume can bring these individuals closer to power of Mother Earth.
column21:
/>

Our stretch goal is to create an additional line of nature related jewellery. Firstly, we would like to buy and create a domain which will allow us to create our brand image on the internet.

If the campaign will be wildly successful beyond our expectation we will create some custom models of Terrac'lumes, and include a little extra with each order.

Who knows how far Indiegogo can take us!
column35:
/>

 

Our plan is to finish all of the first orders till the early March.
column42:

All of our products will be delivered by a 2nd class Royal Mail.

Because of the USA law the plants which will be delivered overseas will be pre dried.

During production process we use different types of moss which easily adapts itself to the soil and humidity in the flask.  The length of the life of each necklace can be defined by the length of the life of the individual moss.   Packaging is also going to be related to the nature theme and harmony within, as it is 100% biodegradable.   Part of the society living in big cities often lack constant contact with the nature. 0,"

Carry your Essentials in Style  

Axess Wallets makes minimalist wallets in vegetable tanned leather from one of Tuscany’s oldest tanneries. Founded in 1955, the small family-run tannery uses traditional tanning methods to produce vegetable tanned leather desired by some of Italy’s largest luxury brands.
• Organic vegetable tanned leather from a small family-owned tannery in Tuscany, Italy that develops a rich patina over time.
• Scandinavian minimalist front pocket wallet designs that fit seamlessly in your pocket without bulking up.
• Handmade in small batches using strong core spun stitching that holds up to wear and tear.
<li><strong>RFID-blocking pockets to shield your cards from skimming &amp

Maurizio’s Tannery  

This small family run tannery opened in 1955 in the heart of the vegetable tanning district of Tuscany, Italy making it one of the oldes tanneries in the district.

While many of the larger surrounding tanneries have been purchased by larger conglomorates, Maurizio has kept his in the family, keeping it small and constantly refining the vegetable tanned leather which he keeps making in small batches. 

In the tannery, making a single skin takes 6 weeks!

The process to produce the Tuscany vegetable tanned leather is painstaking and long and has been used for centuries to create beautiful leather out of animal hides. Most importantly, it doesn’t use any harmful chemicals in the tanning process. The exact tannin composition is a well kept family secret.

The author (to the right) at the tannery.

The full process, to make a single skin, takes 6 weeks and is largely done by hand. Maurizio’s exact tannin composition is still a well kept family secret. His leather is desired by some of the biggest fashion brands in Italy, keeping the tannery alive and well for the ages. We are proud to state that this is the leather we have used to create Axess Wallets.

Inspired by Scandinavian Minimalist Design

Sweden is commonly regarded as embodying all that is great about Scandinavian design with its minimalist ideas of using clean, simple lines and a strong emphasis on functionality and that is also the heritage from which the design of Axess Wallets originated from. 

Scandinavian design is a design movement characterized by simplicity, minimalism and functionality which is embodied in each wallet.

 

Handmade &
column2:
RFID-blocking

Each wallet is carefully handmade using strong core spun stitching which holds up well to wear and tear and the pockets are designed to withstand daily use. For added functionality, each wallet has one (or in the V-shaped wallet, two) RFID-blocking pockets to protect your sensitive cards from wireless skimming.

What's new?

Due to quality control issues in the past, in this iteration of Axess Wallets we have redesigned the pockets of each model to make for a more sturdy design that holds up better to wear and tear and keeps the inner lining intact.

Instead of the previous small holes in the credit card slots, we now use full separate strip type slots which have a much increased durability.

In addition to redesigning all card slots we have also developed a completely new model, the 'Essential' - Key wallet.

Why we need backers

To continue developing Axess we offer the wallets at a 33% lower price from their regular prices to buy leather from the tannery, which is sold in large Minimum Order Quantities so that we can keep making the wallets in a larger scale in our 7 colors and leathers.

Shipping &
column4:
Fulfilment

 

All US shipping is handled via USPS from a fulfilment center in Michigan. 

 

International shipping (outside US)

For backers outside of the US we ship via Asienda / USPS. Please be aware of potential customs charges when backing from outside of the US (so Europe, Asia/ Australia etc). 

Asienda/USPS international shipments are fully tracked (you will recieve a link where you can follow the status), but once the wallet arrive at your place of delivery, your local post office might not always notify you that you can pick it up, so please follow the tracking status carefully and insert the Asienda/USPS tracking code into the website of your local postal office website to find out where you are supposed to pick up the wallet.

Summary: Please note that the shipments can take extra time and infer customs charges for shipments outside of the US, and please note that you will not always be properly notified where to pick up the wallet depending on the service of your local post office.

 

Pledges

In the early bird pledges where you get ANY wallet you choose model + color in the post-project Survey which will be emailed to each backer. If you choose a specific model, you simply have to choose color once the campaign is over in the survey which will be sent out to you.

Colors

There are 4 vegetable tanned colors to choose from: Caramel, Green, Black, Blue and 3 Saffiano colors to choose from: Caramel, Black, Blue. All products are listed above.

 

 

","Carry your Essentials in Style  Axess Wallets makes minimalist wallets in vegetable tanned leather from one of Tuscany’s oldest tanneries. Founded in 1955, the small family-run tannery uses traditional tanning methods to produce vegetable tanned leather desired by some of Italy’s largest luxury brands.

column1: Organic vegetable tanned leather from a small family-owned tannery in Tuscany, Italy that develops a rich patina over time.
Scandinavian minimalist front pocket wallet designs that fit seamlessly in your pocket without bulking up.
Handmade in small batches using strong core spun stitching that holds up to wear and tear.
RFID-blocking pockets to shield your cards from skimming & demagnetization

Maurizio’s Tannery  This small family run tannery opened in 1955 in the heart of the vegetable tanning district of Tuscany, Italy making it one of the oldes tanneries in the district.While many of the larger surrounding tanneries have been purchased by larger conglomorates, Maurizio has kept his in the family, keeping it small and constantly refining the vegetable tanned leather which he keeps making in small batches. In the tannery, making a single skin takes 6 weeks!The process to produce the Tuscany vegetable tanned leather is painstaking and long and has been used for centuries to create beautiful leather out of animal hides. Most importantly, it doesn’t use any harmful chemicals in the tanning process. The exact tannin composition is a well kept family secret.The author (to the right) at the tannery.The full process, to make a single skin, takes 6 weeks and is largely done by hand. Maurizio’s exact tannin composition is still a well kept family secret. His leather is desired by some of the biggest fashion brands in Italy, keeping the tannery alive and well for the ages. We are proud to state that this is the leather we have used to create Axess Wallets.Inspired by Scandinavian Minimalist DesignSweden is commonly regarded as embodying all that is great about Scandinavian design with its minimalist ideas of using clean, simple lines and a strong emphasis on functionality and that is also the heritage from which the design of Axess Wallets originated from. Scandinavian design is a design movement characterized by simplicity, minimalism and functionality which is embodied in each wallet. Handmade & RFID-blockingEach wallet is carefully handmade using strong core spun stitching which holds up well to wear and tear and the pockets are designed to withstand daily use. For added functionality, each wallet has one (or in the V-shaped wallet, two) RFID-blocking pockets to protect your sensitive cards from wireless skimming.What's new?Due to quality control issues in the past, in this iteration of Axess Wallets we have redesigned the pockets of each model to make for a more sturdy design that holds up better to wear and tear and keeps the inner lining intact.Instead of the previous small holes in the credit card slots, we now use full separate strip type slots which have a much increased durability.In addition to redesigning all card slots we have also developed a completely new model, the 'Essential' - Key wallet.Why we need backersTo continue developing Axess we offer the wallets at a 33% lower price from their regular prices to buy leather from the tannery, which is sold in large Minimum Order Quantities so that we can keep making the wallets in a larger scale in our 7 colors and leathers.________________________Essential - Key WalletPerfect for a night out or as a daily minimalist all-in-one wallet.
Safely secures your keys in a stainless steel clip
Comfortably holds 5 cards + bills in a 3.9 x 2.8 inch frame
Features a transparent ID card slot on the back.
Protects your sensitive cards in the main inner RFID-blocking pocket.
________________________Smooth - Compact WalletCompact yet carries all your daily cards and cash.
Holds 8 cards in a 3.1 x 4.3 inch frame
Features a transparent ID-pocket on the back
Safely holds both bills and coins in the main inner pocket.
Protects your sensitive cards in the main outer RFID-blocking pocket.
A well rounded & stylish option for those looking for a definite replacement to their regular billfold.
Holds 8 cards in a 3.1 x 4.3 inch frame
Safely holds bills in the inner pocket open on two sides
Protects your sensitive cards in the main outer RFID-blocking pocket.
Holds your daily cards & bills in intuitive card slots adapted for different situations for quick and easy access as well as in a flexible cash strap.
Holds 9 cards in a 3.9 x 3.14 inch frame
Holds large amounts of bills securlely in the cash strap
Features a quick draw pocket on the front for your most used cards

0,"

The next generation of connected device technology
• Easily receive calls via the arm of the frame.
• Safely receive calls and notifications with sound.
• Include Bluetooth powered navigation and a hands free screen.
• Entirely new system for sound optimization and volume control.
• Enjoy listening to your favorite music, radio or podcast in total privacy without bothering your surroundings.
• Discover the real hands free device enhanced by the latest technology.
• Discover a new experience while using your laptop and portable devices.
• Ideal for use while driving your car as well as outdoor biking.
• Italian design and style and performance in mind.
• You can choose either polarized glasses or traditional prescription glasses.
• Liloo smart glasses are water resistant and lightweight.
• Liloo uses fast and simple recharging system for long lasting usage.
• Easily find all the information you need hands free.

About the company  

DEBELKHAN LTD is a high-tech research company focused on creating developed tech products suck as Liloo Smart Glasses and successfully marketing them at a low cost while maintaining it’s great value. Thanks to our small development and engineering team of 6, we manage to create, innovate, and publicly market projects every 6 months. Development of features and functionality are being prioritized based on their impact on adoption and cost efficiency. The product team is not making unilateral decisions regarding prioritization, rather, leaders and representatives from each department are involved in the prioritization process. This is where we need your help. Although we strive to succeed and provide great products we need your financial help to achieve our goals in creating innovative, modern and easy accessible technologies for you to benefit them at low cost.

Risks and challenges

Every tech company has it's own challenges. In most smart glasses companies, Bluetooth is their biggest. 
Bluetooth is an essential part of any smart glasses product as it's used to collect, sync and transmit information through the device. 
This means the time between speaking to the person on the other side of the call and the person listening. The challenge Bluetooth gives us is the latency between transmitting information and receiving it. thanks to our team of engineers, Lilootech Smart Glasses manages to send and receive data within 4.5 mili-seconds.

With a lot of research and development, Lilootech has developed and enhanced one of the latest bone conduction speakers making it at a frequency range of 15 to 16,000Hz.

Battery is everything and charging your device too much could be a pain which is why we decided and succeeded in installing 2 Lithium Polymer (UL Certification) batteries that makes your device last for over 7 hours of talk time and 4 hours of music time.

We've also tested some of our competitors smart glasses and gathered some feedback in regards to it's design and comfortable-ness and reached expectations making glasses of all sizes and styles and adding a special design to tighten frame branches to satisfy your desired comfort.

","The next generation of connected device technology
Introducing a unique bone conduction technology .
Easily receive calls via the arm of the frame.
Safely receive calls and notifications with sound.
Include Bluetooth powered navigation and a hands free screen.
Entirely new system for sound optimization and volume control.
Enjoy listening to your favorite music, radio or podcast in total privacy without bothering your surroundings.
Discover the real hands free device enhanced by the latest technology.
Discover a new experience while using your laptop and portable devices.
Ideal for use while driving your car as well as outdoor biking.
Italian design and style and performance in mind.
You can choose either polarized glasses or traditional prescription glasses.
Liloo smart glasses are water resistant and lightweight.
Liloo uses fast and simple recharging system for long lasting usage.
Easily find all the information you need hands free.

About the company  DEBELKHAN LTD is a high-tech research company focused on creating developed tech products suck as Liloo Smart Glasses and successfully marketing them at a low cost while maintaining it’s great value. Thanks to our small development and engineering team of 6, we manage to create, innovate, and publicly market projects every 6 months. Development of features and functionality are being prioritized based on their impact on adoption and cost efficiency. The product team is not making unilateral decisions regarding prioritization, rather, leaders and representatives from each department are involved in the prioritization process. This is where we need your help. Although we strive to succeed and provide great products we need your financial help to achieve our goals in creating innovative, modern and easy accessible technologies for you to benefit them at low cost.Risks and challengesEvery tech company has it's own challenges. In most smart glasses companies, Bluetooth is their biggest. Bluetooth is an essential part of any smart glasses product as it's used to collect, sync and transmit information through the device. This means the time between speaking to the person on the other side of the call and the person listening. The challenge Bluetooth gives us is the latency between transmitting information and receiving it. thanks to our team of engineers, Lilootech Smart Glasses manages to send and receive data within 4.5 mili-seconds.With a lot of research and development, Lilootech has developed and enhanced one of the latest bone conduction speakers making it at a frequency range of 15 to 16,000Hz.Battery is everything and charging your device too much could be a pain which is why we decided and succeeded in installing 2 Lithium Polymer (UL Certification) batteries that makes your device last for over 7 hours of talk time and 4 hours of music time.We've also tested some of our competitors smart glasses and gathered some feedback in regards to it's design and comfortable-ness and reached expectations making glasses of all sizes and styles and adding a special design to tighten frame branches to satisfy your desired comfort.",7.0,0,"1 Campaign

Inside the Black Triangle is as a photojournalist series exploring queer women beyond societal stereotypes. The series has grown into a community of queer women and allies connecting and supporting each other.
Inside the Black Triangle is launching a clothing and accessory line! We're dropping a limited addition Pride Shirt right in time for Pride Month!!!! We need your help to get things rolling!

Donate $50 receive 25% off your order. 
Donate $25 receive a 10% off your order.

The black triangle was a badge used to categorize queer women in Nazi concentration camps. Later the symbol was reclaimed by lesbians and feminists as a sign of pride and solidarity. It's imperative that we continue to reclaim negative language, symbols, and stereotypes.
What is the mission of the project?

The project was created with the intention to share the struggles, joy, heartbreak, confusion and diverse experiences of  queer women living in a heteronormative world. Sharing stories leads to relatability, compassion and hopefully acceptance. Not only is empathy necessary outside the LGBTQ community, but now more than ever, equality is needed within the community.

First watches designed in Poland at Indiegogo.

It was very long trip to start this campaign, many of you was already doubt that this project will start, but finally. I was very busy with bouilding sales and relationship with butiques owners in Poland, now i have position strong enough to start new projects, new opportunities, and to start this fantastic Bronze Divers!

Im not going to tell you any strange stories how my grand grand father was a watch maker and when i was a kid there was always watches around me, NO WAY. Im driving honest, transparent and clear business. There is NO history of watchmaking behind me, im passionate and big fan of watches.

About 3 years ago I decided to quit my current position, i was many years in food business, living and working at Scandinavia, last years i was CEO of company at Iceland. Finally came TIME for changes, TIME for coming back to family and to Poland, but came as well TIME to find new activity which i could be in. To keep multinational activity, to conect it with my passion, hobby. Decided to go into watches :)

Im from north of Poland so naturally i was thinking about making watch brand calls BALTICUS or something connected with Baltic Sea, my first watch model calls Grey Seal as seals are reborn at Baltic sea more and more, second model is Star Dust and Black Dust with lovely blue marble dial. I have been producing watches for Facebook Groups, now im working at project for Mustang Club Poland with young but well known designer but also trying to develop new models for Balticus regular offer. Watches are produced in Hong Kong, but assembling will be in Poland and that's why on dial will stand - Made in Poland.
Now its time to offer special watches, Balticus in Bronze cases and YES bronze case will get patine! But if you dont like patine, you can easly clean it.
There will be 2 x 250 pcs of numbered watches. All of them will have special indyvidual number, this watches will not be available later, only this 250pcs of each model!

Campaign is simple, no tricks, no hidden goals thats why you can choose from 2 PERKS and only one is additional as Super Early Birds who are willing to save some $$$$. Look at pictures, they will tell you about our quality - polished and brushed case and outer bezel parts, embossed steel back case, detailed dials, well sized compressor look case with two crowns. We are offering as well very unique leather strap with ridges with butterfly buckle.

First model, Big Wave is fully inspired by ""Great Wave off Kanagawa"", this watch is a tributte to Japan art and culture. Of course watch is powered by Japan automatic movement Miyota 9015 which is perfect and superior quality. Big Wave watch is limited and numbered, only 250 pcs will be produced! No more!

Wave is as well embossed on back, we have focused on detals, you can see wild waves, so natural so unpredictable......... As You can see, back is made of steel, so will not get patine and will not leave any signs of dirt at your wrist!
Dial is with awesome lume, large rouge wave, but as well indexs and markers, all of this is giving special feelings, special look. For sure none of other watches can offer this.

Second model it's Balticus Grey Seal, which dial is inspired by Seals skin, from dark grey colour on top to almost white on bottom part. Watch is as well powered by Miyota 9015 and as well limited to 250pcs.

Embossed seal on back is a detail which you will like and love, it will catch an attention, you can not find it on common watches. And as well You can see, back is made of steel, so will not get patine and will not leave any signs of dirt at your wrist! I'm realy focusing on details, it's part of my passion.
- case made of CuSn6 marine grade bronze
- case size 44x51mm, normaly lenght is about 54mm, but this case is bit shorter to fit better on wrist, you can't feel its big watch, additionally thicknes is about 12-13mm
- Lugs 22mm, geniue leather strap with butterfly engraved with Balticus logo
- sapphire glass with AR double layers inside
Let people know about Balticus Campaign, please share, invite your friends, let this Bronze watches alive!

We are beginners on Indiegogo, but we are already 3 years on the market boulding our cooperation with boutiques in Poland but as well multinations sales. We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Firstly, our production is quite advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over 1 year designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples.

Secondly, we have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.
The movement: When do I need to change the battery? NEVER! The watch has a mechanical movement that is powered by you.

The movement: Why did you decide on Japanese movements for the Balticus Bronze Divers? Well, the Japanese movements are just as reliable as any ETA movement - if not even more reliable! If we did use an ETA movement the watch would have almost doubled the final cost of the product. We are using Miyota movements at almost all our watches available already on the market.

When will my card be charged? If you’re new to Indiegogo this might be confusing to you but here all cards will be charged as soon as the campaign has been officially funded and the time has ran out on the campaign. You should see a charge on your account 3-5 days after the campaign ends - EDITED - IT LOOKS LIKE INDIEGOGO IS CHARGING CARDS RIGHT AFTER BACKING.

How long will my watch be warranted? We will work with all customers case by case but all watch movements will be insured for up to a year after the campaign ends. We cannot warrant customers who break their watches due to wear and tear.
Who do you use for shipping international orders? We use DHL Express or FedEx or EMS for several specific destinations for all international and domestic shipments (excluding PO Box addresses).

Need some help? We're here for you.
Send us an email at info@balticus-watches.com and we'll be in touch as soon as possible.

We stand behind the quality of our watches.
We are proud to offer a 24 month international warranty on all our watches.
Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with You, the Indiegogo community!
And again, PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN but also:

Hello Indiegogo!!!

My name is Franco Galliani and I am a person who by following my passion for socks and everything that involves its manufacture have led me to be simply who I am and to undertake my own path, as a human being, as a manufacturer, as a brand.

Starting from below in the pyramid of responsibilities of a socks factory has allowed me to develop a wide knowledge in all the manufacturing processes and to know the benefits of the different natural fibers, as is the case of the Peruvian alpaca.

After 23 years of working in the hosiery industry, I decided to start developing my crowdfunding campaign here at INDIEGOGO with the main purpose of making a great dream come true: Create the First Socks Workshop in Peru.

 

Why a Peruvian Socks Workshop?

In the world there are many ideas of new socks, many manufacturers, many brands, but few workshops of high quality, with a willingness to flex and accept small personalized orders.

I think of a unique place, in which I can share knowledge of the hosiery industry, making anyone can start their own brand with an excellent product and without having to invest in buying thousands of pairs or simply satisfy the tastes and whims of each person through their own custom socks.

From the premise of creating the Workshop I decided to develop a product with excellent benefits, simple, elegant and casual at the same time, without designs and full color, soft to the touch, neither too thick, nor too thin, the result: 

 

 

Being honest, these socks are simply incredible: comfortable inside and out, soft, resistant, neither thick nor thin, they will keep your feet dry and odorless in any climate or activity in which you use them
column2:
You can also use them with dress shoes, casual shoes, sports, booties or boots, among others (Perfect to wear on any trip).

 

 

 

Our rewards include gift boxes, for every 2 or 4 pairs, excellent to give to that person that you love or get for all the family and friends. You choose the designs that you like most in any of our 4 sizes.
column3:
>

I am sure that you and your loved ones will be happy to receive these socks made only with the best, a product created to last in the hearts of people.

 

Why is your collaboration important?

Your collaboration will make my campaign reach the goal, so it will allow me to access the purchase of the 1st BUSI socks machine, Italian brand with the most advanced technology indispensable to meet the technical expectations of workshop.

column2: >These machines are made to pre-order and can take up to 4 or 5 months from the initial payment to be built and delivered at destination, but the wait is worth it, this will allow me to be flexible in terms of ordering small-scale orders.
>As a cake cherry this machine performs the best Loop-by-Loop seam that can be obtained in a sock, diminishing to almost 0% any sewing annoyance in the toes.

column1:
What will I do with the funds raised?

In order to be transparent and specific I share with you how I am going to distribute the USD $ 200,000.00, so you can understand why this campaign is a fixed goal and not flexible.

 30% Buy New socks machine, Brand BUSI with the best sewing device 
 30% Buy alpaca yarn and Gift Box to 20000 pairs (approximately)
   5% Indiegogo Commission
   4% Commission use of payment with credit and debit cards.
   2% Lima bank commission, for receiving funds from an international bank.
   5% Buy washer, dryer and irons.
   5% Project team.
   5% Donation to a charity.
   5% Rent of local in Lima - Perú (6 months).
   9% Domestic and international shipping expenses.

Ambitious, right? but as you can see, only the machine, placed in Lima is an investment of (USD $ 60,000), The percentages shown are approximate, the exact percentage data will be known at the end of the campaign, since indiegogo considers the cost of shipping within the goal.

 

Social Responsability

Although I have not yet had contact with the Los Angeles Angels Association, I know that they also have a great dream to do: CREATE THE FIRST CHILDREN'S ONCOLOGICAL HOSPITAL IN PERU, so I believe that I donate 5% of this campaign and of all the sales generated by the workshop in the future, will help in something. If you are interested in learning more about this charity, you can find it on Facebook: @angelesdelosaren

 

 

Who manages the contributions that my campaign receives?

Your contribution goes directly to Indiegogo, which is the one that manages all the proceeds from my campaign. The total amount collected will be transferred to my bank account 20 days after the end of my campaign, but if I do not reach the goal, the INDIEGOGOI will return the funds contributed to my campaign to each collaborator.

 

 

The Team Campaign

2 years ago I started a crazy race to pursue my dreams, almost without a budget I was able to put together a human group that committed to be a reality of this campaign, thank you: Jessica Ramirez Aimini, Mariela Zavala, Angela Cahua Cruz, Alejandro Galliani, Damian Khoury, Miguel Angel Galliani, Sebastian Santos.

To take the big leap, I need your help, that of everyone, not just my friends, the help of alpaca socks lovers and this great community of INDIEGOGO.

We have 35 days left to achieve the feat, I know that together we can achieve the goal, JOIN US

 

Risks and Challenges 

This is my first project in Indiegogo, but i know for experience that problems can arise at any time, i have considered the manufacturing, packaging and distribution periods, so i am sure to be able to meet the quality and the delivery dates targeted and my team is ready to face any challenge that may arise. Nevertheless, if there are any inconvenience or delivery delays, you will be the first to know.

 

Other ways you can also help us:

Use the IDIEGOGO action tools. What really makes the difference!Let us know if you have any design ideas for the socks.

Please tell your friends about our campaign!

Email us: peruvianalpacasocks@francogalliani.pe

SWISS QUALITY AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE

Get Swiss movement, genuine leather straps, luxury embossing and Swiss-quality all at an affordable price. 

THE REVIEWS ARE IN

'Elegant and dapper in the extreme, these impeccable watches are sure to really resonate with those men who want luxury accessories but don’t want to pay the mark up typically associated with the industry.' - The Coolector

'Kataphrakt Kronograf has gone above and beyond to satisfy the needs of the masses. This is something that we truly applaud here at the Wrist Review.' - Wrist Review

'If you're looking for a stylish timepiece that combines solid, high-quality construction with modern classic design, the Kataphrakt Kronograf Watch will fit the bill perfectly. What's more, it comes at an unbeatable price.' - Men's Gear

'There’s something magical about astronomical complications in a wristwatch. The combination of one of the fastest moving time-telling indicators along with one of the slowest intrigues me and makes me want to know more about Kataphrakt Kronograf.' - Haulogerie

AS FEATURED IN

KEY FEATURES

Every one of our elements was carefully selected with zero compromise on quality.
⦁    Swiss Movement – Unlike our competitors who use movements of lower quality, Kataphrakt moonphase complications are made by Swiss.
⦁    Scratch resistant and Shatterproof – Our hardened mineral glass will protect your watch face for years to come.
⦁    Top Quality Leather – Soft yet durable, with a unique embossed logo, such premium quality leather makes our watches a steal for the price range. 
⦁    Premium Anodized Watch Casing – Our watch casing is anodized with color accurate pantone to give a premium and balanced feel.
⦁    15 Degrees Dial Design – Two-piece dial design with a 15-degree slope for optimal aesthetics.
⦁    Water resistance – Up to 5ATM/50M for your water sports enjoyment
⦁    Perfectly Sized for Any Wrist – Case: 42mm x 51.5mm Bezel: 42mm Opening: 37mm Crown: 6mm Links: 22-20mm
⦁    2 Years Limited Warranty – Protection against manufacturing/movement defects.

A WATCH FOR ANY OCCASION

We've brought to life 3 styles to capture the beauty of astronomy.

1. Terraformer

Chroma inspired by mars and venus. Upon a chance to stargaze at mars and venus, beautiful rose gold color and chocolate terrain was the inspiration for this exquisite piece.

 

2. Eclipse

Colors inspired by the solar eclipse. With beautiful silver to represent solar corona at totality, we were awestruck by witnessing of solar eclipse phenomena and decided to capture it into this classic piece.

 

3. Twilight

Black and gold cues inspired by capturing the moment between sunset and night. We have embodied the beauty of this daily phenomena into the timepiece.

TECH SPECS

INSIDE THE BOX

Each order comes with:

1 x Kataphrakt Kronograf

1 x Two Toned Hand Stitched Box

1 x Simplified Kataphrakt Manual

 

IMMORTALIZE THOSE SPECIAL MOMENTS

Pre-order one of our Kronografs, refer 3 of your friends to do the same, and as a sincere thank you from us, you will receive a free engraving option to make your timepiece truly special. You may choose a meaningful combination of up to eleven characters/symbols to preserve forever. This can be used for:
⦁    Names – Get the name or initials of yourself, a family member, a friend, or a special someone.
⦁    Dates – Mark birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, and other special occasions using a combination of numbers and symbols. E.g.: dd/mm/yyyy, mm-dd-yyyy, etc.
⦁    Words – Special affirmative word(s) that have a special meaning to you, or someone else.
⦁    Anything Else you can think of that’s eleven characters or less.

 

REWARDS

 

TIMELINE

 

HELP OUT BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS

Do you want to help? Share this campaign with friends and family via email and social media to make yourself or them one of the lucky owners of our 150 limited edition engraved timepieces!

The more people know about us, the larger this community will become! The larger the community, the better we can make the product!

We cannot do this without you. You can also visit our website to learn more.

 

BEHIND THE SCENES

Here are the boring, but quick shots we took through out the manufacturing process for record keeping:

Hour, minute and second hands for Terraformer finished.

Final version of our timepiece box at the factory. Looking superb!

Our glorious two piece dial design with 15 degree taper. Its unlike anything we have ever seen, but we may be biased!

Matching to the pantone colour we have chosen carefully for months. Colour looks different in photos because of lighting and material difference.

Dials for Eclipse and Twilight, respectively.

Quality Control: Pressure testing every casing to ensure no liquid infiltration at 50ATM for 24 hours.

Quality Control: In their respective chambers, ready for a pressure test.

Etching the backplate and the model names. An overlay that wears off time just isn't an option for us when we claim quality!

Limited edition customization for a real twitch streamer! Visit here

First straps for Terraformer. We were ecstatic to say in the least!

Eclipse straps. Looks absolutely wonderful with white stitching.

The excitement and the fun is over when assembly begins..

ABOUT

Inspired by the beauty of astronomy, Kataphrakt founder Joshua sought to capture the beauty and ethereal nature of this phenomenon, and meld it with his love of minimalist timepieces.

Designed in the heart of Auckland, and perfected by one of the world's top custom timepiece manufacturers in Hong Kong, our watches strike that perfect balance between beauty, quality, comfort and affordable price.

FAQs
Where does Kataphrakt Kronograf ship to? We ship everywhere around the world.
How much is the shipping cost? Shipping cost is $14 USD.

Where do you ship from? We ship directly from Hong Kong, close to our manufacturer. Originally we intended to ship from USA but all it did was increase the shipping costs without any increased benefit towards our backers.

What if my strap doesnt fit right? This is highly unlikely, we have made the strap to accommodate 99.9% of the population. Unless you are an outlier in the population, we are confident that the strap will accommodate for your wrist size.

Do I order today? Or shall I order later? The prices for Kataphrakt Kronograf's on Indiegogo will never be available again later. So if you found a model you like, we say it’d be in your best interest to pre-order it now!

• What makes Kataphrakt Kronograf so different from other watches? We supply absolutely the best quality watch for the price range. Our luxury timepieces are for less than $150 RRP inclusive of Swiss made movement. Kataphrakt Kronograf is disrupting the fashion watches by bringing on the absolute best for the price, not because we say so, but because it is!

","SWISS QUALITY AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICEGet Swiss movement, genuine leather straps, luxury embossing and Swiss-quality all at an affordable price. THE REVIEWS ARE IN'Elegant and dapper in the extreme, these impeccable watches are sure to really resonate with those men who want luxury accessories but don’t want to pay the mark up typically associated with the industry.' - The Coolector'Kataphrakt Kronograf has gone above and beyond to satisfy the needs of the masses. This is something that we truly applaud here at the Wrist Review.' - Wrist Review'If you're looking for a stylish timepiece that combines solid, high-quality construction with modern classic design, the Kataphrakt Kronograf Watch will fit the bill perfectly. What's more, it comes at an unbeatable price.' - Men's Gear'There’s something magical about astronomical complications in a wristwatch. The combination of one of the fastest moving time-telling indicators along with one of the slowest intrigues me and makes me want to know more about Kataphrakt Kronograf.' - HaulogerieAS FEATURED INKEY FEATURESEvery one of our elements was carefully selected with zero compromise on quality.⦁    Swiss Movement – Unlike our competitors who use movements of lower quality, Kataphrakt moonphase complications are made by Swiss.⦁    Scratch resistant and Shatterproof – Our hardened mineral glass will protect your watch face for years to come.⦁    Top Quality Leather – Soft yet durable, with a unique embossed logo, such premium quality leather makes our watches a steal for the price range. ⦁    Premium Anodized Watch Casing – Our watch casing is anodized with color accurate pantone to give a premium and balanced feel.⦁    15 Degrees Dial Design – Two-piece dial design with a 15-degree slope for optimal aesthetics.⦁    Water resistance – Up to 5ATM/50M for your water sports enjoyment⦁    Perfectly Sized for Any Wrist – Case: 42mm x 51.5mm Bezel: 42mm Opening: 37mm Crown: 6mm Links: 22-20mm⦁    2 Years Limited Warranty – Protection against manufacturing/movement defects.A WATCH FOR ANY OCCASIONWe've brought to life 3 styles to capture the beauty of astronomy.1. TerraformerChroma inspired by mars and venus. Upon a chance to stargaze at mars and venus, beautiful rose gold color and chocolate terrain was the inspiration for this exquisite piece. 2. EclipseColors inspired by the solar eclipse. With beautiful silver to represent solar corona at totality, we were awestruck by witnessing of solar eclipse phenomena and decided to capture it into this classic piece. 3. TwilightBlack and gold cues inspired by capturing the moment between sunset and night. We have embodied the beauty of this daily phenomena into the timepiece.TECH SPECSINSIDE THE BOXEach order comes with:1 x Kataphrakt Kronograf1 x Two Toned Hand Stitched Box1 x Simplified Kataphrakt Manual IMMORTALIZE THOSE SPECIAL MOMENTSPre-order one of our Kronografs, refer 3 of your friends to do the same, and as a sincere thank you from us, you will receive a free engraving option to make your timepiece truly special. BAEKKE is a basic piece of jewelry which you can have for many years - perhaps for life. With the beads, you can decorate the bracelet and change its appearance according to your mood and outfit. You can buy more beads in other colors anytime you want. BAEKKE is a Danish design with a twist. We love to mix materials to create flexibility and basis for many years of use.
 

Never have it been easy to match a stylish bracelet with ANY OUTFIT.

 

Designing a stylish bracelet that can suit both WOMEN and MEN.

The Baekke bracelet is not a classic piece of jewelry. You can customize it as you wish thanks to the COLORFUL BEADS.

 

You can change the appearance according to your MOOD.

 

 

READY SET NOW!

We need to create a marketing campaign in order to bring BAEKKE to people all over the world. 

We would like to use money from the fund-raiser to develop our brand through 2 steps: 

1. International trade exhibition – in order to create a network with professionals and find new retailers. We will participate in international trade exhibitions such as Clerkenwell Design Week (London), Inhorgenta (Munich), MACEF (Milan) and Maison et Object (Paris).

The choice of the exhibitions is well-thought and strategic.

2. Building brand awareness –through advertising we want more people to find out about our product. Thus, building brand awareness is one of our most important goals. We would like to reach our future customers through different platforms such as Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

We estimated that we need 10.000€ in total to finance our projects. 

 

Risks and challenges!

As all of our products are made to order, the lead time for development and production can have challenges. We do not anticipate delays in delivery, but we will keep in touch with you - our Indiegogo supporters - and keep you informed as to specific delivery dates.

 

Support our Indiegogo campaign and wear BAEKKE bracelet to express your unique style.

The world's first eyewear collection made from 100% ECO plastic, aluminium and stainless steel. This makes London Jones Eyewear super lightweight, hypoallergenic and ECO friendly.

Perfect fit, pure color, expressive shapes - our approaches are combined to create simply styled, beautifully functional eyewear that everyone can afford. Rooted in British heritage and infused with a New York edge.
Our designer has created frames for and worked with such brands as Club Monaco, Big Star, Tommy Hilfiger and Gucci and is now proud to present his newest collection London Jones.
We have sourced one of the best lenses in the world and are combining London Jones and Vanquish Blue lenses to create an offer that cannot be matched.

Simply select the Perk option on the right that you wish to purchase, once the campaign has ended you will be sent the Facial Fit app to take your measurements and a detailed survey where you will make your final frame selection and color. Return the survey with your prescription and your new prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses will be made to perfection.  We guarantee it.
London Jones, born out of a desire to create masterfully constructed eyewear and fashion accessories. Known for innovative, wearable eyewear - we are European Flair with North American Attitude.
Dedicated to craftsmanship, innovation and timeless style. Since the brands creation, the focus has been and will always remain on creating the highest quality products at an affordable price.
Perfect fit, pure color, expressive shapes, our approaches are combined to create simply styled, beautifully function eyewear that is a luxury everyone can afford.
At London Jones we believe that ""True Style"" is more than what you wear. It reflects how you live, how you choose to navigate your life and how you show up.
The brand evokes a mindset - an attitude, not an age. It's a true original, defining fashions next stride forward. International - Eclectic - Fun - Fast and Real.

Our eyewear is the embodiment of creativity and individualism.  We celebrate urban lifestyles that are centered on music, art, fashion and self-expression.  Chic but never over-the-top, perfect for capturing the individuality of each person who wears them.
We have used 100% ECO material for all plastic components, London Jones - environmentally friendly frames, because every small step matters.
What good is it if we sell you a frame that doesn’t fit, or a frame that doesn’t suit your face shape and what if you don’t have your PD?
“Facial Fit” was created to solve those very problems. Taking your PD is now possible through our proprietary Facial Fit app.

One of the most important measurements to make sure that your glasses will fit is your head width. The Facial Fit app it will give you your head width, bridge width and PD measurement, it will also tell you your face shape.
All London Jones eyeglasses give you the frame width measurement (head width), bridge width measurement and a face shape recommendation.
To ensure properly fitting eyeglasses your head width and the frame width should be within + or - 4mm and the bridge width should be within + or - 2mm.
""Facial Fit"" solves all of the problems for people buying eyewear online, with our measurements ""we guarantee the fit"".

column2: >""Be the change you wish to see in the world.""
>""If the mind thinks with a believing attitude, one can do amazing things.""
>""Work Hard - Dream Big, live life with passion.""
>""Life is like a mirror, it will reflect back to the thinker, what they think into it.""

column1: If we want to push innovation we must start with a ""what if"" mindset. This approach allows us to imagine eyewear designs in an unhindered way.  Several designs are created and modified until the final product is sent to the factory for production.
Form is function. The principles of modern industrial design perfectly applies to London Jones eyewear: it is engineered to guarantee a unique combination of aesthetics and precise fit.

Colors are selected and blended, prototypes are made. The designs spring to life. Each frame is manufactured with great attention to detail, the frame front is critical in supporting prescription lenses, all London Jones frames must be comfortable to wear, while being a compliment to your individual style.
We use only 100% ECO plastics - because every small step matters!

column2: >""As long as you live, keep learning how to live.""
>""Don't wait, the time will never be just right.""
>""It's never to late to be what you might have been.""
>""Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.""

column1: During our exclusive offer with Indiegogo all single vision prescription lenses are made using VANQUISH Essential polycarbonate aspheric lenses, resulting in thinner lighter lenses, they offer you:
• Reduces the reflections other people see on your glasses
• Resistance to smudges, repels dust and water
VANQUISH Essential lenses offer superior defense against the 5 enemies of clear vision:  reflections, scratches, smudges, dust and water all Vanquished.
VANQUISH Blue Essential anti-reflective treatment combats the harmful blue light rays that:
• Creates a haze reducing contrast and decreasing sharpness
• May increase retinal damage from a cumulative lifetime exposure
VANQUISH Blue Essential light filtering coating helps to selectively reduce the harmful portion of blue light while letting the beneficial blue light pass through. The benefits are:
• Reduces accumulated potential damage to the eye
• Reduces digital eye strain and symptoms associated with Computer Vision Syndrome
• Allows beneficial blue light to pass through for increased clarity
• Reduces glare and reflections, improves visual performance

Digital devices, LED lights and the sun all emit harmful blue light that causes severe eyestrain and eye diseases. Protect your eyes and see a healthier tomorrow. For the best possible comfort in all lighting conditions VANQUISH Blue offers superior protection in a digital world.
During this exclusive offer we are including the VANQUISH Blue Essential polycarbonate lenses at no extra cost. These lenses in a retail store can easily cost as much as $300.00 alone.

VANQUISH Quick Color photochromic lenses are clear lenses, that will automatically darken in sunlight. These lenses adapt to varying outdoor light conditions, reducing squinting, eye strain and fatigue when outdoors. Light sensitivity is reduced because the lenses protect your eyes from the sun's harmful UV rays, they block 100% of all UVA and UVB rays.

VANQUISH Quick Color lenses are great for situations where you are indoors and outdoors within minutes. You won't need to do the eyeglass-sunglass shuffle, which inevitably results in you losing or forgetting your eyeglasses or sunglasses somewhere.
VANQUISH Quick Color photochromic lenses are available for an additional $49.00 per pair.
VANQUISH Digital Computer lenses are available for an additional $99.00 per pair.
VANQUISH High Definition digital progressive lenses are available for only an additional $149.00 per pair.

Should you wish to add any of the other upgraded lens options they are available on the frame selection survey that will be sent out after the campaign has closed. All lenses will come with the Vanquish Essential Blue anti-reflective coating added at no extra charge.

column2: >""Don't be afraid of going slowly, only be afraid of standing still.""
>""The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.""
>“Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift.”
>“Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.”

column1: All London Jones eyeglasses and sunglasses come complete with a  London Jones folding case and micro-fibre cleaning cloth at no extra charge . The cases are beautiful as well as functional, when wearing your glasses the case can fold away to the height of only 1.75cm (3/4in”).
Here is a breakdown of the exclusive perks you can choose from when you support the London Jones campaign (select your perk from the sidebar near the of the page).

All of the perks include at least one pair of London Jones eyeglasses or sunglasses, folding case, cleaning cloth and Vanquish Blue Essential polycarbonate lenses (with the exception of the PD measurement application).

With London Jones we have removed all of the middlemen, our glasses and lenses are sent from the factory to our facility to you. There are no other people causing your eyeglasses to increase in cost. We offer our eyeglasses ""three to four times"" less expensive than optical stores.

Our head designer D.M. Briard has created eyewear for and worked with international brands such as Club Monaco, Big Star, Fendi, Gucci, Kate Spade and several others, he understands what it takes to design exceptional looking frames of the highest quality.

Great looking eyeglasses combined with some of the worlds best lenses do not have to cost you hundreds of dollar. We have visited factories around the world, attended major eyeglass trade shows in Italy, France and North America and can now offer you London Jones Eyewear direct to you with single vision VANQUISH Blue Polycarbonate Lenses for less than $100.00.

Above all else, your satisfaction is our top priority. We go above and beyond to provide you with exceptional customer service. When you buy London Jones Eyewear your purchase will be sent out as soon as possible and delivered direct to your door.

Our prescription lenses must pass a rigorous quality control inspection to ensure that your eyewear is free from aberrations, distortions and manufacturing defects. We adjust every pair of eyeglasses and sunglasses to a standard fit after cutting, polishing and inserting your lenses.

If you experience any issues with your purchase, contact us within 10 days of receipt. If you have a warranty issue with your frames or lenses, we offer a one-time exchange on the return of any London Jones eyeglasses or sunglasses.

These cities teem with life, people are welcomed from every country, race, religion and sexual orientation. They have a vitality that seems to exist nowhere else, here we are all part of something greater than ourselves from ocean to ocean from London to New York.
