If you experience any issues with your purchase, contact us within 10 days of receipt. If you have a warranty issue with your frames or lenses, we offer a one-time exchange on the return of any London Jones eyeglasses or sunglasses.

These cities teem with life, people are welcomed from every country, race, religion and sexual orientation. They have a vitality that seems to exist nowhere else, here we are all part of something greater than ourselves from ocean to ocean from London to New York.
“Thank you for your interest in London Jones Eyewear.
Something new, something different, something extraordinary........London Jones.",57.0,0,"1 Campaign

It features 96% cotton along with 4% silver. This special addition of silver kills 99% of bacteria, keeping you smelling the freshest all day long. Using no harmful substances in the manufacturing process, the StayMAAT Shirt is anti-bacterial, waterproof, and stain-proof.

Fast fashion is killing the world and we are part of it. It is simply because we don’t have options. We as a startup are trying to rebel on this trend by offering sustainable fashion. Imagine a simple classic white shirt which suit for everyone and it can stain and odor free, best way to save the world by buying less and dumping less.

column2:
/>

 

The principle of silver sterilization has six steps:

Step 1: Most of the pathogens are single-celled microorganisms that rely on proteases to maintain metabolism. They contain an oxygen-metabolizing enzyme that, when exposed to silver, takes an electron from the silver and turns the silver atom into a positively charged silver ion.

Step 2: Silver ions attract specific binding of a negatively charged thiol group (-SH) in the protease.

Step 3: The cell wall and cell membrane will be pierced during the binding process, and the bacterial cell protein will be denatured.

Step 4: The bacteria cannot breathe, metabolize and multiply until they die, achieving the effect of sterilization.

Step 5: The survival time of the pathogen is only a few tens of minutes, and it will naturally die if it cannot breed.

Step 6: These silver ions will return to the original electrons state and back to silver atoms. Therefore, the sterilization function of silver itself will not disappear.
column3:
/>

*Extra Length Option is not available for size XS and S.

>How do I find my ring size?

NAR ring sizing and offer full standard sizes on our Instagram. If you’re uncertain of the size of the ring you require, please visit our Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/support_nar/) where can be measured accurately or pop into your local jewellers when you can be measured.

  • If you have an existing ring

column1: • Measure the diameter (mm) of a ring that fits the desired finger
• Use the ring size chart to locate your size
• Wrap a strip of paper or string around your finger, just above the knuckle, and mark the point at which the two ends meet
• Measure the paper from mark to mark to find your ring circumference (mm)
• Use the ring size chart to locate your size

Ever wanted to wear that beautiful watch, but you don't want to lose track of your steps and your health monitoring?
Have you ever been wearing your smartband/smartwatch on the one hand and your actual watch on the other?

Perhaps, you have opted for a wearable tracker (a necklace, a jewellery, a pocket piece), so you can wear that watch, but now you are missing all the ""smart"" features... no call or message notification, no alarm, no instant monitoring.
We have certainly found ourselves in all of the above situations and this is how the idea of INFINIFIT™ was born!

INFINIFIT is a smart fitness tracker that attaches to ANY watch, so you can decide which one to wear, ANY time of the day. And that's not all. INFINIFIT will work with your ANY fitness app, so you don't lose your tracking history.

Our journey has already started back in January 2020. We brought together a team of companies with experienced product designers, electronics engineers and software developers to create the INFINIFIT concept.
By March 2020 Infinifit Ltd was the proud owner of a design patent.

column6: >Our unique casing allows INFINIFIT to not only be attached to ANY watch, but to rotate on your arm, enabling the dynamic health monitoring functions.

column3: >The device's sleek design allows you to wear it with long sleeves and it will be nicely tucked away underneath your shirt.

column1: INFINIFIT is available in 4 colours to match your favourite bracelet. During the campaign you can even pre-order two devices for the price of one giving you an even greater variety of options.
We should, of course, mention that INFINIFIT is compatible with both iPhone and Android phones.

It comes with its own beautiful and easy to use fitness tracking app, but gives you the choice to connect the device to any of your favourite popular apps like Adidas Runtastic, Asics Runkeeper, Google Fit, Nike NTC, Strava and more.
You will be able to keep your current tracking history as you start using it!
This genius tracker is giving you INFINIFIT choices that are redefining wearables!

With a registered design patent and a working prototype developed in May 2020 our production partner is raring to go. We can't wait to bring this product to market and we are now seeking your help to achieve this.

We have decided to launch a campaign on Indiegogo as an indicator of demand for our device. We hope you will find it as genius as we do and use the opportunity to pre-order at highly discounted prices.

You may also want to support us by making a financial donation. Or if you can't pre-order the product or are not able to donate to our campaign, but still find the idea of such a product is great, then we would to hear you make some noise about our campaign. Share our Indiegogo page on your social media, or blog. Talk about INFINIFIT with friends. Ask them to visit our website www.infinifit.uk or visit our campaign page www.getinfinifit.com
• We promise to keep you updated of progress.
• We promise to only use the campaign funds if we are 100% certain that we will bring the product to market (otherwise will ask Indiegogo for full refunds).
• We promise to deliver a great product and to be back with new ideas.

Apollo Watch Collection launches with 3 distinct, Swiss-Made watches
column2: Eagle, Saturn and Orion. Each model will have a dial made entirely of the recovered AS-203 metal. This dial will include a moon phase function, showing its owner the position of the moon through its 29.5 day cycle, as well as luminous hands, numbers and indexes. You can purchase the full collection in a special presentation box, or buy them individually.

column1: Once the campaign has been fully funded, our website will go live and buyers will be able to select their serial numbers.
Eagle, Saturn and Orion will use the Sellita Caliber SW280. This bespoke caliber is a self winding, automatic movement with 26 jewels and a 38 hour power reserve.

Eagle was inspired by the Eagle Lunar Module and will be limited to 500 pieces. This special watch will include unique features, such as what we call the 'port-hole', allowing its owner to look out to the moon-phase. Other unique features include the date and time that the AS-203 rocket launched, printed on the dial that is made solely from the recovered AS-203 metal, as well as a limited edition strap that will only be available as an option to owners of Eagle.
Eagle is the ultimate collectors item, with only 500 pieces, it is the most limited in the Apollo Watch Collection, with pricing that is almost too good to be true. Almost!
See the images below for a better look at Eagle and the detailed specifications for this watch.

Saturn is named after the famous rocket booster series that carried 24 men to the moon during its use. This watch will be part of a limited run of 1,969 pieces, honouring 50 years since 1969 and the first of the moon landings. Saturn's dial is made entirely of the recovered AS-203 metal, with a darkened tint, almost resembling the surface of the moon itself. The dial maintains the rough and raw texture of the metal, giving a true sense of the adventure that this metal has been on since 1966.

Orion takes its name from the world-famous constellation, visible in the night sky from everywhere on the globe. Like Saturn, Orion will be part of a limited run of 1,969 pieces, celebrating the 50th anniversary of the first moon landing.

Orion is the perfect embodiment of human endeavour, displaying the metal in its true form, without any changes in colour or texture. Each dial in this collection will be completely individual, taken from different parts of the recovered AS-203 rocket, offering its owner the chance to own a watch that is unique to any other.
The standard strap is black material, inspired by the material of the astronauts suits, worn in the Apollo rockets and on the moon. White material is also available as well as black leather.
For Eagle, backers will have the option to choose a limited edition black material strap with red stitching.

After extensive research and testing since 2005, West One has been able to put together an extensive archive of information on the AS-203 and the panel that we recovered in Zambia. From this research and testing, we have successfully identified the recovered panel as part of the AS-203 rocket that launched on July 5th 1966.
Below is a summary of our findings, with key events and facts. More information, including access to our full archive of images, documents and reports will be available soon through www.west-one.com

For this project to go ahead, we need to raise $45,000. This will allow us to commence production, starting with prototypes. We expect to deliver the watches to early buyers by June 2020 but we hope to beat that schedule.

Our funding goal is fixed, so if we don't reach it, your money is refunded to you and the project will not go ahead. However, this would be a terrible shame as these watches are so unique and special, not only to us and our story but as a manifestation of one of mans greatest triumphs - So please, help us reach our goal and celebrate the 50th anniversary of the moon landing in style!

West One was co-founded by brothers Ian and Richard, and Ian's son Tristan.  Ian and Richard are the sons of Graham Sheppard who discovered the AS-203 metal in 1975 and Tristan is his Grandson. Graham unfortunately passed away in 2005, but as a space fanatic he would have been delighted to see what has become of the metal he discovered.

Richard Sheppard - Lives in Zambia where he runs a Yamaha dealership and a Tourism business.  Richard drove from the UK to Zimbabwe 30 years ago, aged 19 and has resided in Southern Africa ever since. Richard built the first Toboggan park in Africa, located in Cape Town and the worlds largest swing (87 Meters high) on the Moses Mabhida football stadium in Durban. He is currently developing a private Island into a world class eco tourism lodge.

Ian Sheppard - Ian is the eldest son of Graham, born in 1969 and he has three sons. Ian graduated from the University of Bath as a Bachelor of Science in Aeronautical Engineering. He has since become a respected member of the aviation community, working as an aerospace journalist and editor for several magazines, as well as being a flight instructor.

Ian was with his father, Graham, on the day the AS-203 metal was discovered in 1975 and has vague memories of seeing the metal for the first time, recollecting his fathers excitement at their discovery.

Tristan Sheppard - Tristan was born in 1996 and is the eldest of Ian's three sons. He recently graduated University as a Bachelor of Arts in History and Politics. He is a keen fan of football (soccer) and he loves to travel the world and experience different cultures. For the future, Tristan is keen to develop West One into a recognisable watch brand and continue to explore the world.

Interest in space exploration and what is beyond our world has been carried through three generations of our family and continues to ignite our imaginations. We are incredibly passionate about this project and have wanted to do it for a long time, so to see our hard work pay off would be a dream come true and a fitting way to honour the legacy of Graham.

The Apollo Watch Collection is the culmination of a story that has been part of our family through three generations, starting in 1975. Starting with Graham, there has always been a great interest in space and aviation for those in our family.  To be part of a project this exciting is an honour that we want to share with other individuals that are likeminded in their interest in space exploration and its history.
We hope that by buying your own watch, you can become a part of this story and help us celebrate human endeavour and space exploration
column2: both in the past and in the future.

column6:
>bird view of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM

SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM

Few years ago, we worked on an architectural competition for Guggenheim  museum. Our team worked day and night for six months, starting from scratch to every detail. We felt we were closer from our dream to reality day by day… but at the end, there is a thousand dreams from all over the world. and only one can be chosen.Of cause, we were not that lucky.

Till one day we saw a rendering of our own art works displayed in this Avantgarde museum, suddenly, we feel so released about the result. At least, our six months effort are not in vain. After second thought, why not we can use this design to create a virtual art museum.
column8:
>ground floor plan of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM

This is how we came up with this idea of using an real architectural plan to build up a virtual art museum, and we named it “SITONCLOUD”. This museum will exist immortally in the digital cloud.The only criteria for selections of artists is their passion for art. we would like to dedicate this museum to all the artists who share their art inspirations to us.

Even curating is virtual, we (architect) want everything to be perfect. We made each exhibition a post. We allocate each exhibition in a specific room. We set up each day as a sunny day. And the milky sun light diffuse into our exhibition room, and gently cover our art works. They are respected as if they are in the best museum in the world.
column10: >micro exhibition #01 in SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM
column11:
> 

EXHIBITION  

Many languages do not distinguish between what in English are described as ""blue"" and ""green"". They instead use a cover term spanning both. When the issue is discussed in linguistics, this cover term is sometimes called “grue” in English. By coincident, when you are looking at both his photography and his presentation of his architecture works, “grue” is best hue to describe his observations from his eyes. Uncompromising like his architecture pursuit, “if there is no green, then there is no blue”. His pictures look pure in one sight, but much more saturation in spaces at second glaze.
column18:
>

HOU Liang

Chinese Born Belgian Architect HOU Liang started his own practice since 2005, after his award-winning proposal for worldwide architecture competition for Tsunami Memorial in Thailand. He and his team win numerous important international architecture competitions, including Seoul Performing art center in Korea, Jean Paul II memorial museum in Poland. For more than ten years he is not only being active in Avant-guard architectural design, but also being experimental in multimedia design. His projection mapping on 3-dimensional white furniture tables called ""sitoncloud"" project has become an iconic design for the new generation, and was exhibited in Museum of Modern Art in Paris in 2012.
column20: >""Tsunami Memorial"" in Thailand, you can find more about Hou Liang Architecture @ www.houliang.com
column23: >""Grand Canyon “dining table, you can find more about SITONCLOUD project @ www.sitoncloud.com
column25:
>

MUSEUM SHOP

So far it comes to the museum economy, we have our own online museum shop. Following every art exhibition, we launch a special edition of products derivative from the original art works. And we always choose the best quality in our product supply to match the high stander of our art works.
column27: >space diagram of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM
column30: >museum shop of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM
column32:
>

Art T-shirt 

We only choose the best 100% combed cotton T-shirt as our canvas. We only use the highest resolution dye-sublimated technology to print artwork. We care about every detail of clothe making, also the quality of packaging. Every T-shirt is treated as a gift directly from our artist's hand to you and your friends.

> 

CHOOSE YOUR REWARDS

The moment that Art T-shirt handed to you from our art museum, you feel all those experience is not just a dream. Your contribution are not only supporting all the artists who deserved to be bestowed, but also is used by us to develop our art museum into a supper real virtual reality in the coming future！
column75:
>

PIBA

Stands for “Products Invented By Architecture”.

CONTACT US

Risks and challenges

We are confident that we have the right competences and experience to bring this product to the market on time. 
We take things seriously, and apart from being perfectionist and very careful in the design, we have gone through a very thorough selection of our suppliers.
At this point, we are far ahead in the process with the manufacturers.Moreover, we should say that all our calculations, pricing and time frames are based on real quotes.
Our biggest challenge is to deal with issues of shipping and delivery for large range of international consumers. To address these issues we will set up a specialist team for management of shipping and delivery. Its job will be to ensure first rate customer service and timely delivery of our products. 
We need your help to get funds to make this product a reality, so please help us spread the word and make our virtual museum completed.

","post of micro exhibition #1 bird view of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUMSITONCLOUD ART MUSEUMFew years ago, we worked on an architectural competition for Guggenheim  museum. Our team worked day and night for six months, starting from scratch to every detail. We felt we were closer from our dream to reality day by day… but at the end, there is a thousand dreams from all over the world. and only one can be chosen.Of cause, we were not that lucky.Till one day we saw a rendering of our own art works displayed in this Avantgarde museum, suddenly, we feel so released about the result. At least, our six months effort are not in vain. After second thought, why not we can use this design to create a virtual art museum.ground floor plan of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUMThis is how we came up with this idea of using an real architectural plan to build up a virtual art museum, and we named it “SITONCLOUD”. This museum will exist immortally in the digital cloud.The only criteria for selections of artists is their passion for art. we would like to dedicate this museum to all the artists who share their art inspirations to us.Even curating is virtual, we (architect) want everything to be perfect. We made each exhibition a post. We allocate each exhibition in a specific room. We set up each day as a sunny day. And the milky sun light diffuse into our exhibition room, and gently cover our art works. They are respected as if they are in the best museum in the world.micro exhibition #01 in SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM EXHIBITION  Many languages do not distinguish between what in English are described as ""blue"" and ""green"". They instead use a cover term spanning both. When the issue is discussed in linguistics, this cover term is sometimes called “grue” in English. By coincident, when you are looking at both his photography and his presentation of his architecture works, “grue” is best hue to describe his observations from his eyes. Uncompromising like his architecture pursuit, “if there is no green, then there is no blue”. His pictures look pure in one sight, but much more saturation in spaces at second glaze.   ARTISTHOU LiangChinese Born Belgian Architect HOU Liang started his own practice since 2005, after his award-winning proposal for worldwide architecture competition for Tsunami Memorial in Thailand. He and his team win numerous important international architecture competitions, including Seoul Performing art center in Korea, Jean Paul II memorial museum in Poland. For more than ten years he is not only being active in Avant-guard architectural design, but also being experimental in multimedia design. His projection mapping on 3-dimensional white furniture tables called ""sitoncloud"" project has become an iconic design for the new generation, and was exhibited in Museum of Modern Art in Paris in 2012. ""Tsunami Memorial"" in Thailand, you can find more about Hou Liang Architecture @ www.houliang.com ""Grand Canyon “dining table, you can find more about SITONCLOUD project @ www.sitoncloud.com MUSEUM SHOPSo far it comes to the museum economy, we have our own online museum shop. Following every art exhibition, we launch a special edition of products derivative from the original art works. And we always choose the best quality in our product supply to match the high stander of our art works.space diagram of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM museum shop of SITONCLOUD ART MUSEUM Art T-shirt We only choose the best 100% combed cotton T-shirt as our canvas. We only use the highest resolution dye-sublimated technology to print artwork. We care about every detail of clothe making, also the quality of packaging. Every T-shirt is treated as a gift directly from our artist's hand to you and your friends. choose your size by cm. choose your size by inch.  original are work are zoomed into 3 partial prints in round format   art T-shirt rolled into a paper tube with metal black lid  original are work are zoomed into 3 partial prints in round format   art T-shirt rolled into a paper tube with metal black lid     art T-shirt rolled into a paper tube with metal black lid CHOOSE YOUR REWARDSThe moment that Art T-shirt handed to you from our art museum, you feel all those experience is not just a dream. Your contribution are not only supporting all the artists who deserved to be bestowed, but also is used by us to develop our art museum into a supper real virtual reality in the coming future！PIBAStands for “Products Invented By Architecture”.CONTACT USRisks and challengesWe are confident that we have the right competences and experience to bring this product to the market on time. We take things seriously, and apart from being perfectionist and very careful in the design, we have gone through a very thorough selection of our suppliers.At this point, we are far ahead in the process with the manufacturers.Moreover, we should say that all our calculations, pricing and time frames are based on real quotes.Our biggest challenge is to deal with issues of shipping and delivery for large range of international consumers. To address these issues we will set up a specialist team for management of shipping and delivery. Its job will be to ensure first rate customer service and timely delivery of our products. We need your help to get funds to make this product a reality, so please help us spread the word and make our virtual museum completed.",36.0,0,"4 Campaigns

column1: PURPOSE BAG for difference of average bags will ease the weight for each individual.

It is inspired from everyday life as lot of us are carrying 2 or 3 bags and considering that carrying weight is harmful to our posture and muscles, with PURPOSE BAG this will change. With simple but innovative inclusion your bag will feel lighter to carry on.
• PURPOSE BAG come in smart, stylish shapes as different print and colour that will make your shopping trips or every day life style more or less routine and lot more FUN
• PURPOSE BAG first collection is made from washable paper and all other internal or external parts such as textile or components as buttons and clips are 100 % reusable, recyclable and sustainable
•  With PURPOSE BAG you will not feel cutting edges of plastic or paper bags on your hands or shoulders
• PURPOSE BAG is adaptable. You can change or add your shoulder straps and with it gain in your personal daily styling

column3: >Our production has components for developing sustainable and conscious design project with focus on  social impact. With inclusion of more people, we can build new communities, that can develop more impact, create more ideas for more sustainable and equal world for all of us.

column4: fashion products must be created for comfort and service to those who use them.

column1: We have  mission to support sustainable life. so we created light bag for every day challenges that you could have,  and use this lightness also for better impact on our environment.

Purpose bag inspiration was mentioned, so our challenge is to resolve some problematic facts that are part of worldwide statistics where we would like to help and start finding new innovative solutions:
•  In combination with daily tasks and body use, damage to muscles and skeleton is frequent consequence of carrying heavy bags, backpacks and occupational gear
• New research confirms that nerves that travel through the neck and shoulders are also at serious risk
• Children in their developing years should be more protected and considered not to carry heavy bags

In past years, even with digitalisation, there are no solutions from schools or educational departments for this worldwide problem, that could be available to most of population. Same issue is actually very different from each schools, institutions or individuals involved. We all need to start considering importance and wellbeing of our body and respect it from early ages.
• A person use a plastic carrier bag on average for only 12 minutes and the question is why use something for 12 minutes and then throw it away?
•  The average family accumulates 60 plastic bags in only 4 trips to the grocery store
• Approximately we recycle only 1 plastic bag in every 200 we use
• We are now producing nearly 300 million tons of plastic every year, half of which disposable
• More than 8 million tons of plastic is dumped into our oceans every year.
...and make it lighter with use of PURPOSE BAG that is made to serve you.
PURPOSE BAG will be launched in 7 different models and multiple purpose uses that can carry loads up to 30 kg.Variety of shapes and sizes are suitable for specific and tested weight.
PURPOSE BAG Shopper bag 01 -can help replacing use of plastic bags or any other bag if you want comfort and lightness. Support up to 10 kg. Size 40 cm x 38 cm x 5 cm
PURPOSE BAG Handbag shopper 02 - durability of the product and possibility to repair and replace handle strap and shoulder straps. Support up to 15 kg. Size  40 cm x 35cm x 10 cm
PURPOSE BAG Backpack 03- city version or travel version. Shoulder straps replaceable. Support up to 30 kg. Size open max 53 cm x 36 cm x 12 cm (closed c.ca 42 cm x 36 cm x 12cm)
PURPOSE BAG School bag 04- 1 model proposal. Support up to 15 kg

• There will be opportunities for partnership proposal and offers with other companies to share innovative PURPOSE BAG  solution, that has versatile development opportunities, to reach bigger part of world communities that will  benefit from it.
PURPOSE BAG Tote Bag 05- fashion premium product small series. Support up to 17 kg.Final production max 30 pieces. Size
PURPOSE BAG Fun Light 06 - fashion premium product small series. Support  up to 15 kg .Final production max 30 pieces
PURPOSE BAG Limited Light 07 - fashion premium product limited edition. Support up to 10 kg. Final limited production 7 pieces, option made to order.
All PURPOSE BAGS models that are not presented in real samples, but drawings, in this campaign will be published in July.

We need support of 30,000 USD for materials, definition and production of  personal components such as buttons and clips, prints, braille label-prints, custom-made bands, sample definition for production and production start.
All materials are made in Italy with sustainable productions and certifications COEX®, OEKO Tex® or GOTS ®. Our initial production is planned for 1500 pieces divided differently per model of bags.

PURPOSE BAG is recyclable,  reusable, repairable and once you'll try it,  you'll use it in your every day journey. PURPOSE BAG has simple but innovative functionality, minimalist aspect and great comfort so after you feel it no bag will be the same again.

column3: >Additional shoulder straps, included in collection, are wearable and adaptable on any other bag. We keep it simple and light and you will gain in fun and personal styling by your choice.

column1: WASHABLE PAPER sample of textures and colours
Each piece will be visually unique
column2: based on material choice production and print even when produced in series.That is, in part,  also because Washable paper material as cellulose-based fibre, is produced using traditional techniques that consist in handmade embossing and colouring of each single sheet.In that case it is not possible to have or to guarantee identical material sheet in colour and overall appearance.

column1: COMFORT WITH lightness is all... with respect for your body and muscles :)
Over a lifetime, usage of reusable bags by one of us, would save world from approx 22,000 plastic bags (cc.a 12,000 USD)

Awareness of product utility, material type and production  is necessary for all of us. If we can’ t recycle, reuse, repair or compost any product then we should also think about producing it. PURPOSE BAG is considered project with impact and social inclusion as building new communities. We will collaborate with medium large productions and worldwide distribution will be equally covered from all producers. Production is situated in Europe from manufactures in Italy, France, Germany, Portugal and Spain.
Labels and logo design are double printed, which means printed also in Braille.

We are looking for collaborations and knowledge of different communities in all countries such as braille users, sustainable producers, change makers, marketers and all creative individuals with desire to co-create and expand lightness of PURPOSE BAG.

In that way PURPOSE BAG could have desired impact of elevating and improving each person life. To understand others necessity,  we need collaborations and communication so we can support and sustain together our individuality.

Our collaboration is focused on production studios or small manufacturers that are developing innovative and inclusive projects within communities. All teams or individuals that like design, innovation, evolution and care for social impact and equality matter are welcome to join us.
We need more inclusion of design in every day life to create innovative sustainable products with sustainable production for better sustainable world.

In first production we plan to giveaway 600 shoulder straps to non-profit organisations, schools or institutions that are devoted to improve, include and help community life in need.Please let us know in comments, or by sending us an e-mail, with  your ideas and your preferences for non -profit organisations that are working on improvement and care for others in sustainable way . We will include them on our list for giveaways.
In that way  we will reach more people and make their day ""lighter"" with all they need to carry on.

Risk and challenges in fashion production procedure are not so common. We have intention to produce in countries with highly skilled  manufacturers and have great experience in fashion production.For now production countries as already mentioned are Italy, France, Spain, Portugal and Germany. If any technical problems in production occurs, will be resolved by highly skilled teams. Contractors will be  supported thru production and if there might be  other, different challenges we have skills to resolve problems in shortest time possible.
Our transparency policy and communication will be maintained true whole production and distribution till final delivery process.
Support PURPOSE BAG and let's make a difference together
Please take a moment to check out PURPOSE BAG project and help us to develop production.This is one of the ways how we can avoid future heavy bags and reduce plastic pollution problem.

We know that building community is stronger with sharing.More we are better is, so we would like to show you gratitude even if you don’t have possibilities to support us with pledge, a dollar or eventually with purchasing of PURPOSE BAG.

First 10 shares and 10 backers that will share our campaign with Indiegogo sharing tools, no matter of amount will receive PURPOSE BAG shopper, by covering shippment.If you are among first 10 backers and you get the perk and share our campaign, in that case you will receive 1 extra shopper as give-away.  Get creative, show us and let us know your way of sharing.You can use also  your social media: facebook,  instagram, twitter or any other choices and preference...Thank you

column2:
>

 

and to share some gratefulness
column4:
> 

 

special thanks to Croatian Blind Union that consulted us about diversity of braille and all informations that are necessary for their users.

and to share some gratefulness  special thanks to Croatian Blind Union that consulted us about diversity of braille and all informations that are necessary for their users.",14.0,2,"1 Campaign

Hello All!  I'm Jen, a freelance artist, and aspiring comic book/webcomic creator!  I am currently working on releasing my first ever webcomic, but in-between that, I have other creative flights of fancy, and one of those is why I bring you here today!  But more on that in a moment.  First, I'd like to help you all get to know the person behind the campaign a little more.  As I said, I'm an artist.  It's basically part of my DNA at this point, because I've been drawing ever since I could hold a pencil!  I love experimenting with new and different forms of art, but my ""go-to"" for a long time has been digital art.  I think what draws (
column2: ) ) me to it the most is that I love how I can make images/characters/etc. that look like they stepped right out of an animation.  Along with art, I've always loved watching cartoons, and still do to this day!  And I've also become an avid anime fan, so that has definitely had an influence in my work.  As an artist, I've definitely had my ups and downs, art blocks, or ""creative hybernations"", lack of time due to other life duties, and of course trying to be the best mom I can be to my 4 children.  Now I really want to dive headfirst into letting my art not only be a creative outlet for me, but also try and garner a return on my lifelong investment in it by trying to make a little money off of it.  Get my art to work for me, you know.  That's where I hope you all will come in and help support my little project (and maybe others in the future!).

column1: I'm starting this project because I would like to make T-Shirts of my ""Mind Filleter"" design.  If this project goes well, I would also like to try and make other items too, such as aprons, hoodies, enamel pins, stickers, magnets, and more!  But before I can do that, I need the startup costs to cover the cost of the tees (and possibly other items).  This will be my first ever fundraising campaign, so I would really love some help getting my project off the ground!  And you'd get to look stylish in the process!  The plan is to do a 50/50 soft blend tee in a variety of sizes (prioritizing backer sizes of course), and if I exceed my goal, I'll make some more goodies for you all!

I am trying to raise $2500 for the initial cost of the T-Shirt run.  The funding will be going towards manufacturing costs of the T-Shirts and then shipping costs to get them to you, as well as the manufacturing of an inventory for me to have on hand to sell in the future.  The perks you will get with your donation will vary depending on what you choose, but if I make my original $2500 goal, I will then open up a goal to also add ""Mind Filleter"" aprons to the mix!  Main perks will be a ""Mind Filleter"" T-Shirt in whichever size the backer specifies.  Other possible perks are Enamel Pins, Stickers, Magnets, and Static Clings.
If I do not reach my goal, I have my campaign set up as ""all or nothing"" so all backers will be refunded their pledges should I not meet my goal.

I believe this campaign has value, if for nothing else, by bringing a smile to the people who would wear the T-Shirts, and perhaps those who see them wearing them.  I love seeing ""nerd culture"" gaining more and more popularity and I would love to help be a part of the expansion.

I don't foresee too many challenges ahead, because the design is already completed, I just need to choose which manufacturer I'd like to work with and ensure the design prints properly.  A possible hurdle would be an extended manufacturing time if the manufacturer needs to remake any portion of the order due to color or quality issues.  There will also be time needed for quality control, as I plan to inspect each shirt to my own standards before shipping them out to their new owners.  As for shipping, I plan to use USPS flat rate boxes, and shipping charges will be separate from the pledges.  I will send out tracking information to backers once items have shipped out.  If there are any delays due to production, quality control, or shipping, I will do my absolute best to inform all backers of any such information in a timely manner.

If you can't currently back my campaign, but still want to help me out, please feel free to share this will all of your friends, plaster it in your social media, tweet about it, tag me in your instagram, the works!  I appreciate any and all signal boosts you can give me!

Hello All!  I'm Jen, a freelance artist, and aspiring comic book/webcomic creator!  I am currently working on releasing my first ever webcomic, but in-between that, I have other creative flights of fancy, and one of those is why I bring you here today!  But more on that in a moment.  First, I'd like to help you all get to know the person behind the campaign a little more.  As I said, I'm an artist.  It's basically part of my DNA at this point, because I've been drawing ever since I could hold a pencil!  I love experimenting with new and different forms of art, but my ""go-to"" for a long time has been digital art.  I think what draws (
column2: ) ) me to it the most is that I love how I can make images/characters/etc. that look like they stepped right out of an animation.  Along with art, I've always loved watching cartoons, and still do to this day!  And I've also become an avid anime fan, so that has definitely had an influence in my work.  As an artist, I've definitely had my ups and downs, art blocks, or ""creative hybernations"", lack of time due to other life duties, and of course trying to be the best mom I can be to my 4 children.  Now I really want to dive headfirst into letting my art not only be a creative outlet for me, but also try and garner a return on my lifelong investment in it by trying to make a little money off of it.  Get my art to work for me, you know.  That's where I hope you all will come in and help support my little project (and maybe others in the future!).

I am trying to raise $2500 for the initial cost of the T-Shirt run.  The funding will be going towards manufacturing costs of the T-Shirts and then shipping costs to get them to you, as well as the manufacturing of an inventory for me to have on hand to sell in the future.  The perks you will get with your donation will vary depending on what you choose, but if I make my original $2500 goal, I will then open up a goal to also add ""Mind Filleter"" aprons to the mix!  Main perks will be a ""Mind Filleter"" T-Shirt in whichever size the backer specifies.  Other possible perks are Enamel Pins, Stickers, Magnets, and Static Clings.
If I do not reach my goal, I have my campaign set up as ""all or nothing"" so all backers will be refunded their pledges should I not meet my goal.

I believe this campaign has value, if for nothing else, by bringing a smile to the people who would wear the T-Shirts, and perhaps those who see them wearing them.  I love seeing ""nerd culture"" gaining more and more popularity and I would love to help be a part of the expansion.

I don't foresee too many challenges ahead, because the design is already completed, I just need to choose which manufacturer I'd like to work with and ensure the design prints properly.  A possible hurdle would be an extended manufacturing time if the manufacturer needs to remake any portion of the order due to color or quality issues.  There will also be time needed for quality control, as I plan to inspect each shirt to my own standards before shipping them out to their new owners.  As for shipping, I plan to use USPS flat rate boxes, and shipping charges will be separate from the pledges.  I will send out tracking information to backers once items have shipped out.  If there are any delays due to production, quality control, or shipping, I will do my absolute best to inform all backers of any such information in a timely manner.

If you can't currently back my campaign, but still want to help me out, please feel free to share this will all of your friends, plaster it in your social media, tweet about it, tag me in your instagram, the works!  I appreciate any and all signal boosts you can give me!",1.0,0,"1 Campaign

>It shouldn't be a hassle to find well-fitting activewear, but for many guys who fall in-between sizes, it is.

Seifer approaches design with a piece-by-piece mentality that began with making an entirely new size scale to take height and body type into account: Slim, Athletic, and Democratic for build. Short, Medium, Tall for height.
column4: >In total, we have 9 sizes. Each is a combination of Build and Height.

column1: Along the way, we are taking a stand against brands that focus on profits without consideration for quality, fair working  conditions, or the environment.
column2: >Our fabric is sustainably made and our factories treat their employees with respect and pay them fair wages for fair work.
column3:
>We couldn't find a fabric that met our high standards, so we decided to develop our own.

This revolutionary fabric uses a blended yarn of 92% Recycled Polyester and 8% Tencel, but this isn't any normal Recycled Polyester.

Our experience leading technical fabric research and development at a large sportswear company in Los Angeles enabled the development of this new textile. It has a pretty remarkable backstory, and is certified by multiple international standards organizations.
column4: >Plus, it's completely and permanently odor-resistant. No more post-gym stench. Ever.

column9:
>Right now, there are two options for guys when it comes to athletic clothing:
Price or Quality.
column10:
>Consumer-sensitive workout brands offer a great price, but usually have low quality fabrics, poor fit, and a questionable supply chain. (They don't get those prices through 'magic')

At the other end of the spectrum, the higher-end, so-called ""Active Lifestyle"" brands offer quality goods with high-tech fabrics and a matching premium price increase. More often than not, this is little more than a façade where they tend to use the same unsustainable practices as the lower-cost brands and don't truly innovate on fabrics, fit, or watching their supply chain closely.

In both cases, the end result is consistently sold for more than five times the manufacturing cost, and they all use an outdated approach to fit (s-xl) that leaves many of us in-between sizes.
column11: >Both low-cost and high-quality brands tend to ignore the full supply chain they use and shoot for low manufacturing costs above all.
column13: >Seifer hopes to inspire the necessary changes in the apparel industry while empowering guys to pursue their best selves everyday.

column2: >We're starting out with the Perfect Black workout shirt, but this is only the beginning.
>If we reach our stretch goals of $50,000 and $75,000, we'll offer Navy and Pine into the mix.
>Any money raised above our initial needs for production will go right back into developing top-tier products with a fair supply chain and a price we can all agree on.

column1: We've spent $3,000 out-of-pocket in product development to get Seifer to this point.
However, as a new retail business, there are minimum order quantities that must be placed when developing new fabrics and manufacturing in the USA (it's not easy being a small fish in a big pond).

column2: >If our fundraising goal is hit, your money will go directly into the production and manufacturing of the first Seifer product, with profits going towards developing the brand and expanding the line.

column1: We are utilizing Eco-Circle Polyester that comes from old garments instead of plastic bottles like most “ethical” companies use. This material uses 56% of the energy output to make as regular poly and has about 7/8 savings in greenhouse gas offput. Polyester is great as an athletic fiber because it is very strong, can stretch a little bit without breaking, and can be dyed both in yarn stage or in garment stage.

Tencel is added for a natural feel and an anti-microbial finish that can last for the entire lifetime of the garment. It's made from biodegradable, renewable, sustainably harvested eucalyptus wood pulp. It also happens to be comfortable, lightweight and known for its ability to be grown on low-grade land. Its production uses 80% less water than cotton, and is developed in a closed loop system, which only uses recycled water.

The fabric is finished with Polygiene, a powerful odor and microbe fighter that is bound into the fibers in the shirt. It will never wash out, ensuring the garment is capable and fresh for years to come.

Our recycled fabric is certified Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex, the go-to authority for fabric testing and regulating harmful substances. They make sure every fabric’s origin and contents are totally up front for the consumer. Learn more about  Oeko-Tex 100.

We are also Intertek certified. All manufacturers who become partners with Intertek agree to a rigorous testing process to look for anything from banned colorants to heavy metal, pesticide, or fungicide residue. Learn more about Intertek.

Finally, we are part of the Global Recycle Standard, an international testing agency that confirms claims of recycled material by examining the traceablity of raw materials. Learn more about Global Recycle Standard.

column1: Our team has done our best to mitigate the risks and challenges for this project.

We have fully functional prototypes for every size and have (along with some friends) been giving them a full run through the wringer. So far, I am proud to say this is an innovative product that functions and fits beautifully for any activity we've thrown at it.

Having worked with our vendors at past employers for almost a year in volumes as high as 300,000 yards, Ben can vouch for quality and timeliness. The production schedule is set, and We're confident in our production partner to manage the manufacturing. That being said, forecasting demand is an inexact science, and if we are humbled enough to have this project exceed the target, delays may occur due to increased production volume, in fabric, shipping, or production stages.

For shipping, We'll be communicating with backers and manufacturers throughout the campaign to ensure the fulfillment timeline stays as accurate as possible. Shipping is included in the contribution, and we intend to keep this 'flat-rate' pricing as a company standard.

column2: >Some people aren't going to be able to contribute, and that’s ok! But if you would like to help, please share this campaign with a friend or on social media. Every person counts!

column1: ______________________________________________________ It shouldn't be a hassle to find well-fitting activewear, but for many guys who fall in-between sizes, it is.Seifer approaches design with a piece-by-piece mentality that began with making an entirely new size scale to take height and body type into account: Slim, Athletic, and Democratic for build. Short, Medium, Tall for height. In total, we have 9 sizes. Each is a combination of Build and Height.

Along the way, we are taking a stand against brands that focus on profits without consideration for quality, fair working  conditions, or the environment.Our fabric is sustainably made and our factories treat their employees with respect and pay them fair wages for fair work. We couldn't find a fabric that met our high standards, so we decided to develop our own.This revolutionary fabric uses a blended yarn of 92% Recycled Polyester and 8% Tencel, but this isn't any normal Recycled Polyester.Our experience leading technical fabric research and development at a large sportswear company in Los Angeles enabled the development of this new textile. It has a pretty remarkable backstory, and is certified by multiple international standards organizations.Plus, it's completely and permanently odor-resistant. No more post-gym stench. Ever.

Our Design is Made for Movement.Our shirt features a subtly scalloped hemline, raglan shoulders for flexibility and motion, and flatlocked seaming throughout. Slim, without being overly restricting – it's the type of shirt that makes you look and perform your best, while feeling like you're wearing your favorite t-shirt (if your favorite shirt resisted odor and microbial growth while being comfortable and breathable.

Proudly Made-in-the-USA by one of the best factories in Southern California, our revolutionary fabric has the following certifications.           By being online only, we will eliminate brick-and-mortar expenses and pass these savings on to you, so it's easier than ever to buy well-made, well-fitting clothing that matches your values and your wallet.  Why Athletic Clothing?Right now, there are two options for guys when it comes to athletic clothing:Price or Quality. Consumer-sensitive workout brands offer a great price, but usually have low quality fabrics, poor fit, and a questionable supply chain. (They don't get those prices through 'magic')At the other end of the spectrum, the higher-end, so-called ""Active Lifestyle"" brands offer quality goods with high-tech fabrics and a matching premium price increase. More often than not, this is little more than a façade where they tend to use the same unsustainable practices as the lower-cost brands and don't truly innovate on fabrics, fit, or watching their supply chain closely.In both cases, the end result is consistently sold for more than five times the manufacturing cost, and they all use an outdated approach to fit (s-xl) that leaves many of us in-between sizes. Both low-cost and high-quality brands tend to ignore the full supply chain they use and shoot for low manufacturing costs above all.   Seifer hopes to inspire the necessary changes in the apparel industry while empowering guys to pursue their best selves everyday.
We're starting out with the Perfect Black workout shirt, but this is only the beginning.
If we reach our stretch goals of $50,000 and $75,000, we'll offer Navy and Pine into the mix.
Any money raised above our initial needs for production will go right back into developing top-tier products with a fair supply chain and a price we can all agree on.
How Your Money Will Be Used.
We've spent $3,000 out-of-pocket in product development to get Seifer to this point.
However, as a new retail business, there are minimum order quantities that must be placed when developing new fabrics and manufacturing in the USA (it's not easy being a small fish in a big pond).
If our fundraising goal is hit, your money will go directly into the production and manufacturing of the first Seifer product, with profits going towards developing the brand and expanding the line.

We are utilizing Eco-Circle Polyester that comes from old garments instead of plastic bottles like most “ethical” companies use. This material uses 56% of the energy output to make as regular poly and has about 7/8 savings in greenhouse gas offput. Polyester is great as an athletic fiber because it is very strong, can stretch a little bit without breaking, and can be dyed both in yarn stage or in garment stage.

Tencel is added for a natural feel and an anti-microbial finish that can last for the entire lifetime of the garment. It's made from biodegradable, renewable, sustainably harvested eucalyptus wood pulp. It also happens to be comfortable, lightweight and known for its ability to be grown on low-grade land. Its production uses 80% less water than cotton, and is developed in a closed loop system, which only uses recycled water.

The fabric is finished with Polygiene, a powerful odor and microbe fighter that is bound into the fibers in the shirt. It will never wash out, ensuring the garment is capable and fresh for years to come.

Our recycled fabric is certified Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex, the go-to authority for fabric testing and regulating harmful substances. They make sure every fabric’s origin and contents are totally up front for the consumer. Learn more about  Oeko-Tex 100.

We are also Intertek certified. All manufacturers who become partners with Intertek agree to a rigorous testing process to look for anything from banned colorants to heavy metal, pesticide, or fungicide residue. Learn more about Intertek.

Finally, we are part of the Global Recycle Standard, an international testing agency that confirms claims of recycled material by examining the traceablity of raw materials. Learn more about Global Recycle Standard.
I'm Ben and I live in Denver, Colorado.
I've lived in San Francisco (NoPa), Los Angeles (Arts District), and am now happily settled in Denver, CO. I've found that the city provides the best access for adventure and an active lifestyle.
I'm a fanatic for greyhounds, typefaces, and climbing things (trees, boulders, mountains, buildings).

The apparel world is all I know. I've done production, marketing, styling, and fabric and textile R&D. I was the first employee at another successfully crowdfunded apparel brand and have worked at a few well-known companies including SeaVees, Hautelook, and Oliver's Apparel.
If you have any questions, feel free to drop me a line at Ben@Seifer.co
Our team has done our best to mitigate the risks and challenges for this project.

We have fully functional prototypes for every size and have (along with some friends) been giving them a full run through the wringer. So far, I am proud to say this is an innovative product that functions and fits beautifully for any activity we've thrown at it.

Having worked with our vendors at past employers for almost a year in volumes as high as 300,000 yards, Ben can vouch for quality and timeliness. The production schedule is set, and We're confident in our production partner to manage the manufacturing. That being said, forecasting demand is an inexact science, and if we are humbled enough to have this project exceed the target, delays may occur due to increased production volume, in fabric, shipping, or production stages.

For shipping, We'll be communicating with backers and manufacturers throughout the campaign to ensure the fulfillment timeline stays as accurate as possible. Shipping is included in the contribution, and we intend to keep this 'flat-rate' pricing as a company standard.
Some people aren't going to be able to contribute, and that’s ok! But if you would like to help, please share this campaign with a friend or on social media. Every person counts!",19.0,0,"1 Campaign
We are Picaflor. We love jewellery, we love to use sustainable materials, we love conservation and we love to help women in disadvantaged positions.
Our women are in remote areas of Colombia.

Why do we have a passion to help these women? Our CEO Elizabeth Salaman and her sister Sara are from rural Colombia. They know first hand the struggles these women have. It's the world they know. To now have the opportunity to help women in these areas is a privilege. We have been able to do this since 2009, but now we want to do so much more. Check out our full story video here:

The root of poverty in rural areas around the nature reserves in Colombia is the lack of work opportunities for women. Many families are unable to support their children’s education causing a continuation of the poverty cycle. Our mission is to break that cycle through providing training and employment for women in these areas to make beautiful jewellery using sustainable materials for the Picaflor brand, and sustain a new cycle of provision for their generation, and generations to come.

This campaign would literally change lives. So far the Picaflor project has been able to help and provide employment for 20 women. We want to impact the lives of many, many more women and a successful campaign would enable that to happen.

With additional funding we will be able to provide training and employment for more women in rural areas of Colombia. We are aiming to raise $40,000. That would enable us to double our existing number of employees to 40 women within the next 12 months. We would also invest in marketing and aim to create a global brand for the Picaflor collection of jewellery. The funding would provide us with the ability to buy higher volumes of raw materials, packaging and also tooling.

Your investment in our campaign is THE ONLY way to get your hands on these beautiful pieces of handmade jewellery. They are all made from seeds that come from the Colombian Rainforest, and no piece is exactly the same.
​The women we employ LOVE making jewellery for us. It not only creates financial provision, but also builds self esteem, and creates bonds in the community.
Apart from training the women to make the jewellery, we educate the women about conservation issues.

​Additional funding would also enables us to provide regular medical and dental visits to the villages. It would also ensure that the children will be able to complete their education. Currently on average the schooling for most children ends around the age of 11. You can help us change that.

If you love what we're doing and love what we want to achieve but you're not able to invest right now, you can still help us in a MASSIVE way by spreading the word for us. We all know the power of social media.
Just use the Indiegogo share tools​ to make as much noise as you can about our campaign!

About Moxie Style

Moxie Style is comprised of 5 administrators, one hard working owner, and over 1,800 passionate customers who love fashion! Our goal at Moxie Style is to bring you the best brands, styles, and trends without breaking the bank.

About The Moxie Blazer

What is the Moxie Blazer, you ask? It is form meets function and fashion meets comfort. The Moxie Blazer is designed with real women in mind. Yes, you. The one who's chasing around your children after working a ten hour day. The one who falls asleep on the couch still wearing your office attire with a sink full of dishes and a hamper full of laundry. We know you don't want to have to dry clean your business attire and we know you don't want to spend those precious husband and kid free hours being uncomfortable at the office.
So, we designed The Moxie Blazer just for you. The lightweight, breathable and stretchy Ponte fabric mimics the feel of a sweatshirt while still looking business appropriate. The fabric can be dressed up or down and our blazer is unlined allowing for maximum stretch and movement while wearing.
Functional pockets allow you to store your keys, your phone or any other necessities. Multiple colors choices will expand your business attire to limitless!

What We Need

Our production commitment is 2,000 blazers. Producing 2,000 blazers gives us the best possible production price. Our Indiegogo minimum goal to proceed with production is $50,000 USD. These funds will go directly towards producing the entire Moxie Blazer line in multiple colors.
Early Bird Moxie Blazers: Early Bird Blazers are $40 each and include free shipping within the United States. You will be able to choose your own color upon conclusion of our campaign.
Moxie Blazers: Moxie Blazers are $45 each and include free shipping within the United States. You will be able to choose your own color upon conclusion of our campaign.
Ok, so I've done the math... 2,000 Blazers @ $40 each isn't $50,000.... So where does the extra money go?
Additional funds raised over $50,000 will go towards producing our next fashion line!

The MSRP for our Moxie Blazer is $88

Why in LA?

Why did we decide to produce our line of Blazers in the Los Angeles? Well, we received quotes from multiple production facilities both in the U.S. and outside of it. The costs of producing our blazers overseas was significantly cheaper. But there were quite a few drawbacks, too. Producing overseas doesn't allow us to be there for the entire production process. Our fabric choices would be shipped directly to the factory without us ever seeing them! The blazers would be cut and sewn in factories where we would be unable to oversee the working conditions or the machines.

Keeping production for our Blazers in the United States was a no-brainer for us. Not only can we easily travel to oversee the process, we can rest assured that we are helping our own economy by sourcing and producing locally.

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

Our final approved sample is in hand. The last hurdle we have to overcome is raising the money for production! And that's where you come in!

Other Ways You Can Help

Use the share tools to help us get the word out about our campaign!

column1: Let’s face it: most shoes are specialized. You can buy a lifestyle shoe and wear it out on the town… but you can’t go hiking in it
column2: or you can buy an athletic shoe, but it’s usually only good for one sport
column3: and when you do finally find a cross-training shoe that matches a general movement feel, it’s probably designed by a big company that has purposely given it a crazy color scheme so you have to buy matching clothing to go along with it. How come no one just creates awesome shoes that are versatile and match with everything? Well, that’s where the Stealth Ultra comes in.

column1: We designed this shoe for people from all walks of life. That’s because a) we love people!! And b) That is us – we come from all walks of life! For the people, by the people – that’s how we view what we do.

Whether you are a focused athlete, someone who trains casually, a Ninja Warrior fanatic, an artists, a creator, a student, a dreamer, a visionary, someone who loves Star Wars or video games or someone who just wants an ultra comfortable shoe to wear on the daily, we made the Stealth Ultra for you. Really :-)

We have designed the Stealth Ultra to be your go-to shoe no matter the occasion. “Training. Movement. Life.” Is the mantra. For that we needed a true lifestyle feel accompanied by incredible performance capabilities, great durability, and insane comfort through and through. We think from the first time you put on the shoe you’ll feel the Take Flight difference.
This video will give you a great look at the shoe so you can see the features for yourself.

We designed this shoe with a true-to-fit sizing that mirrors most large shoe brands. We’ve found that half sizes are pretty redundant with only 4mm of difference between them. Because of this, we are making only full sizes. Our promise is, the shoes will fit great! And if they don’t? We will replace them free of charge : ) Plus when the time comes to choose your size, we’ll help you if you have any questions to make sure you get the right shoe the first time.

We might be a bit old-fashioned but we believe in doing things the right way, and that means putting the customer first. In that way, we stand behind this shoe 100%. We’ve tested this shoe, we love it, and so we promise is you will love it too. And if you don’t? Well then we’ll give you your money back, no questions asked : )
For pledging to our campaign we have a few great rewards to offer: from simply being one of the first to wear this shoe and receiving a big discount
column2: to having us teach a Parkour/Freerunning workshop in your town
column3: to even receiving customized shoes! What we aspire to bring through our products is immense value to our customers (aka family), and when leveraged through this Kickstarter campaign, the value is even greater.

column1: Pledge $5 and receive a limited edition wristband!
Pledge $20 and receive one of our ultra comfortable performance tees!
Pledge $69 and receive 1 pair of the Stealth Ultra Shoes! We guarantee you will love them or your money back!
Pledge $119 and receive 2 pairs of the Stealth Ultra Shoes! We guarantee you will love them or your money back!
Pledge $5,000 and receive 40x pairs of the Stealth Ultra Shoes! And we will come to your gym/community and put on a 2-day private Parkour camp!

We are a small team with a big heart. We have 4 core members and a sponsored pro-team from around the world. Everyone is dedicated to making our vision for footwear a reality. Our passions are movement and community. The core-4 below (that’s us) were all in the video you saw. Most of our extended team was in the video too as shown in the Ninja Warrior, Ultimate Beastmaster, and other movement clips.

Take Flight® is a small clothing and shoe company based in Portland, Oregon. We started making apparel and shoes for the discipline of Parkour, and we’ve realized over the years that the demands of the sport make our products amazing for so many other things. So we’ve started making versatile clothing and shoe products for movement, training, and life.
Our mission is to produce the highest quality athletic shoe and apparel for customers worldwide, while providing people the inspiration to discover their own potential through movement.

Our company slogan is ""Jump. Fly. Dream."" We designed this slogan because inherent in this phrase is a perspective Take Flight represents and an inspiration we strive to pass on to others. ""Jump. Fly. Dream."" isn’t just a call to action, it is an appeal to the specific goals and aspirations everyone has to achieve. For all your aspirations, no matter what they are, ""Jump. Fly. Dream."" doesn’t just say “do it,” it says dream big, and pursue those dreams until you reach them.

We have a robust social media that we use to connect with our fans and inspire the world through great movement. If you love our vision for footwear, movement, and community, click the images below to connect with us on our various social media platforms. We’d love to hear from you :-)
FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM | YOUTUBE | TWITTER
You can even contact us directly via email, phone, or text!

Thank you so, so much for checking out our campaign, and supporting our footwear and lifestyle vision. It all comes back to supporting people and communities, and we are so grateful that you've become a part of that vision. We don't believe in ""customers"". We believe in family. If you join us in what we do, then you are now a part of our family. Thank you and welcome!

This is our 3rd shoe, and by now we are really comfortable making shoes. There are always challenges with production, logistics, and other aspects, so we've assembled a great team that can overcome just about anything. We have a great factory partner and we have a team on the ground via a fantastic sourcing agent. If there are any setbacks of any kind, we will keep our backers fully informed. We stand behind these shoes 100%, so if you pledge for a pair of shoes, then you can sit back and relax. We’ll be doing all the lifting to make sure a fresh pair of kicks arrives at your doorstep in no time : )

• This idea is very important for us, because what we do will help many people who are ill with Alzheimer's not get lost and avoid accidents. We still want to leave a mark in the history of how people who could save several lives than ordinary fashion designers.

• In order for us to represent the brand as American or European, we need to raise $ 100,000.
    At the moment, the project is carried out in Russia. I will say right away that we do not have any political views on any country. Our team admires America and Europe and we dream to go live there.

• After we carry out this idea, we will open the site on which there will be a pre-order of the first 100 jackets for only $ 10. Also, the first hundred owners will be assigned a personal sign with our signature and key number of the jacket (from 01 to 100).
• If, unfortunately, we are not able to collect the necessary amount of money, then we will send all the savings to fight hunger in the countries of the 3rd world.

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

    I will say this, in case we collect the necessary money, then we will write on the back of the jacket, “This jacket is created only on donations of kind people from indiegogo.сom”
Student 19 years old. My dream is to leave my mark on history and make this world a bit more innovative.

This idea is very important for us, because what we do will help many people who are ill with Alzheimer's not get lost and avoid accidents. We still want to leave a mark in the history of how people who could save several lives than ordinary fashion designers.
What We Need & What You Get

In order for us to represent the brand as American or European, we need to raise $ 100,000.At the moment, the project is carried out in Russia. I will say right away that we do not have any political views on any country. Our team admires America and Europe and we dream to go live there.

After we carry out this idea, we will open the site on which there will be a pre-order of the first 100 jackets for only $ 10. Also, the first hundred owners will be assigned a personal sign with our signature and key number of the jacket (from 01 to 100).
If, unfortunately, we are not able to collect the necessary amount of money, then we will send all the savings to fight hunger in the countries of the 3rd world.

As I said before, my team and I hope to save a couple of lives for people suffering from Alzheimer's.The system will work under our personally developed Operating System.And neon lights that will help you stand out from the crowd. And everyone will know that you have not a simple jacket at all :)After the expansion we will also prepare for the summer season of athletes and we will make smart clothes for them, it will be very comfortable.
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Frankly, the risks are big, because such a product like ours, such an extensive one, is not on the market. And in creating it, we will allow a lot of mistakes. But I can assure you that if you give our team such support, we can change the whole world of fashion and clothing once and for all!I will say this, in case we collect the necessary money, then we will write on the back of the jacket, “This jacket is created only on donations of kind people from indiegogo.сom”",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >WORLD FIRST Foldable Leather Handmade Handbag
column4:
> 
 

Product Details

 

 

COMBINATO Handbag is Practical

column1: It all started out of love and out of passion from the COMBINATO team.
They fell in love with leather because of its natural beauty. Out of their Love and Passion, this wonderful project was born, as well as the world first foldable handbag.
The leather is the epitome of elegance and it links us to our ancestral roots.
The inspiration for the handbag shape comes from the school lunch boxes which have a similar shape.

column2: >The Combinato team has previous experience of producing and commercializing handmade leather shoes.
>The COMBINATO team knows this industry and its challenges.
>We have been working with well-known people in the Colombian Leather Industry for more than 30 years.
>In COMBINATO we are aware of the guerrilla war that Colombia has been through and the actual impact on the people who at one time were part of it.

>For that reason, with your contribution to this project from a tweet to a monetary contribution, you can help create new jobs and make a difference.  You can help COMBINATO team bring them a new peaceful future.

column1: ","WORLD FIRST Foldable Leather Handmade Handbag  Product Details  COMBINATO Handbag is Practical
It all started out of love and out of passion from the COMBINATO team.
They fell in love with leather because of its natural beauty. Out of their Love and Passion, this wonderful project was born, as well as the world first foldable handbag.
The leather is the epitome of elegance and it links us to our ancestral roots.
The inspiration for the handbag shape comes from the school lunch boxes which have a similar shape.
The Combinato team has previous experience of producing and commercializing handmade leather shoes.
The COMBINATO team knows this industry and its challenges.
We have been working with well-known people in the Colombian Leather Industry for more than 30 years.
In COMBINATO we are aware of the guerrilla war that Colombia has been through and the actual impact on the people who at one time were part of it.

For that reason, with your contribution to this project from a tweet to a monetary contribution, you can help create new jobs and make a difference.  You can help COMBINATO team bring them a new peaceful future.

Hi there, 

      My name is Mashannon and I am a teacher. I work with struggling first and second grade students to help them achieve grade level status in reading. Mashcaps was born out of a need I saw in the classroom and at home with my 10 year old daughter. Kids were showing up to class with every excuse in the book as to why they didn't have their glasses. Coincidentally, my daughter was told by our family optometrist that she would need to wear sunglasses due to a rare freckle on her eye. She was less than pleased. Hence, I created mashcaps. Mashcaps take the stigma of wearing glasses away. There is really no better feeling than seeing a student WANT to wear their glasses. When they get my charms, it puts a smile on their face knowing they now have something other kids don't.

What surprised me were the number of kids bringing me their sunglasses. Boys, girls, and moms! With funding, I'd love to create adult charms and gain licensing rights for Disney, Pokémon, sports logos etc. Although Mashcaps is in its infancy, it has mass market appeal. Companies that sell charms, cater to women and neglect the adult male and children's demographic.  Mashcaps are unique in that they appeal to all genders and have the capacity to attract both young and old. Please help make wearing glasses cool. Support our kids and reading. You can help me by contributing to this campaign, wearing a mashcap, telling all your friends, and using the indiegogo share tools. Thank you for reading and being part of my journey!
