This is the best dress shirt you'll ever wear.  This high performance fabric will keep you cool and dry. You'll never show sweat marks again. Plus the fabric feels great-lightweight, very comfortable and wearable so you can move freely. Say goodby to that boxy feeling you get when wearing a classic dress shirt.

Made from high performance fabric, this performance dress shirt is a sophisticated addition to the business wardrobe. In today's work and play environment, it's all about the survival of the fittest...and this dress shirt is very adaptable due to our 4-way stretch fabric. Details include semi-spread fused collar (throw away those collar-stays), mother of pearl buttons and single cuffs.
The Kuul Thread performance dress shirt is available in the colors below (CLASSIC WHITE &
column2: BLACK, REFLECTING POND (navy blue), SILVER GREY, KUUL BLUE &amp

column1: • Heat humidity and stress, lead to unavoidable sweat and feeling of discomfort. They absorb sweat like a sponge
• Absorb moisture causing discomfort and leading to bad odor
• Restrictive giving you the ill fitted look
• Cotton shirts are useless for job interviews - they wrinkle if you look at 'em weird. Even most ""wrinkle free"" shirts out there still wrinkle-actual example below.
• Color is lost after a few washes or trips to dry cleaner
• Expensive and time consuming maintenance-dry cleaning costs too much

To solve this problem, we've re-engineered the traditional dress shirt and created the Kuul Thread Shirt by utilizing fabric that absorbs, stores and releases heat for optimal thermal comfort. The Outlast® technology gives the ability to continually regulate skin's micro climate. As the skin gets hot, the heat is absorbed, and as it cools, that heat is released.
The cooling technology powering our dress shirts, is embedded in every fiber and it will keep performing for the entire lifetime of the garment.
Heat Regulating Fabric or PHASE CHANGE MATERIALS (PCM) were first developed for NASA to protect astronauts from the extreme temperature fluctuations in space.

The particles are embedded in the fabric and have the capacity to absorb and release thermal energy during the process of melting and freezing, which will regulate the body temperature keeping it just right.
In other words, excess heat generated by the body is absorbed into the dress shirt fibers, reducing overheating and controlling the amount of sweat produced.
This is not your typical wicking shirt which traps heat and creates discomfort. Our dress shirts will minimize sweat and balance skin temperature to create comfort.

Infrared pictures can clearly visualize how Outlast® materials work. Due to basic physical laws all bodies (humans, plants, objects) release energy in terms of thermal radiation. The higher the object's temperature is, the more intensive is the infrared radiation which it releases.
A test was done with a pair of gloves. One glove was equipped with and the other one without Outlast®material. A hand was then laid on an ice block for five minutes. The test proves: With Outlast® products temperature changes can be reduced remarkably

With the subways faltering in major cities like New York, biking is now an established part of commuting culture. But there's a conundrum: how do you bike to an office job without looking like a messenger all day? We believe we have an answer for that.
Save money-never dry clean again. Easy maintenance.

Stop putting a dent in your wallet every time you take your dress shirt to your cleaner. Because it's all about the fabric, our dress shirts are lightweight, wrinkle free, and quick drying. See below how easy it is:
Our 4-way fabric will allow you to feel great at the office or move freely in every activity.          Traveling on long flights isn't a nuisance anymore.

Unlike technology found in sports t-shirts produced by major brands, which properties                disappear after 8-9 washes, the cooling technology powering our dress shirts, is                            embedded in every fiber and it will perform for the entire lifetime of the garment.

Perfectly looking pressed without ironing. Keep that great look throughout the day. People        equate travel clothing with unfashionable and ugly. That's because the ones they have                seen are ugly. Our line of performance dress shirts are a fashionable alternative to regular          clothing.

Kuul Thread odor control protects your garments from smelling like a middle school locker room. Sweat itself is odorless, but it creates the conditions that bacteria need to multiply, and some of those bacteria produce odors. Odor control stops the growth of odor-causing bacteria on fabrics, so you can wear more and wash less.

We use single needle stitching construction for a neater, cleaner look and stronger seam. Single needle seams are sewn along one side, then on the reverse by the same needle. The main advantages are durability, a smooth finish and comfort to the skin even after repeated  laundering.

Our semi-spread collar is an incredibly versatile collar that works great with a professional or casual look and with a variety of tie knots and sizes. The collar and the placket are interlined to give the shirt extra structure for a crisper, more professional look.

Our standard shirt cuff is a traditional barrel cuff (rectangular piece of fabric with square corners) with two buttons to give a more formal look and adjustment options. Cuffs are interlined for a crisper appearance.

Button it up and is too stuffy, especially for guys with bigger body. Button it down, and it's too revealing. We had to rethink the button layout to prevent revealing too much chest (hair) and add versatility to our dress shirts.
Premium buttons. These are found only in high quality and custom shirts. These will be more resistant to cracking than any plastic button.
NOTE: Beginning with this year (2019) a portion of our production (approx. 25%) will be Made in Europe.

In other words, excess heat generated by the body is absorbed into the dress shirt fibers, reducing overheating and controlling the amount of sweat produced.
This is not your typical wicking shirt which traps heat and creates discomfort. Our dress shirts will minimize sweat and balance skin temperature to create comfort.

Infrared pictures can clearly visualize how Outlast® materials work. Due to basic physical laws all bodies (humans, plants, objects) release energy in terms of thermal radiation. The higher the object's temperature is, the more intensive is the infrared radiation which it releases.A test was done with a pair of gloves. One glove was equipped with and the other one without Outlast®material. A hand was then laid on an ice block for five minutes. The test proves: With Outlast® products temperature changes can be reduced remarkably
You can now bike to work

With the subways faltering in major cities like New York, biking is now an established part of commuting culture. But there's a conundrum: how do you bike to an office job without looking like a messenger all day? We believe we have an answer for that.
Save money-never dry clean again. Easy maintenance.

Stop putting a dent in your wallet every time you take your dress shirt to your cleaner. Because it's all about the fabric, our dress shirts are lightweight, wrinkle free, and quick drying. See below how easy it is:
Our 4-way fabric will allow you to feel great at the office or move freely in every activity.          Traveling on long flights isn't a nuisance anymore.

Unlike technology found in sports t-shirts produced by major brands, which properties                disappear after 8-9 washes, the cooling technology powering our dress shirts, is                            embedded in every fiber and it will perform for the entire lifetime of the garment.

Perfectly looking pressed without ironing. Keep that great look throughout the day. People        equate travel clothing with unfashionable and ugly. That's because the ones they have                seen are ugly. Our line of performance dress shirts are a fashionable alternative to regular          clothing.

Kuul Thread odor control protects your garments from smelling like a middle school locker room. Sweat itself is odorless, but it creates the conditions that bacteria need to multiply, and some of those bacteria produce odors. Odor control stops the growth of odor-causing bacteria on fabrics, so you can wear more and wash less.

We use single needle stitching construction for a neater, cleaner look and stronger seam. Single needle seams are sewn along one side, then on the reverse by the same needle. The main advantages are durability, a smooth finish and comfort to the skin even after repeated  laundering.

Our semi-spread collar is an incredibly versatile collar that works great with a professional or casual look and with a variety of tie knots and sizes. The collar and the placket are interlined to give the shirt extra structure for a crisper, more professional look.

Our standard shirt cuff is a traditional barrel cuff (rectangular piece of fabric with square corners) with two buttons to give a more formal look and adjustment options. Cuffs are interlined for a crisper appearance.

Button it up and is too stuffy, especially for guys with bigger body. Button it down, and it's too revealing. We had to rethink the button layout to prevent revealing too much chest (hair) and add versatility to our dress shirts.
Premium buttons. These are found only in high quality and custom shirts. These will be more resistant to cracking than any plastic button.
NOTE: Beginning with this year (2019) a portion of our production (approx. 25%) will be Made in Europe.
I wanted to create a curated Collection of Beautiful Luxury Intimates. Intimisii is Love… Sensual… Alluring… The ambiguity that offers Mystery with a Hint of Transgression!
Intimisii is the ability to have an intimate relationship with Self… it is The Quintessential Timeless Classics that accentuates the very essence of your couture!

Every woman’s repertoire of intimates belongs to a special niché of seduction. Intimisii’s Luxury designed Chemises, Camisoles, Slips, Gowns, Kimonos, Baby Doll, Pajamas, Bottoms, and Sexy Tap Shorts are so ambiguous it can be worn both elegantly in the evening at the Opera or intimately alone in the boudoir.
Intimisii’s ambitious and visionary mission is to Adorn you with meticulous, uncompromising Luxurious Silks &

column2: CEO of Intimisii LLC is a thought leader and entrepreneur in the fashion industry. An alumnus at The University of Chicago School of Social Service Administration, I’ve always had a passion to empower people and inspire those around me to embrace their given beauty and walk in their purpose.

column1: Ambitious and persistence are qualities I possess that helped me get to where I am today!  Lingerie isn't just for your significant other on anniversaries and holidays—more and more women are choosing to lounge around in their lingerie for the sake of self-love and self-care alone. It is so important that all women have access to clothing that makes them feel sensual and powerful.

However, as a plus-size curvaceous woman, luxury intimates are not readily available unless custom made, which is problematic. Therefore, many women are compelled to revert to less expensive fabrics that may look nice when purchased but lack the quality of a well-staple piece.

Mainstream fashion is focused on racy and trendy lingerie that excludes millions with different values. We believe every woman, regardless of size or faith, deserves access to fall in love with their body unapologetically! Intimisii wants to capture the Muslim and curvaceous silhouette.  As women, we share the same ideology when it comes to looking and feeling beautiful and sensual about ourselves, regardless if worn in the privacy of your boudoir.

Intimisii bridges the gap between art and instrumentality. We pursue design with intent. We create Luxury Intimates for the woman who leaves you breathless when she walks in and steals your attention after she leaves.

We believe the future of Luxury Intimates depends on character fluidity and a willingness to accept change with ease. We believe that the Muslim woman, curvaceous woman, and mainstream fashion should represent similar adaptability composed of intimates as independent as they are uniquely complementary. Intimisii feels that societal runway standards should inspire all silhouettes to leave their mark amid constant evolution, lifestyles, size or faith.

Intimisii Luxury Curated Collections are made with the finest Mummy Chemise Silk and Solstiss Lace. Designed and manufactured in New York, each Collection reflects the beauty and aesthetic of the designs that are carefully selected. Then there is the challenge of diversification
column2: mainstream fashion, the Muslim woman, and the curvaceous woman combining the practical demands with innovation for the total offer. The merchandising and display reflect the needs of a woman to experience not only sensuality and grace but also passion, the longing to buy and the pleasure to browse Atelier or online.

column1: Join us in making this vision a reality!

column2: >We are one step closer to production! But before we can begin manufacturing, we need to purchase our designs from our Designer and receive the Sample Collection which we can use for photography and fashion shows. Due to your generous and enthusiastic support, we have already raised $10,000! This allowed Intimisii to finance our team and product design process. Now we need an additional $16,000 to have complete ownership of the collection, including a prototype collection.

>Without your support, grassroots entrepreneurs like Vanessa will lack the resources to launch a business. Historically, new business ventures have only been accessible to the rich and powerful—men with the capital to invest in their own ideas. But now, with the help of crowdfunding platforms like Indiegogo, we have the power to take the economy into our own hands. By investing in our business, you're not just supporting a vision for an inclusive lingerie industry—you're joining a wider movement for a world in which the people have their own voice in the economy. America is more than just the 1%, and your donation is rooted in the proven power of collective action to challenge and overthrow entrenched and oppressive systems. By joining this campaign, you're taking real action to building the inclusive and free society we all deserve.

>Whether or not you have the financial resources to help us reach our goal, ​sharing this campaign (use Indiegogo share tools!) with friends and family is a powerful way to act in solidarity with our vision. We are so thankful for all the support we've received—it has been incredibly uplifting and hopeful to experience the overwhelming amount of enthusiasm and support in response to this idea.

Mechanical watches are becoming more than just accessories, it’s engraved into our lives and it reflects our unique personality. AG-Collection adapts design traits of sports cars to show the driven force of any successful person. You could truly sense the presence of time and speed through our unobstructed and unrestraint design. On the other hand, we own complicated mechanism in our watch as it extends beyond simple time displays of hours and minutes.


Inspired by premium sports sedan, AG-Collection uses a square with soft- edges bezel to encase the entire watch structure. What’s the highlight? We borrowed styling cues from parts and components of sports cars to create our own dial and components.

Taking practicality and convenience into account, we design the calendar button inward to avoid contact pressure between the crown and the wrist.

If you ever wonder what your watch look like inside, we created a semi-hollow look so you could appreciate the mechanism of this watch at a whole new level. Each part is carefully assembled so show the internal structure and movements. This vivid visual is what you see on AG-Collection.

We are obsessed with time, and it is reflected on the complexity of our watches. AG-Collection includes day/date display, calendar and chronograph in a single timepiece. The level of complexity involved in designing, engineering and assembling these horological features may be difficult, but as a company who have done it for others, we are confident to produce this exquisite timepiece. Not to forget, this horological design doesn’t require you to take out the phone to view the calendar
column2:
all you need to do is look at your watch.

 

Unlike quartz watch, AG-Collection employs the reliable Japanese Miyota 9122 mechanical movement with 26 Jewels for long-lasting and stable performance. The natural motion of swinging the watch transfers into energy and power up the watch. You could also turn the crown for manual winding the watch before wearing it.

AG-Collection comes with self-illuminating feature that could stay illuminated for up to 5 hours.

The synthetic sapphire crystal glass has hardness second to diamond. Therefore the watch is wear and scratch-resistant. Besides, the sapphire crystal enhances visual clarity and comes with anti-reflecting coating to give you a better view of time.

As AG-Collection contains a lot of precise and delicate assemble, each piece of AG-Collection is hand-polished by our very own watch master. Our watch master has experience of more than 10 years in the industry, and it is carefully assembled in a dust-free environment.

AG-Collection comes with finely stitched leather straps to ensure comfortable wear on your wrist. Besides that, you could easily change the straps according to your personal preference. It’s quick and easy!

We understand what it’s like to choose a mechanical watch. There are lots to consider like quality, design, and brand. Perhaps you’re asking, why should you choose us? For many years, we’ve been producing watches for other high-end brands and we are used to producing high precision, high quality, and high-performing watches.

As we venture into establishing AG-Collection
column3:
we assure you the best of quality as we look forward to produce this up-to-the-trend mechanical watch at a better rate.

column1: Over the last 4 years, we've created the world’s most comfortable and sustainable underlayers and loungewear with help from our amazing backers. 2 years ago, we began pooling all of our resources, sweat and tears into our most ambitious project to date, and we’re finally ready to share it with you:
Introducing the easiest way to create your own one-of-a-kind dress shirt, tailored to fit you perfectly.

We partnered with our friends at MagicWeaver to bring you the fastest, easiest, and most accurate custom tailoring process ever. Instead of taking hours to get measured at a local tailor, simply use our app to do it in minutes.
Stand out from the crowd with infinite ways to customize &
column2: personalize your shirt. Express yourself to the fullest by making your shirt unique and personal to you.

column1: •  Trim: 12 trim fabrics to choose from to line the inner collar and sleeves
•  Monogram: 3 typeface options, 3 locations, up to 5 characters
•  Fabric: Over 40 to choose from, with more unlocked via stretch goals

column2: Thread: 12 buttons of various colors and styles to make your shirt special

column1: Every shirt we make goes to a happy home. There are no unsold shirts that no one wants, taking up space in sad warehouses.
Super efficient precision manufacturing. Your shirts are precision cut to your measurements with pinpoint accuracy. We optimize our cut patterns so that more fabric is used and less is thrown away.
Directly shipping from manufacturing to your home. We save fossil fuels and energy by minimizing the path the product takes to get to your home, down to one straight path.
We’re working closely with our amazingly talented sister company MagicWeaver for this cutting edge tailor measurement process.

MagicWeaver is a team of former Dreamworks 3D VFX developers, data scientists, and machine learning specialists. They’ve combined these unique skills to create a technology that integrates AI, 3D graphics and computer vision to turn your photos into the world's most accurate model of your body. The EP team has integrated their amazing technology to give you the best fitting clothing you’ll ever wear, through the quickest tailoring process ever.

The undertaking of this project is massive. We’re literally innovating at the forefront of measurement technology and distribution with this project. As such, besides the normal costs of manufacturing, clothing prototyping and research, we also have to hire developers to integrate MagicWeaver’s technology into the Element Pure website in order to bring you the best experience for customizing your unique statement dress shirts.

So far, because we believe in this so much, we’ve poured all of our resources into this and have gone ALL IN, using all of our available resources to ensure the success of this project, and we need your help for the final push.
We’re so excited to get these personalized dress shirts into your hands, because we know you’ll absolutely love them.
While we're confident you won't need it, we provide a $25 Alterations Credit with every custom shirt, so you can get it adjusted by a local tailor if there are any fit related issues.
If there’s a manufacturing defect in the clothes, we’ll exchange them within 60 days in the US. International shipments will carry special considerations depending on each situation​.​
Whatever the situation, we will be there to take care of you!

This is now our third crowdfunding campaign, and we’ve learned tons from both of our previous highly successful campaigns. We delivered our sustainable baselayers and super comfy loungewear and underwear to our backers in smooth and speedy fashion, and we can’t wait to do it again with this campaign, but even better.

There’s bound to be some complexity that arises due to added features and options from our stretch goals that may cause more time needed for delivery, but we’ve fully planned how to tackle them. Unforeseen production issues may also come into play, but we’ve made sure to test all the processes as much as possible to minimize the possibility of that occurring.
In any case, we’re fully ready to bring you the perfect personalized, one-of-a-kind dress shirt to your door by January 2020!

 NOTE* This offer is only available during IndieGoGo - Hemp Eyewear will will resume normal retail price (£180  /  $230) after our campaign has finished. So pre-order  your sunglasses now!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our Walden style is named after the book by Henry David Thoreau, which reflects upon simple, environmentally healthy living in a woodland cabin.

 

Our Muir style is named after John Muir, one of the first American environmentalists. Known as ""Muir of the Mountains"" and the ""Father of the national parks,"" he was an ecological hero. So, we named our most classic frame after him.

 

 

 

This frame colour represents our unique hemp material in all of its unfiltered glory. The plant fibres are left in their natural state with absolutely no colouring whatsoever. 

 

 

 

Using naturally extracted organic dye, we’ve created a darker colour to give you a more classic option. These earthy frames are made from plants that are quite literally are grown in the earth. Natural hemp fibre specs are visible on the material surface which creates a look that we like to call “tortoise hemp’.

 

 

Deep blue colouring from eco dye is combined with our sustainable hemp technology to create this bold frame colour.

 

 

An earthy colour for natural eyewear and our classic lens.

 

 

This yellow tint is from a performance range of lens dyes. This particular shade was developed to help professional tennis players.

 

 

Floral vibes and crimson tones.

 

 

A gradient lens from pale grey to black.

 

 

A hemp fabric box, protective hemp pouch and microfibre cleaning cloth is included with every pair of sunglasses.

 

 

Everything about our eyewear is unconventional: the materials, the process, the design and the look. If you’re someone who sees things differently, this one’s for you.

 

 

 

We want the lifecycle of hemp to be as long as possible. Our two-year warranty covers damage and defects, and we’ll provide a replacement pair for frames that cannot be repaired.

For as long as you have your sunglasses, we’ll do our best to repair your frames and keep them wearable for years to come, free of charge.

 

 


Most eyewear is mass-produced by machines in factories that use plastic as the main material.

Plastic is terrible for the environment as it contributes to climate change and ocean pollution, not to mention every product looks exactly the same and lacks character.

 

Hemp is the most sustainable, eco-friendly and diverse resources on earth — but not many know about it... and no... you can't smoke them.

 

 

 

It’s the most sustainable material on earth, and it also happens to be absolutely beautiful.

 

 

We decided to use hemp in developing the “world’s first” hemp eyewear, that’s better for the environment and acts as a talking point to raise awareness of hemp. 

 

 

The plant’s fibres also create unique patterns, which makes each pair of sunglasses as individual as the person who wears them.

 

 

Nature has no straight lines.

Our plant fibre material is unlike any plastic or wood grain, as the material is actually made up of thousands of individual plant fibres.
 


 

 

Our hardened frame material is formed by processing plant fibre into solid material.

 


 

It is comprised simply of hemp fibres and the right amount of water which reacts with the hemp as a binding agent, proving that we don’t have to use plastics for eyewear anymore.


 

 

All of our frames are crafted by hand using our sustainable technology, organic materials and traditional artisanal techniques. Every single screw, rivet and hinge is marked, drilled and assembled by a real human being, not a machine.

GIF

We only use precision-engineered components made from the best materials — if it's not made from hemp, then it's made from the highest-grade titanium or alloy to guarantee long-lasting performance and quality.

 

 

Hemp Eyewear is not mass producing tens of thousands of frames through injection moulding plastic. There are no instances of mistreatment amongst our workers or mysteries surrounding any part of our production process.

 

 

 

Your nose will also thank you when wearing Hemp Eyewear. Even our nose pads are made from hemp for maximum comfort.

 

 

Have you ever been told you have a big head? We have. And we’ve accounted for the unfortunate people like us. Our high-grade nickel spring hinges allow anyone to wear our eyewear, no matter your head shape or size.


 


Our eyewear is for those of you who like to stand out, for eccentric, characterful, contrarian individuals.


 


 

 

Protect the planet.. and your eyes. Our lenses protect you from 99-100% of UV light from the sun. So we've got you covered.

These earthy frames are made from plants that are quite literally are grown in the earth. Natural hemp fibre specs are visible on the material surface which creates a look that we like to call “tortoise hemp’.  Deep blue colouring from eco dye is combined with our sustainable hemp technology to create this bold frame colour.  An earthy colour for natural eyewear and our classic lens.  This yellow tint is from a performance range of lens dyes. This particular shade was developed to help professional tennis players.  Floral vibes and crimson tones.  A gradient lens from pale grey to black.  A hemp fabric box, protective hemp pouch and microfibre cleaning cloth is included with every pair of sunglasses.  Everything about our eyewear is unconventional: the materials, the process, the design and the look. If you’re someone who sees things differently, this one’s for you.   We want the lifecycle of hemp to be as long as possible. Our two-year warranty covers damage and defects, and we’ll provide a replacement pair for frames that cannot be repaired.For as long as you have your sunglasses, we’ll do our best to repair your frames and keep them wearable for years to come, free of charge.  Most eyewear is mass-produced by machines in factories that use plastic as the main material.Plastic is terrible for the environment as it contributes to climate change and ocean pollution, not to mention every product looks exactly the same and lacks character. Hemp is the most sustainable, eco-friendly and diverse resources on earth — but not many know about it... and no... you can't smoke them.   It’s the most sustainable material on earth, and it also happens to be absolutely beautiful.  We decided to use hemp in developing the “world’s first” hemp eyewear, that’s better for the environment and acts as a talking point to raise awareness of hemp.   The plant’s fibres also create unique patterns, which makes each pair of sunglasses as individual as the person who wears them.  Nature has no straight lines.Our plant fibre material is unlike any plastic or wood grain, as the material is actually made up of thousands of individual plant fibres.   Our hardened frame material is formed by processing plant fibre into solid material.  It is comprised simply of hemp fibres and the right amount of water which reacts with the hemp as a binding agent, proving that we don’t have to use plastics for eyewear anymore.  All of our frames are crafted by hand using our sustainable technology, organic materials and traditional artisanal techniques. Every single screw, rivet and hinge is marked, drilled and assembled by a real human being, not a machine.GIFWe only use precision-engineered components made from the best materials — if it's not made from hemp, then it's made from the highest-grade titanium or alloy to guarantee long-lasting performance and quality.  Hemp Eyewear is not mass producing tens of thousands of frames through injection moulding plastic. There are no instances of mistreatment amongst our workers or mysteries surrounding any part of our production process.   Your nose will also thank you when wearing Hemp Eyewear. Even our nose pads are made from hemp for maximum comfort.  Have you ever been told you have a big head? We have. And we’ve accounted for the unfortunate people like us. Our high-grade nickel spring hinges allow anyone to wear our eyewear, no matter your head shape or size. Our eyewear is for those of you who like to stand out, for eccentric, characterful, contrarian individuals.   Protect the planet.. and your eyes. Our lenses protect you from 99-100% of UV light from the sun. So we've got you covered.",55.0,0,"3 Campaigns

0,"

 

""We're making a watch from recycled coffee."" By now, we're used to the astounded look on people's faces when we tell them about our new watch. But we really wanted to make this watch – not only because we were sold on the idea, but also because we love watches and coffee! With your help, the Coffee Watch now becomes a reality!

 

 

Designed with a case made from recycled coffee grounds, the Coffee Watch is a true pioneer when it comes to sustainable living. Not only does it look and feel good, but it's also sturdy and robust – and even offers a gentle coffee aroma! The Coffee Watch is stylish, boasting several eye-catching details in reference to our favorite hot beverage, as well as a recessed crown on the back of the case. Last but not least, we set up an incredible  deal. The world's very first watch made from recycled coffee will be offered well below the future retail price!

 

 

FOR THE EARLY BIRDS

The Coffee Watch is perfect for early birds - and Indiegogo is the perfect place for the Coffee Watch! So this is the right place to become one of the first people to own the Coffee Watch. We'll engrave the serial number on the case back to make your watch truely one-of-a-kind! What's more, by buying now on Indiegogo, you're guaranteed to get the Coffee Watch at a better rate than for the later retail price!

 

 

A TRUELY UNIQUE MATERIAL 

In Germany alone, more than 20 million tons of coffee grounds are collected every year. It would be a shame if they went to waste! Luckily, there are companies like Kaffeeform. Also from Berlin, this young and innovative firm uses a complex upcycling process to turn coffee grounds into a material that is traceable, that is eco-friendly, and that tells a story.

The coffee grounds are collected by bicycle couriers from cafés across Berlin, then dried in community workshops and prepared for further processing. The material is made entirely of 100% plant-based ingredients and contains no harmful chemicals. What's more, it's not only durable and robust, but also fully recyclable. 

The material gives off a subtle coffee aroma and also its distinct color and texture convey the unmistakable look and feel of coffee. The final result is slightly different for each watch case, creating a true one-of-a-kind watch.

 

 

FROM COFFEE GROUNDS TO THE WATCH CASE

 

 

THE DESIGN: ONE-OF-A-KIND

Coffee is a unique material for a one-of-a-kind watch. Due to the nature of the grounds, The beloved beverage is celebrated in the design of the watch by way of subtle details: depending on the angle, you can make out the shapes of charming coffee cups and beans. We cleverly recessed the crown into the case back to provide for a closed, round, and minimalist look.

We designed the watch to be casual and a bit understated by incorporating a minimal Bauhaus style dial complete with a subtle sun-burst effect and thinned hour and minute hands. The core is made of stainless steel so you can rest assured that the watch will last for many years to come. Finally, in order for the Coffee Watch to properly display the time at all times, we incorporated a reliable and super precise quartz movement from the Swiss manufacturer Ronda.

 

TIME FOR A SUSTAINABLE LIFESTYLE

Coffee and time go perfectly together: Coffee time is always time well spent. Nothing lifts our spirits like a coffee break. This is what we wish to convey: The Coffee Watch is a tribute to the champion of hot drinks. Coffee calms us down – then fills us with new energy!

With the Coffee Watch, we want to show just how exciting a sustainable lifestyle can be. That it's worth challenging the status quo. That it's possible to make a watch out of something as seemingly useless as coffee grounds. That good looking accessories can be compatible with premium quality and sustainability. Ready to join us on our journey? Become one of the very first owners of this extraordinary watch. Together we can make a difference!

100% CARBON NEUTRAL

When it comes to sustainability, it's not just the choice of materials that makes our Coffee Watch unique. We also make sure you can wear your new watch with a good conscious by compensating for 100% of the CO2 emissions generated during production. We do this by way of a climate donation. Together with Climate Partner we support projects engaged for a positive climate change. 

Our sustainability approach doesn't end there – we also choose the most eco-friendly alternatives for our packaging and shipping.

 

OUR LOVE FOR COFFEE &
column2:
WATCHES

 

 

DESIGNED BY AWARD-WINNING EXPERTS

Having an exciting material at your disposal is one thing. Creating an exciting watch is another. But our multi-award winning team of designers was up for the challenge! Initial sketches became concrete ideas
column3:
we browsed countless patterns, built prototypes, carried out tests and analyses, and continually made improvements to the details. Luckily, our designers never ran out off coffee! After more than three years of development, the Coffee Watch now is what we had always envisioned!

 

 

CHOOSE YOUR DESIGN

Like coffee itself, the Coffee Watch is available in different types. The dial comes in two versions: a minimalist version with fine engravings, and a more classic version with typical Lilienthal Berlin numerals. As for the color, you can choose between black and silver.

You can choose between straps made from vegetable-tanned organic leather and vegan cellulose-based leather in coffee tones as well as two mesh straps made of interwoven stainless steel in the colors of the dials. All the straps are extremely robust and comfortable to wear, and come with a quick-release mechanism for mixing and matching!

 

 

PREMIUM GERMAN QUALITY

The Coffee Watch has been our most challenging project to date. After all, we were dealing with a completely new material. Fortunately, we were able to rely entirely upon the expertise of our partners. The Coffee Watch is made in Germany by bona fide watchmaking experts. Thanks to the ""Made in Germany"" label, our watches are guaranteed to last – which is, by the way, part of our commitment to sustainability!

 

 

OUR GUARANTEE

Great watch making skills. Partners that we can rely on. A material that has been tested over and over again. A quality made in Germany. All this ensures that the Coffee Watch is ready to face any situation. And in case that there´s any issue, we´ll be there for you: We´ll provide a full 2-year guarantee!

 

 

 

 

SET YOUR STANDARD

Lilienthal is a young watch brand from Berlin. We started out five years ago with lots of ambition. Our goal always has been the same: to set new standards.

We've won 25 awards for our designs, our multicultural work environment, and our eco-friendly production methods. We sell our watches all over the world and are backed by a dedicated community. Thanks to their help, we pulled off a real coup last year: In Germany, we won the ""Watch of the Year"" award, beating all the established luxury brands from Switzerland or Glashütte! And we're just getting started. The key to our success lies in going the extra mile and workig hard to improve upon everything we do. It's not for nothing that our motto is SET YOUR STANDARD!

 

A WIN-WIN PARTNERSHIP 

Three years ago, we discovered a to-go cup made from coffee. Fascinated by the material, we decided it would be cool to use it to make one of our new watches. As luck would have it, Kaffeeform, the company that made the sustainable material, was located right around the corner from our office. It didn't take long for us to set up a meeting with Julian, the founder of Kaffeeform, and toss around some initial ideas. The chemistry was right and we quickly agreed to tackle the project together! Julian offered helpful suggestions each step of the way, from the very first sketches to the final prototypes. Without him, our Coffee Watch project would never have passed the idea stage. But now, our idea is becoming a reality!

 

 

 

HOW TO GET THE COFFEE WATCH

Select one of the available perks. Remember: they  are limited! But either way, you'll get the Coffee Watch at a better rate than the later retail price. 
Please note the shipping dates for the perks. You will be charged immediately but will receive the Coffee Watch in March or April.
You have 10 days to refund your contribution.

 

 

WORLD WIDE SHIPPING

We send the watch to every country. Shipping to the US, EU, and UK is free! All shipping costs to other countries can be seen when you order the watch. We´ll also let you know that we won´t cover additional fees for taxes, imports, or handling in countries other than the US, EU, or UK. These fees will need to be paid by the customer.

 

PRESS INQUIRIES

Want to write a review of the Coffee Watch or our company? Please do!  You can download our press kit here: https://bit.ly/3apu96u

column2: >Organized Packing For Up To 5 Days
column3:
>Our Story

At Mi Terro, we believe that fashion doesn’t have to be fast, disposable, or temporary. We believe it should begin and end with a classic collection of well-designed essentials. And we’re starting that collection with a premium duffle suitcase – Mi Terro CDS.

Since we believe a product’s lifespan should be as timeless as its design - simplicity and sustainability were integral parts of our design process.

Mi Terro's Premium Cork Duffle Suitcase has 17 convenient features for your benefit combined into one eco-friendly and fashionable bag. 

Our cork comes from the bark of cork oaks, so when we harvest them we save nature by not cutting down the trees. It is also endowed by mother nature with more durability than leather. Due to its honeycomb cell structure, you can save on maintenance costs compared to a leather bag. 

Cork is less dense than leather, meaning you get a lighter bag for the same size. You can even bring it as a carry-on in the airplane. The exterior is stainless, so you don't have to send it to an expensive repair place.  

Its waterproof coating allows it to withstand water, whereas it ruins regular leather bags.

Did you know that cork insulation also protects NASA's space rocket from fire and ice, ranging from -423°F to more than 200°F?  

We collect the plastic from the ocean and recycle them into usable material.  This saves our oceans from pollution.

First, we wash and sort them. Then we grind them into a powder and heat it up to pellets we can roll into a yarn. That yarn them ends up in your CDS as part of the zipper and inner lining. For each bag, we remove 2 pounds of plastic from our oceans and transform them into fashion pieces.
column4:
>Mi Terro CDS Details

Exterior: High-Quality Scratch Proof Cork Fabric and Recycled Plastics

Meets Airline Carry-on Dimensions

100% Water-resistant

Water-resistant YKK Zippers

Ventilated Shoe Pocket (Fits up to size 12 Men's)

iPhone Sized Pocket (Fits all types of phones)

Convertible Messenger Bag (Designed for Laptop, iPad, Chargers &
column6:
Removable Key Fob

Interior Mesh Pockets

Concealed Wallet Pocket

Extra-Wide Detachable Shoulder Strap with Shoulder Pad

Water-resistant compartment for wet clothing and toiletry

The spacious design is complemented by 16 utility pockets that allow you to bring your pens, laptop, tablet, and much more. The removable interior slides let you choose between one big compartment or three separate ones for your needs.
column7:
>Product

 Each Mi Terro CDS includes one removable strap and one messenger bag
column8: >Meets Every Demand
column9:
>Partnership 

We are partnering with Eden Reforestation Projects to Make Earth Green Again! For every bag we sell, we plant 10 trees! You are NOT just buying a product, you are helping to make our environment GREEN again.
column10:
>Return Policy

We offer a 30-day return policy. Returns are accepted within 30 days of receiving the product as long as it is in original condition (meaning no damage in any form). All refund will be processed as store credits. But don't worry, we know you are going to love it!
column11:
>Risks and challenges

In fashion and its complex supply chain, delays due to natural occurrences or human error may sometimes be inevitable. We will adhere to our timeline shipping them in May of 2019.

International backers will be subject to import duty and taxes
column12:
these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this Kickstarter campaign. 

The real product feature higher quality materials than the final prototype shown in the pictures.

0,"

ALL backers that pledge at the $38+ level get a FREE pair of socks along with THE EVERYDAY CHINO for their support as a thank you!

Press:

Forbes: ""Barley &
column2:
Britches, aims to disrupt the men’s fashion industry by cutting out retailers and wholesalers and delivering clothes direct from the manufacturer""

Details: ""next time you think about buying a pair of great pants...try something new""

The Crosby Press: ""Between the stupid-low cost of admission, sensible cut, and sporty colors, we think it holds its own""

Premium Quality without the premium price.

 

Created out of frustration and refusal to pay for garments that retail at multiple times their manufacturing cost, we decided to do something about it and founded Barley &
column4:
B).

Founded by Sim Gulati of the leading international apparel manufacturer The Gulati Group, B&
column5:
B is a progressive clothing company developed in the heart of New York City’s fashion district. Sim is striking out on his own, armed with a well-rounded background that was developed working for clients such as Macy's, Nautica and Under Armour, to create a premium fashion brand that is forward thinking and innovative, suited for everyday life and affordable. Premium quality without the premium price.  

It's time to stop paying retail. 

$38 - Delivered to you Direct from the Manufacturer.

PRICING: Retail vs. Barley &
column6:
Britches

Below is a general depiction of the difference between the pricing process of retailers versus that of Barley &
column7: Britches for the identical chino. By removing the wholesaler and unnecessary middlemen, B&amp
column8:
B can bring consumers premium clothing at its original manufacturing sale price, no additional markups. The days of paying inflated retail prices are over.

 

THE EVERYDAY CHINO:

1.) PREMIUM QUALITY - Made of 100% Cotton - A handcrafted, double enforced stitched garment that is crafted with premium 40/20 canvas cotton. It’s developed to be thick enough to keep you warm, while intelligently ventilated to wear while being active. Having such a modern fit allows for an active lifestyle while retaining a casual appeal. 

2.) DESIGN - Wear it from the boardroom to the bar: A versatile pair of Chinos that goes with you where your day takes you. The Everyday Chino can be professionally paired with shoes and a sport jacket or casual with a tee and sneakers. 

3.) NO MARKUP - at $38 The Everyday Chino comes straight form the source. There are no middlemen, retailers or wholesalers along the way adding to the cost. Our clothing comes direct from manufacturer to YOUR doorstep. A similar quality chino would retail for over $130.

4.) OUR PROMISE - We are so confident that you'll love The Everyday Chino that if you don't absolutely love it, the return is on us. We'll grant you store credit when our site launches plus an additional $5. That's how confident we are. 

5.) ETHICAL SOURCING - We believe you should know where your garments come from and who your manufacturers are. Our factories are WRAP certified, we are dedicated to promoting safe, lawful, humane and ethical manufacturing.

COLORS:

UNLOCK NEW COLORS WITH STRETCH GOALS!

We'll be releasing Navy Blue, Black and a color of YOUR choice. A survey will be sent out for Stretch Goal #3 for you to vote on your favorite color as we get closer to the goal.

 

DETAILS AND FIT:

 

STYLING: Dress it up or Dress it down.

 

I'm tired of paying retail. How can I help?

In order to produce The Everyday Chino we need to raise $30,000 to purchase bulk yarn at a discounted price. Every pledge will go towards funding to produce of The Everyday Chino. We want to change the traditional supply chain and need your help. 

Please support us in any capacity that you can - every penny counts and every word counts. By leap frogging retailers and middlemen, we are able to offer you amazing chino's straight from the source. 

Thank you for your support!

- B&
column9:
B team 

Help spread the word!

Risks and challenges

This is not our first rodeo. Our founders have produced for retailers and department stores and have lived through many production runs of high-quality garments. We have worked with all of our vendors for years. We know the industry. Even with our experience we know that there are risks moving forward. Timing is the biggest risk. Once we have final quantity we have to purchase grey yarn (yarn that's not spun) from our cotton supplier. Then we will knit the yarn into fabric. This process ensures the highest quality fabric and chino. We plan on shipping The Everyday Chino in February. Despite these challenges, we are committed to delivering high quality products to our backers. We appreciate of the broad support, B&
column10:
B would not be possible without it.

","ALL backers that pledge at the $38+ level get a FREE pair of socks along with THE EVERYDAY CHINO for their support as a thank you!Press:Forbes: ""Barley & Britches, aims to disrupt the men’s fashion industry by cutting out retailers and wholesalers and delivering clothes direct from the manufacturer""Details: ""next time you think about buying a pair of great pants...try something new""The Crosby Press: ""Between the stupid-low cost of admission, sensible cut, and sporty colors, we think it holds its own""Premium Quality without the premium price. Created out of frustration and refusal to pay for garments that retail at multiple times their manufacturing cost, we decided to do something about it and founded Barley & Britches (B&B).Founded by Sim Gulati of the leading international apparel manufacturer The Gulati Group, B&B is a progressive clothing company developed in the heart of New York City’s fashion district. Sim is striking out on his own, armed with a well-rounded background that was developed working for clients such as Macy's, Nautica and Under Armour, to create a premium fashion brand that is forward thinking and innovative, suited for everyday life and affordable. Premium quality without the premium price.  It's time to stop paying retail. $38 - Delivered to you Direct from the Manufacturer.PRICING: Retail vs. Barley & BritchesBelow is a general depiction of the difference between the pricing process of retailers versus that of Barley & Britches for the identical chino. By removing the wholesaler and unnecessary middlemen, B&B can bring consumers premium clothing at its original manufacturing sale price, no additional markups. The days of paying inflated retail prices are over. THE EVERYDAY CHINO:1.) PREMIUM QUALITY - Made of 100% Cotton - A handcrafted, double enforced stitched garment that is crafted with premium 40/20 canvas cotton. It’s developed to be thick enough to keep you warm, while intelligently ventilated to wear while being active. Having such a modern fit allows for an active lifestyle while retaining a casual appeal. 2.) DESIGN - Wear it from the boardroom to the bar: A versatile pair of Chinos that goes with you where your day takes you. The Everyday Chino can be professionally paired with shoes and a sport jacket or casual with a tee and sneakers. 3.) NO MARKUP - at $38 The Everyday Chino comes straight form the source. There are no middlemen, retailers or wholesalers along the way adding to the cost. Our clothing comes direct from manufacturer to YOUR doorstep. A similar quality chino would retail for over $130.4.) OUR PROMISE - We are so confident that you'll love The Everyday Chino that if you don't absolutely love it, the return is on us. We'll grant you store credit when our site launches plus an additional $5. That's how confident we are. 5.) ETHICAL SOURCING - We believe you should know where your garments come from and who your manufacturers are. Our factories are WRAP certified, we are dedicated to promoting safe, lawful, humane and ethical manufacturing.COLORS:UNLOCK NEW COLORS WITH STRETCH GOALS!We'll be releasing Navy Blue, Black and a color of YOUR choice. A survey will be sent out for Stretch Goal #3 for you to vote on your favorite color as we get closer to the goal. DETAILS AND FIT: STYLING: Dress it up or Dress it down. I'm tired of paying retail. How can I help?In order to produce The Everyday Chino we need to raise $30,000 to purchase bulk yarn at a discounted price. Every pledge will go towards funding to produce of The Everyday Chino. We want to change the traditional supply chain and need your help. Please support us in any capacity that you can - every penny counts and every word counts. By leap frogging retailers and middlemen, we are able to offer you amazing chino's straight from the source. Thank you for your support!- B&B team Help spread the word!Risks and challengesThis is not our first rodeo. Our founders have produced for retailers and department stores and have lived through many production runs of high-quality garments. We have worked with all of our vendors for years. We know the industry. Even with our experience we know that there are risks moving forward. Timing is the biggest risk. Once we have final quantity we have to purchase grey yarn (yarn that's not spun) from our cotton supplier. Then we will knit the yarn into fabric. This process ensures the highest quality fabric and chino. We plan on shipping The Everyday Chino in February. Despite these challenges, we are committed to delivering high quality products to our backers. We appreciate of the broad support, B&B would not be possible without it.",12.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >""It's not an accessory, it's a necessity.""

column1: New Tools Inc. was created by construction tradesmen for the purpose of showcasing and marketing a newly designed circular saw tool accessory that safely eliminates the very dangerous practice of pinning up a saw's guard to make industrially common cuts. Our group is made up of dedicated builders, carpenters, masons, concrete-men, and roofers whose founding principle is that workers should not have to jeopardize safety in order to do their job while earning a living. Over the years, each of us have had the experience of either having to pin the guard up on a circular saw, or using someone else's saw that had its guard pinned up to make a cuts that would've been difficult or otherwise impossible. Pinning up the lower guard fully exposes the blade, which is why it is done. Our goal is to provide better and safer ways for tradesmen and DIY'ers to perform any and every type of saw cut they need to do without getting hurt. With construction heating up and projects rapidly expanding more hirees, skilled and unskilled, will be needed and using electric saws while performing a variety of jobs. Many of the new inductees into the world of construction will enter the workforce with little or no training and will learn their trades only by watching and doing. This is why we need to introduce The Saw Guard Dog now--it will aid the experienced and novices alike by making their saws easier and much safer to use, thus reducing the risk of bad practices becoming bad habits resulting in unnecessary bodily injuries.
The video below demonstrates some cuts made easier by the Saw Guard Dog.
Why Is Pinning the Guard Up Dangerous and why is it being done?

column3: >Pinning up a saw guard is dangerous because it's the only protection that stands between the operator and the spinning blade. Exposing the sharp, quickly rotating blade to our human flesh doesn't seem like a good idea, and it isn't. A common saw blade related accident is when cutting through material, the saw's blade binds and pops back up onto the operator, possibly mangling them. If the guard is not there to drop back down in place to cover the saw blade (which it can't when pinned up), the user will sustain serious injuries.
column4: > Even though the pinning up of a circular saw’s guard has been and will remain a violation of OSHA's safety rules indefinitely, it still remains a hidden secret practiced on job sites all across America daily. This is because 99% of the saws on the market today aren't designed for the guard to open every time under every type of cut that’s commonly performed. To counteract this saw guard flaw, workers will put themselves and others in danger and risk fines just to complete the job. It's most commonly done by wedging a piece of wood or nail under the guard's finger tab which then fixes the lower guard in the open position, exposing the saw blade permanently. Therefore, there is no way to quickly remove the wood or nail while operating the saw which would allow the guard to snap shut. It's also a faulty fix for making the saw cut in the first place because the wood or nail can come undone at an inopportune time and the guard could then snag and endanger the worker without warning. As experienced journeymen, we know the consequences of pinning a saw's guard up, as others do too, and the catastrophes that can happen, which for all involved
column5: >shouldn't be worth the risk for making dangerous saw cuts. This common practice will continue unless the Saw Guard Dog gets into the hands of all of these workers and creates a safe solution which still gives them the ability to comfortably operate the saw for difficult cuts.

column3: >The pictures below demonstrates the guard illegally and dangerously pinned up by a block of wood. This leaves the blade fully exposed during the cut and at all other times. Workers also can use nails to do the same thing, and no matter what it is an unsafe fix.
>This video demonstrates how the wood (or nail) permanently locks the guard up, making the cut possible but also unsafe.

column1: ""Emergency rooms see 10,600 patients a year thanks to these common tools. Unfortunately one California carpenter didn’t make it that far. He was cutting a purlin for a remodeling project while standing on a ladder and supporting himself on a piece of ceiling drywall. He had the saw’s safety guard pinned back. The drywall gave way and the saw slashed his jugular. He died a few minutes later.""  (Forbes.com)

In this one example of the thousands, if he had only been using the Saw Guard dog, all he would have had to do is release the device's trigger. The guard would have immediately snapped shut, saving him from any injury.

column5: >FACT ""A circular saws blade spins faster than that of a table saw's at 120 mph. Hazard Magazine found that of all saw injuries, circular saws make up the largest group at 30 percent, 56 percent involve DIYers, 99 percent were males.""  (Hazards.com)

column1: What does this mean? Circular saws are much more dangerous than many people and workers even realize, not respecting the deadly blade enough. 30% of all saw injuries come from circular saw blades, which are caused by improperly working with the exposed blade pinned up. The Saw Guard Dog can eliminate these injuries easily and efficiently, making the product benefit the working communities' safety incredibly.

The pictures below show the Saw Guard Dog attached to a Skilsaw. As you can see, it's small, stylish and is easy to operate. It looks natural, and only requires a brief, easy installation described later.

The  SAW GUARD DOG is the answer for eliminating the practice of pinning the guard. It simply allows the worker to only partially expose the blade during the cut, covering it back up afterwards. Now just simply pressing a button with your thumb is all it takes to make the cut (black button in above picture). Pressing the button in easily lifts the guard up. However, despite the fact that it lifts the guard just like pinning it up with a nail, it's not permanent. Simply releasing your thumb from the Saw Guard Dog button after the cut has been initiated will quickly snap the guard back shut at the finish of the cut, once more concealing the blade safely and making cutting yourself much harder. With the prevention of injuries, saving thousands of dollars in fines from OSHA, and securing worker safety interacting with circular saw blades, The Saw Guard Dog's benefits are revolutionary.
The GIF below demonstrates the clean simplicity of the Saw Guard Dog. When the guard is up, the worker's thumb is pressing the button forward, releasing snaps the guard down immediately and safely.
How Is It Different Than Pinning the Guard Up?

<blockquote>""Safety guards must never be removed when a tool is being used. For example, portable circular saws must be equipped with guards. An upper guard must cover the entire blade of the saw. A retractable lower guard must cover the teeth of the saw, except when it makes contact with the work material. The lower guard must automatically return to the covering position when the tool is withdrawn from the work."" (<a href=""https://www.osha.gov/pls/oshaweb/owadisp.show_document?p_table=STANDARDS&amp

The Saw Guard Dog meets OSHA's specific standards of having to allow the guard to return to the covering position automatically as soon as the cut is finished. This keeps the blade covered any time which the worker's hand may be near the blade, which pinning it up doesn't do. This is revolutionary in the construction industry because it allows workers to continue making those difficult cuts while still being safe and fulfilling legal requirements. Therefore, workers won't have to worry about being caught by their managers or OSHA and receiving large fines.
The pictures below demonstrates the lifted guard with the worker's thumb pressing it, and the quick release as soon as the thumb is removed, keeping the product within OSHA's ruling.
Unlike using a nail or wood, the guard is easily maneuverable here, helping to expose the only part of the blade needed for the cut, and easily covering it again afterwards.

The sooner we can being distributing the product into the hands of any worker out there, the sooner we prevent injuries and fines. There's already a growing demand for the SAW GUARD DOG here in So. California, coming from tradesmen and business owners who are asking us when it's going to be available and how they can get one. Currently, we lack the funds to mass produce the product, market it to the public, and reach our audience. By helping us today with a backing of whatever means possible, the Saw Guard Dog will be made readily available this summer to anyone that wants to own one.

We have the finished product and a small inventory currently to fulfill the local demand we already have. We're ready to start manufacturing them here in the USA: to get started we're in need of $15,000 to fulfill our current goals. The following details how we plan to spend the minimum amount of money raised:
• Tooling $1,000: Includes finishing the die cut stamp plates and welding jigs to produce the product faster, easier, and more thoroughly.
• Insurance $2,000: General liability $2,000,000 policy to protect our company.
• Initial inventory $8,000: unit parts and packaging sufficient to satisfy our pledge goals and fulfill more orders.
• Advertising (PPC- Google Adwords, Bing) $2,000: 60 day online marketing plan to get the word out and begin selling.

We plan to use the revenue generated from sales to continue to improve the product, bring the cost down for us and consumers, and supply the demand. We also are looking for people who can help distribute the product on any level. If we reach above the $15,000 goal, we plan to focus on inventory and advertising, growing the brand, and lower the cost. We also would look into expanding the design to fit even more circular saws on the market to reach as many workers as we can.

We'll alert the construction industry and DIY'ers to the benefits of using our product by marketing it online directly to the tradesmen and employers that routinely use saws. Our direct online sales marketing tactics include:
• Website buyers landing page: Benefits, why buy, how to buy, how to use
• Blog site: post tips, articles and new products
• Blog post on others sites: new products, construction tips
• Social media presents: Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, SlideShare with updates
• Direct email campaign: Contractors and insurance companies
• Youtube videos- featuring easy to use examples and benefits
• PR outlets: newspapers, trade magazines, trade shows
• Tracking cookies: retargeting ads, adwords, bing, facebook
• Backlinking all marketing and social media to the website
Saw Guard Dog is an aftermarket product that attaches to some of the most common saws being used today. Our current design fits, Skilsaw 77 &
column2: mag77, Craftsman 2761, Bosch 1677MD worm drive saws. We are aiming for retail price of $35-40.  After gaining sufficient orders, we'll streamline manufacturing and build inventory.

column1: The Saw Guard Dog comes in just a few pieces as shown below, easily installed on the saw models listed with just a few screws, no matter the color.
These are the current colors there are to choose from for the Saw Guard Dog, all the same price, but add a different look to the saw.

We're offering an option to our participants the opportunity to add a personal touch to your saw by choosing a color for your SGD bar. Each color has been selected to correspond with dog’s breed, which we feel makes the product personal to the worker. This was done to represent the companionship and relationship we share with man’s best friend and our sometimes job site companion ""THE DOG"". Our        endeavor to choose a dog’s name and then attach it to a color is our attempt to bring some personality and memorability to the subject of working with dangerous   tools. From all us dog lovers here at New Tools Inc. we hope you like these colorful names and that they bring you some measure of pleasure and a dog-gone tool to add to your collection.

The SAW GUARD DOG comes fully assembled and installation takes about two minutes to attach it to a saw. This is accomplished by removing three of the saws existing screws and reusing them to attach the unit to the saw.
Attach driver housing               Attach housing clip                Attach bushing &
(CAUTION! DO NOT BEND THE SAW GUARD DOG STEEL DRIVER)
Any damaged saw guard dog parts should be removed and/or replaced before operating the saw.
When servicing saw guard dog use only identical manufacturer replacement parts.
(WARNING) use of unauthorized parts or failure to follow maintenance and safety instructions may create a risk and serious personal injury.
(PLEASE MAKE CERTAIN THAT THE PERSON WHO IS TO USE THIS EQUIPMENT CAREFULLY READS AND
column2: >UNDERSTANDS ALL OF THESE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE OPERATING BOTH THE SAW GUARD DOG AND SAW).

column1: The SAW GUARD DOG is simple to use: it works by using either hand's thumbs to push a button driver forward, this in turn deploys a guard lifting mechanism that raises the guard as needed to initiate the cut  all the while keeping both hands away from the saw blade and safely holding onto the handles on the saw.

Only activate saw guard dog button when guard binding will occur or unless making special cuts such as pocket cuts or compound miter cuts, for all other sawing the lower guard should operate automatically as designed without the assistance of the saw guard dog.

It’s only necessary to push on the button driver long enough to raise the guard up to initiate the cut after which the button is released and the cut is performed and completed as usual, in which the guard will automatically close as designed.
As a follow up to the anticipated success of the SAW GUARD DOG we’re working on designs and prototypes for the new Skilsaw 77LT and the Big Foot beam saw that will be introduce in the Fall of 2015.
By year’s end 2015 we’ll begin the designing and prototype process for  SAW GUARD DOG units for the Makita, Dewalt and Milwaukee saws.

The SAW GUARD DOG Is a must have for all craftsmen and employers alike, it’s a guaranteed win-win tool for everyone. The main consequences of the Saw Guard Dog should make pinning up the guard unnecessary and obsolete, directly reducing worker injuries and fines given by OSHA.

Craftsmen will enjoy the benefits of how it makes clearly seeing the cut before engaging the saws trigger and the ease of performing difficult cuts without dangerously pre-exposing the saws blade to the user.
Employers will like the fact that their workers are not recklessly pinning up the saw’s guard with a piece of wood or nail for making the difficult cuts while doing their jobs.

We’re asking for your help by whatever means possible. If you only financially support one Indiegogo project per month and you already made a pledge this month please remember us and consider us the next time.

If you’re not able to financially back us for other reasons please share our information with others and explain to them the importance and benefits of what the SAW GUARD DOG is working to accomplish. Most importantly, thank you for viewing our project and taking it into consideration.
The saw guard dog is not intended to be a safety device and shouldn't be treated as a substitution for proper safety practices.
Always check to make sure that the saw guard dog is allowing the guard to properly open and close before plugging in and operating.
Always remove thumb from saw guard dog button after cut is initiated and before it is completed.

Only activate saw guard dog button when guard binding will occur or unless making special cuts such as pocket cuts or compound miter cuts, for all other sawing the lower guard should operate automatically as designed without the assistance of the saw guard dog.
Do not run/operate the saw while carrying it at your side.
Lower guard may become opened by accidentally making contact with your clothing.
Accidental contact with the spinning saw blade will result in serious personal bodily injury.
Always hold the saw and work-piece firmly and at least 1 to 2 feet away from the body at all times.
To ensure the smooth operation of the saw guard dog, keep all saw guard dog moving parts, including the saw’s lower guard bearing-area clean and well lubricated.
Keep work area clear and clean of all debris and away from saw guard dog and saw during use.
(CAUTION! DO NOT BEND THE SAW GUARD DOG STEEL DRIVER)
Any damaged saw guard dog parts should be removed and/or replaced before operating the saw.
When servicing saw guard dog use only identical manufacturer replacement parts.
(WARNING) use of unauthorized parts or failure to follow maintenance and safety instructions may create a risk of serious personal injury.
(PLEASE MAKE CERTAIN THAT THE PERSON WHO IS TO USE THIS EQUIPMENT
CAREFULLY READS AND UNDERSTANDS ALL OF THESE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE
OPERATING BOTH THE SAW GUARD DOG AND SAW).
Q. Is the SAW GUARD DOG unit a safety device for saws?
A. No, SAW GUARD DOGS units are not to be confused with being designed for saw safety and protection, their  purpose is instead for making special cuts that otherwise are done unsafely.
Q. Can I lock my saw guard up using the SAW GUARD DOG?
A. No, It is not designed to lock the saw guard up.
Q. Can I override the SAW GUARD DOG unit and lock my saw guard up?
A. Anythings possible, but why would you that’s what the SAW GUARD DOG was invented to eliminate and it's a 10,000 Dollar OSHA fine if caught.
Q. If I have my work crews installs SAW GUARD DOG units on their saws will my workers compensation or liability insurance go down?
A. Don’t know, you’ll have to ask your insurance company that question.
Q. What benefits will I experience by using the SAW GUARD DOG?
A.You’ll see your mark and cut clearer before starting, and you’ll keep both hands safely on the handles of the saw during every type of cut.
Q. Is the SAW GUARD DOG OSHA approved ?
A.OSHA does not approve any product for use, instead they supply standards and guidelines for products to meet, and yes SAW GUARD DOG does meet OSHA’s requirements 1926.304(d).
Q. Does the SAW GUARD DOG fit all saws?
A.No, currently it fits Skilsaw 77, Skilsaw Mag 77, Bosch 1677MD, and Craftsman 2761.
Q. Are there other SAW GUARD DOG models in the works?
A. Yes, we are currently designing models for Skilsaw 77LT, Dewalt, Makita, and Milwaukee worm drive saws and expect to offer them to the public in the Fall 2015.
Q.I have a Big Foot beam saw do you have a SAW GUARD DOG unit for it?
A.Yes we do, we’ll be introducing a SAW GUARD DOG model for the Big Foot saw later 2015.
