We also are looking for people who can help distribute the product on any level. If we reach above the $15,000 goal, we plan to focus on inventory and advertising, growing the brand, and lower the cost. We also would look into expanding the design to fit even more circular saws on the market to reach as many workers as we can.

We'll alert the construction industry and DIY'ers to the benefits of using our product by marketing it online directly to the tradesmen and employers that routinely use saws. Our direct online sales marketing tactics include:
Website buyers landing page: Benefits, why buy, how to buy, how to use
Blog site: post tips, articles and new products
Blog post on others sites: new products, construction tips
Social media presents: Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, SlideShare with updates
Direct email campaign: Contractors and insurance companies
Youtube videos- featuring easy to use examples and benefits
PR outlets: newspapers, trade magazines, trade shows
Tracking cookies: retargeting ads, adwords, bing, facebook
Backlinking all marketing and social media to the website

Saw Guard Dog is an aftermarket product that attaches to some of the most common saws being used today. Our current design fits, Skilsaw 77 & mag77, Craftsman 2761, Bosch 1677MD worm drive saws. We are aiming for retail price of $35-40.  After gaining sufficient orders, we'll streamline manufacturing and build inventory.
The Saw Guard Dog comes in just a few pieces as shown below, easily installed on the saw models listed with just a few screws, no matter the color.
These are the current colors there are to choose from for the Saw Guard Dog, all the same price, but add a different look to the saw.

We're offering an option to our participants the opportunity to add a personal touch to your saw by choosing a color for your SGD bar. Each color has been selected to correspond with dog’s breed, which we feel makes the product personal to the worker. This was done to represent the companionship and relationship we share with man’s best friend and our sometimes job site companion ""THE DOG"". Our        endeavor to choose a dog’s name and then attach it to a color is our attempt to bring some personality and memorability to the subject of working with dangerous   tools. From all us dog lovers here at New Tools Inc. we hope you like these colorful names and that they bring you some measure of pleasure and a dog-gone tool to add to your collection.

The SAW GUARD DOG comes fully assembled and installation takes about two minutes to attach it to a saw. This is accomplished by removing three of the saws existing screws and reusing them to attach the unit to the saw.                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Step 1                                            Step 2                                                  Step 3
Attach driver housing               Attach housing clip                Attach bushing & SGD bar
(CAUTION! DO NOT BEND THE SAW GUARD DOG STEEL DRIVER)
Any damaged saw guard dog parts should be removed and/or replaced before operating the saw.
When servicing saw guard dog use only identical manufacturer replacement parts.
(WARNING) use of unauthorized parts or failure to follow maintenance and safety instructions may create a risk and serious personal injury.
(PLEASE MAKE CERTAIN THAT THE PERSON WHO IS TO USE THIS EQUIPMENT CAREFULLY READS AND UNDERSTANDS ALL OF THESE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE OPERATING BOTH THE SAW GUARD DOG AND SAW).

The SAW GUARD DOG is simple to use: it works by using either hand's thumbs to push a button driver forward, this in turn deploys a guard lifting mechanism that raises the guard as needed to initiate the cut  all the while keeping both hands away from the saw blade and safely holding onto the handles on the saw.

Only activate saw guard dog button when guard binding will occur or unless making special cuts such as pocket cuts or compound miter cuts, for all other sawing the lower guard should operate automatically as designed without the assistance of the saw guard dog.

It’s only necessary to push on the button driver long enough to raise the guard up to initiate the cut after which the button is released and the cut is performed and completed as usual, in which the guard will automatically close as designed.
As a follow up to the anticipated success of the SAW GUARD DOG we’re working on designs and prototypes for the new Skilsaw 77LT and the Big Foot beam saw that will be introduce in the Fall of 2015.
By year’s end 2015 we’ll begin the designing and prototype process for  SAW GUARD DOG units for the Makita, Dewalt and Milwaukee saws.

The SAW GUARD DOG Is a must have for all craftsmen and employers alike, it’s a guaranteed win-win tool for everyone. The main consequences of the Saw Guard Dog should make pinning up the guard unnecessary and obsolete, directly reducing worker injuries and fines given by OSHA.

Craftsmen will enjoy the benefits of how it makes clearly seeing the cut before engaging the saws trigger and the ease of performing difficult cuts without dangerously pre-exposing the saws blade to the user.
Employers will like the fact that their workers are not recklessly pinning up the saw’s guard with a piece of wood or nail for making the difficult cuts while doing their jobs.

We’re asking for your help by whatever means possible. If you only financially support one Indiegogo project per month and you already made a pledge this month please remember us and consider us the next time.

If you’re not able to financially back us for other reasons please share our information with others and explain to them the importance and benefits of what the SAW GUARD DOG is working to accomplish. Most importantly, thank you for viewing our project and taking it into consideration.
The saw guard dog is not intended to be a safety device and shouldn't be treated as a substitution for proper safety practices.
Always check to make sure that the saw guard dog is allowing the guard to properly open and close before plugging in and operating.
Always remove thumb from saw guard dog button after cut is initiated and before it is completed.

Only activate saw guard dog button when guard binding will occur or unless making special cuts such as pocket cuts or compound miter cuts, for all other sawing the lower guard should operate automatically as designed without the assistance of the saw guard dog.
Do not run/operate the saw while carrying it at your side.
Lower guard may become opened by accidentally making contact with your clothing.
Accidental contact with the spinning saw blade will result in serious personal bodily injury.
Always hold the saw and work-piece firmly and at least 1 to 2 feet away from the body at all times.
To ensure the smooth operation of the saw guard dog, keep all saw guard dog moving parts, including the saw’s lower guard bearing-area clean and well lubricated.
Keep work area clear and clean of all debris and away from saw guard dog and saw during use.
(CAUTION! DO NOT BEND THE SAW GUARD DOG STEEL DRIVER)
Any damaged saw guard dog parts should be removed and/or replaced before operating the saw.
When servicing saw guard dog use only identical manufacturer replacement parts.
(WARNING) use of unauthorized parts or failure to follow maintenance and safety instructions may create a risk of serious personal injury.
(PLEASE MAKE CERTAIN THAT THE PERSON WHO IS TO USE THIS EQUIPMENT
CAREFULLY READS AND UNDERSTANDS ALL OF THESE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE
OPERATING BOTH THE SAW GUARD DOG AND SAW).
Q. Is the SAW GUARD DOG unit a safety device for saws?
A. No, SAW GUARD DOGS units are not to be confused with being designed for saw safety and protection, their  purpose is instead for making special cuts that otherwise are done unsafely.
Q. Can I lock my saw guard up using the SAW GUARD DOG?
A. No, It is not designed to lock the saw guard up.
Q. Can I override the SAW GUARD DOG unit and lock my saw guard up?
A. Anythings possible, but why would you that’s what the SAW GUARD DOG was invented to eliminate and it's a 10,000 Dollar OSHA fine if caught.
Q. If I have my work crews installs SAW GUARD DOG units on their saws will my workers compensation or liability insurance go down?
A. Don’t know, you’ll have to ask your insurance company that question.
Q. What benefits will I experience by using the SAW GUARD DOG?
A.You’ll see your mark and cut clearer before starting, and you’ll keep both hands safely on the handles of the saw during every type of cut.
Q. Is the SAW GUARD DOG OSHA approved ?
A.OSHA does not approve any product for use, instead they supply standards and guidelines for products to meet, and yes SAW GUARD DOG does meet OSHA’s requirements 1926.304(d).
Q. Does the SAW GUARD DOG fit all saws?
A.No, currently it fits Skilsaw 77, Skilsaw Mag 77, Bosch 1677MD, and Craftsman 2761.
Q. Are there other SAW GUARD DOG models in the works?
A. Yes, we are currently designing models for Skilsaw 77LT, Dewalt, Makita, and Milwaukee worm drive saws and expect to offer them to the public in the Fall 2015.
Q.I have a Big Foot beam saw do you have a SAW GUARD DOG unit for it?
A.Yes we do, we’ll be introducing a SAW GUARD DOG model for the Big Foot saw later 2015.",13.0,3,"2 Campaigns

ABOUT MORS OMNIA SOLVIT...

Do you have a great love for cheese pop and guilty television?
Do you wish that you could wear clothing showing your support for these things without the fear of ridicule and abuse?
Mors Omnia Solvit is for those who loves cheesy pop and bad television as well as the finer things in life such as Black Metal.

We have already made a test run of our first shirt the 'Tay Tay' an that sold out in less than a month. Therefore we are looking for backing from fellow CVLT friends to create the first launch which includes:
• 'Saved by the Bell' Hardcore first print
All designs are made in house by one man (literally, in a house) and will be printed by 'Awesome Merchandise' for the highest quality finish.
Furthermore these t-shirts will be made available for a reasonable price rather than having a horrendously high mark up.

column2:
What You Get

We have calculated that in order to start this first official launch and in order to sustain further prints we will require a total of £1000.00

column1: This will be used to order the first three t-shirts with the revenue from these being used to immediately print further designs. We hope to have printed a further 3 designs within the 3 months following this launch.
These initial funds will also be used to purchase unique one off perks for you lovely members of the CVLT including:

• A4 heavyweight Art Prints

    • The Impact

    By contributing to this product you will help make an idea become a reality and help the CVLT rule once more!

column2:
Challenges

With all start ups come risk and as essentially a one man operation it will be time constraints that are the ultimate risk. However, I am a very organised and extremely passionate about this project.

column1:
As stated previously I have already produced an initial test batch of the Tay Tay shirt and this sold out within a month and have had people since asking if they would be reprinted. I see this as an opportunity to reprint as well as expand and intend to keep this going with further designs being printed following the initial launch.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate that this is a pretty hard time of the year for most. Following Christmas not everyone has spare cash floating around.
FEAR NOT! you can still help the CVLT by sharing us on social media outlets such as Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Remember to hashtag MorsOmniaSolvit.

I have made an very large collection of clothes for women and men, I need to produce the collection to all my agents who are placed in different country, so they can sell it for me. That part costs a lot of money .... I have payed the first collection myself, but now I need to make the same collection 6 times more. And for that I need help .... your help .....

 


Will you help me make it happen ? :)

 


I want my own fashion house in the long term, this is going to happen very soon. I will Design and manufactures Fashion Couture and accessories for women and men. I want to sell it to stores, private and purchasers around the world also in Denmark. My fashion couture is to pay for and manufacturing holds both ethical and moral ... I also offer fellows around the world an opportunity to change their living conditions and livelihood and opportunity to get a new start in life by providing various forms of employment in my business and through my charity fund which is attached.

Science tells us that millions of people wear bulky, monochromatic towels around their necks. This epidemic cannot be solved alone.

We're looking for amazing backers to help tell the Scarfle story. We are currently manufacturing for mid-August delivery. That's right ... we'll ship to our initial group of fun seekers as soon as the campaign is over!  And, as a thank you we're putting up a killer deal on Indiegogo.

 

Did we really get a provisional patent for this? Yes, yes we did.

While the Scarfle may be all about enabling fun/ flexible style, we took the design and tech very seriously. Here are the specs:
• 4-way stretch swim fabric in the mid-section hangs naturally around your neck without scrunching up to your ears, has a nice cooling effect, and dries quickly
• Soft microfiber on each end is pure luxury and can completely dry you off
62"" x 35"" -  Normal beach towel size, but rolls/ folds much smaller (and features a bunch of cool stuff normal towels never even thought of)
• PVC-lined Pockets keep your stuff handy whether around your neck or spread out (while keeping debris out)
Fabric magnets configured around the parimeter transform the Scarfle from one shape to the next

Oh, and you can wear it as more than a scarf. 

 

To show it's highly packable here's a super relevant comparison ....

When rolled, it's the size of a burrito but slightly chewier. 

 

A day in the life of the Scarfle ...

Book a last minute trip to Austin, TX. The Scarfle rolls small enough to hardly take any luggage space. When going Kayaking around Barton Springs, don't bring any bags, rather just toss the Scarfle around you neck, put your valuables in the PVC-lined pockets, and look all classy walking to the river. Dry off after you take a refreshing dip. Toss the Scarfle back around your neck, where the thin breathable 4-way stretch material will cool you off in the 100 degree heat. Get back to the hotel and head to the roof top pool, unfold the Scarfle into a full size pool towel for your chair. Enjoy the view with a cold one in hand!

Timeline

8/1 - Launch Indiegogo campaign

8/1 - 8/15 - Put the finishing touches on packaging, product shots, and other fun stuff

8/15 - Campaign ends and we immediately ship units

8/15 on - You receive RUCs (random, unsolicited complements)

Risks

There is a small chance a gang of llamas will intercept our inventory while in transit and then start a Llama-Scarfle movement that will be written about for ages. In all seriousness we highly value the contributions of anyone who can back the project and have taken steps to ensure each aspect of our supply chain. That said, there is always risk associated with the manufacturing and shipping process. We have been monitoring the status of our initial order and it is nearly complete, so some of the inherent risk is limited. 

U + Us = UUS

If you're still reading, we want to express our gratitude! We've been using various prototypes of the Scarfle for the past 5 months and they really do change the game. Whether it's eliminating the need for a bag, easily packing in luggage, or keeping the sun off our shoulders we no longer leave for outdoor activities without a Scarfle. Thank you for your support and we hope you have the same experience!

WHAT IS PERSPECTIVE?

We believe that one shouldn’t be put in the position to choose between quality and appearance. Our brand focuses on combining the better of the two into one intuitive and representative product. Perspective is the first luxury brand to integrate carbon fiber into a full line of clothing, starting from a t-shirt all the way up to jackets and coats.

 

CARBON FIBER IN A NUTSHELL

 

OUR TEAM

Working as a unit, our team is composed of two major roles: Product Development and Design

In the Product Development department, we are working with high skilled engineers continuously working on bringing the project to life. We are proud to officially finding a way of imbedding carbon fiber into our products in such matter that it doesn’t present any risks to one’s health, excluding the itchiness, allergy causes and chemical irritation, you are left with one of the most durable and high quality clothing product on the market.

Whereas in the Design department, designers and architects with a life time experience in domain, constantly create never before seen concepts. Working in relationship with our engineers they produce accurate and high-quality products, each piece of garment having a story behind it which illustrates the sole purpose of our project, high performance apparel!

We define quality from the customer perspective, as too often, staff within a manufacturing environment wants to make a product “better: but don’t really know what better means. In order to have the best outcome possible we use the customers’ perspective to define what the best-in-class product would be.

 

 

PRODUCTION

Developing organizational understanding of the cost of quality is a key feature of our project. As it is essential that the manufacturing staff to be trained to understand the level of quality we like to inspire. We are fully aware that without proper team cooperation and anticipation of the change could have dire quality repercussions, thus it is essential for us that strong process discipline is employed. Each product takes great precision and skill to ensure the outcome is impeccable.

Quality won’t be sustainably improved by individuals. To really make a lasting and meaningful change in the fashion industry, it will take a team-based approach. By involving multiple disciplines in the search for improved quality, a variety of perspectives is obtained by using a team mindset. Using top of the chain suppliers for Supima Cotton, Carbon Fiber Cloth and Fabrics we ensure our customers with what they deserve, the best high durable garment.

 

 

Rewards

Getting involved into our project means much more than just helping us create a future clothing line that will change the fashion industry forever. Each supporter at any level:
• Will be added to our Perspective Limited Edition list, with early access to each and every future season clothing line.
• Every backer’s name will be added on a special display in each Perspective store.

Desire to stand out from the crowd, to wear something bright, unusual, beautiful, so strong that we create such things with our own hands, realizing our imagination and original intentions.
Each necklace is unique, the way each person is. A part of a man's soul lives in the things he creates. That's why they bring warmth and love. And we all want warmth and love.

column1: We don't sell our product anywhere else in the world, even visiting Ukraine you can't find such Namysto in shops or markets.

Our team is the creators who help to fulfill dreams. We do our job with pleasure, otherwise we would not do it. And the feelings of the master, his state at the time of creating are transferred to the thing itself.

Everything that is done with love is beautiful. Masters create things, realizing their need to carry beauty into the world around them. Therefore, handmade, even if unusual, but beautiful in its own way.
